<pb n="001"/>

<p><q>śrīrastu</q></p>
<p><q>bharatamunipraṇītaṃ</q></p>
<p><q>nāṭayaśāstram</q></p>
<p><q>aṣṭāviṃśo'dhyāyaḥ1</q></p>
<lg><l>ātodyavidhi1amidānīṃ vakṣyāmaḥ ।2</l>
<l>3tataṃ caivāvanaddhaṃ ca ghanaṃ suṣirameva ca ।</l>
<l>caturvidhaṃ tu vijñeyamātodyaṃ lakṣaṇānvitam ।। 1 ।।</l></lg>
<!-- COMMENTARY page 001 !-->
<p><q>abhinavabhāratī</q></p>
<p>aṣṭāviṃśo'dhyāyaḥ</p>
<p><q>।। ataḥ paraṃ geyādhikāraḥ ।।</q></p>
<lg><l>madhyamasvaramuśanti yadvaśānnādaṣaṭkamuditaṃ śrutikramāt ।</l>
<l>so'pi yadvilasitaṃ kalātmakaṃ taṃ namāmi śiśirāṃśumaṇḍanam ।।</l></lg>
<p>ātodyānāṃ vikalpanamityuktaṃ pūrvādhyāyasamāptau, tena saṅgatiṃ kartuṃ ṣaṣṭhādhyāyapaṭhitamapi ślokaṃ punaḥ
paṭhati--tataṃ caivetyādi । nanūddeśe (6--10) "siddhiḥ svarāstathātodyaṃ gānaṃ raṅgaṃ ca saṃgrahaḥ" ityuktam । tataṃ ca
(tatāṃśo) naṭānāṃ rāmādiviśeṣarūpatayā śaṅkyamānānāṃ tanmayībhāvapratyūhabhūtāśayanivāraṇāya 'nātho vanaṃ viśati'
ityādinā, tālāṃśo'pi prayogaṃ sūtrakalpatayā samīkurvan svaraṃ layaṃ ca svaprekṣakahṛdayaṃ tatraivānusyūtaṃ tirodadhatsāmyaṃ
ca rāganibandhanaṃ vidadhadrasaṃ prati paramamaṅgalam । tatra svarāṃśe tatasuṣirayorupayogaḥ । tau hi svarasya paramārtha
raktilakṣaṇaṃ vitarataḥ । gātṝṇāṃ hi vākpāruṣyādidoṣaśatopahatānāṃ svarastantrīveṇusvareṇa susvaratāṃ nīyate,
svabhāvata eva tanmādhuryāt । vāṅmādhurya yāvaddhīnaṃ tadāhārya madhuraṃ <q>niropitaṃ</q> mādhuryamabhyāsādahareyuḥ ।
tatānubaddhatvātsvarasya na nyūnādhikabhāvāśaṅkā kācit, tatra mūrcchitāyāṃ vīṇāyāmaśikṣitenāpyabhihananena
svarattvopalambhaḥ । natvevaṃ vaṃśa iti tatātodyasyaiva prādhānyam । ata eva vīṇā śārīrikī caivācāryairnirdiṣṭā
<!-- APPARATUS page 001 !-->
1. <q>bha</q>-- pañcaviṃśaḥ ra-- N saptaviṃśaḥ <q>naca</q>--ekonaviṃśaḥ 1a. N--ātodyamidānīṃ vakṣyāmaḥ 2. <q>ja</q>--vyākhyāsyāmaḥ 3. <q>bha</q>--
tataḥ ......naddhaḥ ....... ghanaḥ suṣira eva ca.

<pb n="002"/>

<lg><l>tataṃ tantrīkṛtaṃ1 jñeyamavanaddhaṃ tu pauṣkaram ।</l>
<l>2ghanaṃ tālastu vijñeyaḥ suṣiro3 vaṃśa ucyate ।। 2 ।।</l></lg>
<!-- COMMENTARY page 002 !-->
"dāravī gātravīṇā ca" iti । tathā ca pratibimbaṃ vīṇeti vyavahāraḥ । ihāpi pūrvaṃ vaiṇā eva svarā uddiśyante
<q>dvayadhiṣṭānāḥ svarā vaiṇāḥ śarīrā</q>śceti । gāndharve'pi (hi ?) prayoktuḥ phalamiti tadanusāreṇa śārīraprādhānyaṃ
phale darśitam । gāne tu śrotṛphalaraktipradhānateti gānasya (gāndharva) upakaraṇīkṛto muninā । tālabhāro tu
ghanāvanaddhayorniveśapadāṃśe dhruvādhyāyasyopayogaḥ । na caitadgāndharvasārābhiṣyandatvamanena nirmitam । sāmabhyo gītamiti
hi pāramparyeṇa sāmavedodbhūtaṃ na brahmagītaprabhavatvādgītasya sāmakaraṇatvamuktam । tena prathamaṃ jātyādilakṣaṇaṃ nirūpitam
। atastatātodyasyaiva prathamamabhidhānaṃ, svarāṇāmiti tatraiva svaralābha ityuktam । teṣāṃ tu pṛthaguddeśe
prayojanamantarāyopasaṃgraho nāma kākvadhyāya eṣāṃ pūrvamuditānāmeva । kiṃca ।</p>
<p>...drūpamityātodyasyaiva svarūpaṃ vācyamiti na kadācidasaṃgatiḥ । lakṣaṇānvitamiti tadanyasya
nirāsādanucitasyāpi vādyāntarasya tasmāllakṣaṇaṃ na kṛtamityāha । yasmādidamevaṃ vijñeyaṃ-- etanmadhya eva
sarvamantarbhavati, tadetadaṅgatvaṃ kiṃcidyāti, kiṃcitpunaranyasmin sati tadupayogi । tathāhi
pāṭādipuṣpakaravādyasyaivāṅgādanyatra ḍombīścāṭukādīnāṃ nāsti । anyannāṭyopayogi mārjanāmārgānuyātaḥ
svaravarṇasaṃbodhenātyantavyañjakatvāyogājjvālāpaṭṭaphalakavādādape.............vamārjyamayaḥ sarvaṃ hi
caturvidhasyehaivoktasya kiṃcidaṃśamanusaredetatprakṛtyebhyo veti mantavyaḥ ।। 1 ।।</p>
<p>cāturvidhyaṃ pūrvoktameva smārayati tataṃ tantrīkṛtamityādi । tantrīṇāṃ (kṛtaṃ tatam) cārmabandhavādavanaddham ।
mūrtikāṭhinyena ghanaṃ tadanusāreṇa rasabhāvopayogi viśiṣṭavarṇadvāreṇa ca nopayujyata iti sāmyamātropayogitvāttāla
ityuktam । ghanaṃ suṣiramiti pāṭhe ātodyāpekṣaṃ napuṃsakaṃ, viśeṣāpekṣayā talliṅgena kecitpaṭhanti ।</p>
<p>suṣirasya svārātmakatve'pi tadanantaraṃ tasyānabhidhānamiticenna, vīṇāyā eva svarabhāge prādhānyāt ।
dhātuvādyaśeṣaśuṣkaprakṛtikatvāccāvanaddhasya tanmānopakāritvācca ghanasya, vīṇeva suṣirasya tata evānupraveśaḥ ।
tatastu vaṃśaḥ tatra caturvidhātodyamuparañjakam । uparaścānīyāścābhinaya iti tayorekasanniveśātmakaḥ samūhaḥ kartavyaḥ
। tatra caturvidhamapyātodyaṃ svaratālaprādhānyāddvividhaṃ kṛtaṃ tatamavanaddhaṃ ceti । suṣiraghanayoḥ krameṇa tadaṅgatvāt ।
abhinayena ca pātravarga ākṣipta iti trayaḥ samūhāḥ kutapaśabdavācyāḥ । kutaṃ śabdaṃ pāti, kuṃ ca raṅgaṃ tapatyujjvalayati
(vā) ।। 2 ।।</p>
<!-- APPARATUS page 002 !-->
1. <q>ḍa</q>--gataṃ, 2. <q>bha</q>--ghanaḥ 3. <q>ja</q>--suṣiraṃ

<pb n="003"/>

<lg><l>prayogastrividho hyeṣāṃ1, vijñeyo nāṭakāśrayaḥ ।</l>
<l>2tataṃ caivāvanaddhaṃ ca tathā nāṭyakṛto'paraḥ3 ।। 3 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>4tataḥ kutapavinyāso 5gāyanaḥ saparigrahaḥ ।</l>
<l>5avaipañciko vaiṇikaśca vaṃśa6vādastathaiva ca ।। 4 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>mārdaṅgikaḥ pāṇavikastathā dārdariko'paraḥ7 ।</l>
<l>avanaddhavidhāveṣa 8kutapaḥ samudāhṛtaḥ ।। 5 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>uttamādhamamadhyābhistathā9 prakṛtibhiryutaḥ ।</l>
<l>10kutapo nāṭyayoge tu nānādeśasamuddhavaḥ11 ।। 6 ।।</l></lg>
<!-- COMMENTARY page 003 !-->
<p>tadetadāha <q>prayogastrividho</q> hyeṣāmiti । eṣāṃ caturṇāmātodyānāṃ nāṭakāśrayo
nāṭakagatapātravargasahitastriprakāraḥ prakarṣeṇa yogaḥ samūhībhāvaḥ, yataḥ svayaṃ dvau samūhau nāṭyopayogī pātravargātmā
ca tṛtīyaḥ । tadāha nāṭyakṛto'para iti । yadyapi tananāvahananasauṣiryanibaddhatvena saṃkīrṇatvādi ।
takhāpyekopayogakṛtānyapadeśaḥ । tananena hi svaraprādhānyaṃ, tacca na puṣkarādavahananena varṇānusvāraḥ
sama(na)tantryāyādau । evamanyatrāpi vācyam । tatra tatābhidhānaḥ kutapaḥ kriyatāṃ samūha ityāha <q>tataḥ kutapavinyāsa</q>
ityādi । parigraho gāyakasya(bhāryā)। tadyathā gāyakaḥ kāṃsyatālikāhastādvipañcī apūrṇatantrīkā koṇavādanīyā
vīṇātvekaviṃśatitantrīkā । cakārādanyāsāṃ vīṇānāṃ saṃgrahaḥ ।</p>
<p><q>tathaiva ceti</q> aparasuṣiraparigrahaḥ । athāvanaddharāśimāha <q>mārdaṅgika</q> ityādi mṛdaṅgānīti puṣkarāṇi,
paṇavo'ntastantrīko huḍuṅkākāraḥ । darduro mahāghaṭākāraḥ । <q>tathaiva</q> ceti vacanānmardalakaraṭādisaṃgrahaḥ । kāṃsyatālikāstu
gītavādyayoḥ sāmyāpādanārthāḥ, tatkutapa eva yuktāḥ ।। 3-5 ।।</p>
<p>atha nāṭyakutapamāha <q>attamādhamamadhyābhi</q>riti । uttamādiprayoktavyocitaḥ pātrasamūha ityarthaḥ । tuḥ
pūrvato viśeṣaḥ, tatāvanaddhayoḥ kutapayorniyatadeśatā puṣkarādhyāye vakṣyate । nāṭyakutapasya tu prayoge mābhūdavyadyā(
davya) vadhiriti sannidhimātramupayogi na tu deśaniyamaḥ । tadāha <q>nānādeśe</q>ti pratyupayogo'nena kathita ityapare
।। 6 ।।</p>
<!-- APPARATUS page 003 !-->
1. <q>bha</q>--eva 2. <q>ma</q>--tataśca.....naddhaiśca 3. <q>u</q>--kṛtaśca yaḥ 4. <q>bha</q>--tate, <q>ra</q> --N evaṃ 5. <q>bha</q>--gāyanī--saṃparigrahaḥ, <q>ra</q>--
gātā pāṇavikastathā N: gātā vādayitā tathā 5a: N vaipañtikaśca vijñeyo 6. <q>ḍa</q>--vādaka eva ca. 7. <q>ḍa</q>--budhaiḥ,
8. <q>ra</q>--vidhirjñeyaḥ 9. <q>ra</q>--tribhiḥ, 10. <q>ra</q>--evaṃ hi nāṭyakutapo. 11. <q>ca</q>--samāśrayaḥ, <q>ra</q>--samāśritaḥ

<pb n="004"/>

<lg><l>1evaṃ gānaṃ ca vādyaṃ ca nāṭyaṃ ca vividhāśrayam ।</l>
<l>alātacakrapratimaṃ kartavyaṃ nāṭyayoktṛbhiḥ2 ।। 7 ।।</l></lg>
<!-- COMMENTARY page 004 !-->
<p>nanvete trayaḥ samūhāḥ kiṃ parasparamanapekṣā eva, netyāha <q>evaṃ gānaṃ ca vādyaṃ</q> ceti । trayo'pyete samūhā
ekībhāvaṃ neyā iti yāvat, na punareko gāyako mārdaṅgika uttamapātramityādinā puruṣā eva darśitāḥ ।</p>
<p>nanu gānādīnyāśaṅkyāha <q>vividhā āśrayā</q> yasyeti । nahi prayoktranapekṣitvaṃ gānādīnāṃ vadati ।
uktaṃ ca.......yatnamiti saṃpādyamiti yāvat । tasmādatra yatna ityetadevāha । yasmāddvividhāśrayaṃ
bhinnendriyagrāhyavividhakriyārūpaṃ, tasmādyatnenāsyaikatā tatsaṃpādyā, yenaikabuddhiviṣayatā sāmājikasya gacchet ।
alātatejaḥkaṇo hi na vastuto yugapadanekadeśasambandhī, lāghavayatnena tu tathā tathā sāmyamāpāditam । evaṃ
prayogo'pi tathāpi naikakriyātmā sāmyāpādanāya.......
tnena tu tathā sampādita ityetadāha <q>alātacakrapratima</q>miti ।</p>
<p>nanu sāmānyābhinaye'dhyāye etaduktaṃ, satyaṃ, tattvabhinayaviṣayaṃ, idaṃ tu gītavādyanāṭyānāṃ parasparasya
viṣayam । nanu kasmāttrayo rāśayaḥ kṛtāḥ ityāśaṅkamānena naivāpasārayati <q>evaṃgānaṃ</q> ceti nāṭyaṃ tāvaduparañjanīyam ।
sāmānyābhinaye'bhinayabalādekatvaṃ nīta eko rāśiriti । nātra vivādaḥ । svaragatirāśiścānyonya-
saṃmilito'lātacakravatkāyaḥ । vividhāśrayo'pi vīṇāvaṃśagātragato'pi vādyavidhirekībhāvaṃ neya iti trayāṇāmapyatha
grāsīkaraṇamiti yuktamuktam ।</p>
<p>nanvevaṃ rāśitraye'sminnekībhūte prayogasamyaktvāpatitalakṣaṇāsiddhirbhavati, tathā ca gītavādyadoṣā api
siddhivighātakā uktāḥ । tataśca siddhisvarūpaṃ geyādhikārasya paścādvaktavyam । ata eva hi
gītavādyanāṭyakṛtāsiddhirityukteti kiṃ pradhānaṃ kimaṅgamiti bhāge saṃśayyate । pūrvameva tu siddhinirūpaṇe etāvatā
prayogatvamiti parijñātam । tasyoparañjanīyatoktā bhavati, madhyāvasthitena ca siddhinirūpaṇe
ākāṅkṣivaduparañjākavargo'pi spaṣṭa eva bhavati ।</p>
<p>anye tu manyante-gītātodyavihīnādapi prayogātpaṭhyamānādapi daśarūpakād bhavati siddhirityanena
sūcitamiti । tattu na samyagiva, tāvatī hyaparipūrṇatā nāṭyasya, paripūrṇaṃ ca sarvānugrāhi nāṭyasvarūpamabhidhitsitaṃ
muneḥ । tatra ca gītavādyayoreva prādhānyamityavocāma ।</p>
<!-- APPARATUS page 004 !-->
1. <q>ra</q>--tasmānnāṭyaṃ ca vādyaṃ ca rasabhāvavibhāvakam 2. <q>ra</q>--yogasaṃśrayam

<pb n="005"/>

<lg><l>1yattu tantrīkṛtaṃ proktaṃ 2nānātodyasamāśrayam ।</l>
<l>gāndharvamiti 3tajjñeyaṃ svaratālapadātmakam ।। 8 ।।</l></lg>
<!-- COMMENTARY page 005 !-->
<p>kiṃ caivaṃ sati siddhyadhyāye gītavādyavaiṣamyādi kimarthamucyate, prāktana eva samādhānamārgo yuktaḥ ।
uparañjakopakṛtasya nāṭyasya nāṭyateti bhedyatvāttatpaścādupāttam । gānaṃ tvādau taccheṣabhūtaṃ tu madhye vādyamiti
kramaḥ nāṭyānusāreṇa tryaśracaturaśravinirṇayaḥ, api tu gānānusāreṇeti gānamuparañjakamapi sannāṭyaṃ
vyavasthāpayadevoparañjayatīti yukta eṣa eva raṅga iti ṭīkākāraḥ । tadetanna vidāmaḥ । nahi nāṭyamanāśritya
kiṃcidapi pravartate । gānasyāpi nāṭyānusāreṇopayogāditi gatyadhyāyadiśaiva tryaśrādivyavasthā bhedādityāstām
।। 7 ।।</p>
<p>tatra tatātodyasvarūpaṃ pradhānavadabhidhātuṃ pīṭhabandhaṃ karoti <q>yattu tantrīkṛtaṃ prokta</q>miti । vipañcī-
vīṇādibhedānāṃ nātodyateti ṭīkākāraḥ । tadayuktam । sāmānyena tantrīkṛtatvena sarvasaṃgrahe tadanuktasamatvādasyārthasya
tasmādevamityasmatsampradāyaḥ । nānātodyanirūpaṇasamāśrayaṃ yasya, tāni hi tadgataṃ rūpamupākāratayā āśrayante,
tena tadeva pradhānaṃ tacca gāndharvamiti । gāndharvo mitirmānaṃ vartanamantarbhāvo yasya gāndharve tadantarlīnamiti yāvat ।
krama ityāha svaratālapadalakṣaṇaṃ hi tadgāndharvam , evaṃ bhūtakramameva svarādyātmam । evaṃ tatamadhya--eva gāyako
gaṇitaḥ saparigrahaḥ । iha caitadarthameva tantrīkṛtamityuktaṃ tantrīpradhānamityarthaḥ । gāndharvaśāstraṃ ca pramāṇamasyeti
<q>gāndharvamiti</q>।। 8 ।।</p>
<p>sāmabhyo gītamiti kathitaṃ sāmāni cātra kāraṇakāraṇāni । gāndharva hi sāmabhyastasmādbhavaṃ gānaṃ na
tulye svarādyātmakatve gānaṃ gāndharve'ntarbhūtamiti kā bhāṣā । viparyayo'pi kasmānna bhavati, tādāmyameva vā kathaṃ
na syādityāśaṅkāṃ śamayitumāha <q>atyarthamiṣṭaṃ devānā</q>miti । anenāditvaṃ sūcitam । devā hi kathamiṣṭaṃ vijahyuḥ ।
tatheti tena devatāparitoṣadvāreṇa prītiṃ dadātītyadṛṣṭaphalatvaṃ darśitam ।</p>
<p>yasmāt yadrūpācca devānāmīṃśvarāṇāmindriyamanassaṃvedanaprabhṛtīnāṃ, ātodyamānatvena vyavahāreṇa
gacchatāneneti devavādyānāṃ, atyarthamarthātikrameṇa bāhyaśabdādiviṣayollaṅghanena ......miṣṭamicchāyajanaṃ ca
parasaṃvitsaṃgatilābhalakṣaṇamupalakṣaṇam, tathā tena prakāreṇa pratīterapavargocitānanda--
svabhāvaviśeṣeṇāvarjitamityapavargaphalatvaṃ darśitam । tathātikrāntaṃ dhanādinirapekṣaṃ cedaṃ devānāṃ yajanaṃ
<!-- APPARATUS page 005 !-->
1. <q>bha</q>--yatra tantrīgataṃ. 2. <q>ḍa</q>--tata, <q>ra</q>--nānāvādya <q>da</q>--nānābhāva, 3. <q>ḍa</q>--vijñeyaṃ...padāśrayam.

<pb n="006"/>

<lg><l>atyarthamiṣṭaṃ devānāṃ 1tathā prītikaraṃ punaḥ2 ।</l>
<l>gandharvāṇāṃ3 ca yasmāddhi tasmādgāndharvamucyate ।। 9 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>asya4 yonirbhavedgānaṃ5 vīṇā vaṃśastathaiva ca ।</l>
<l>eteṣāṃ caiva vakṣyāmi 6vidhiṃ svarasamutthitam ।। 10 ।।</l></lg>
<!-- COMMENTARY page 006 !-->
purāṇayogādibhyo'dhikā prītirgāndharvācchaṃkarasyeti । <q>gandharvāṇāmiti</q> prayoktrupalakṣaṇaṃ, tena hyatyantaṃ
saṃvitpraveśalābhena tu gātuḥ phalayogo gandhatvāt । tadāha--
'sakṛtprayuktāpi hi nandayantī yathāvidhi brahmahaṇaṃ punāti' iti prayokttṛgatamatra mukhyaṃ phalam ।</p>
<p>nanu gāna iva mukhyatayā śrotṛniṣṭhaṃ tena gandharvāṇāṃ prītivardhanamiti sambandhaḥ । tathāpi ca śrūyamāṇaṃ
prītivardhanamityevamanāditvāddṛṣṭādṛṣṭaphalatvācca pradhānaṃ gāndharvaṃ gandharvāṇāṃ prayojyamiti vyutpattyā, evaṃ devānāmiṣṭaṃ
prītikṛdgandharvāṇāṃ gāndharvamiti sambandhaḥ । tasmācca prītimeva viśeṣeṇa vardhayati yattadgānamityadhyāhāraḥ । gānaṃ hi
kevalaṃ prītikārye vartate । tena tādātmyaṃ tāvadayuktam । navamahāphalasyānādeḥ svataḥ phale kalpite tadantarbhāva iti
viparyayo'pi nirastaḥ । sa cāyaṃ gāndharvaviveko dhruvādhyāye nṛtte'smābhirdarśayiṣyate । iha iva tu darśito vācoyuktyana--
bhijñānamadhunaiva hi saṃmohe hetuḥ syāditi ।</p>
<p><q>atyarthamiṣṭaṃ devānā</q>mityanena gāṃ vācaṃ dhārayatīti gāndharva, gandharvāṇāmidamiti ca । yathāha
<q>viśākhilācāryaḥ</q>-- "purā svargapranaṣṭā (vācaṃ) devebhyaḥ" iti tannidarśanenaiva darśitam । prītivardhanamiti ca
<q>nāradīya</q>nirvacanaṃ sūcitam । "geti geyaṃ viduḥ dheti dhātuḥ pravādajamiti, vākyasya saṃjñeti, rephastu vādyasyopalakṣaṇaṃ
kākupravādanamiti vā' tadevaṃ nirvācanātparyāyeṇa śloka iti ṭīkākāraḥ । atra tu na karotu vyākhyāta eva ।
tasmādupādhyāyairidamuktaṃ--nanvidaṃ gāndharva kuta udbhūtaṃ gānasya ca sāmahetukatvātkathaṃ pūrvamuktam । kiṃ ca
gānasyaivopayogāllakṣaṇaṃ vaktavyaṃ na tu gāndharvasyeti śaṅkāṃ śamayitumāha <q>asya yonirbhavedgānami</q>tyādi । asya
gāndharvasya । <q>gāna</q>miti sāmayonigītiṣu samākhyā । <q>vīṇe</q>ti mahāvratopayoginī audumbarī, <q>vaṃśa</q> iti
nāradādigurusaṃtānānuyāyīti gāndharvasya prabhavaḥ । kiṃca, gānavīṇāvaṃśādayo'yaṃ tatkutapabhedo vaktavyatvenopakrāntaḥ,
sa evāsya gāndharvasya yonirhetuḥ, ihābhidhāsyamānatva iti śeṣaḥ । tatkutapopayogitvādiha gāndharvamabhidhāsyata
<!-- APPARATUS page 006 !-->
1. <q>rada</q>--teṣāṃ.....bhavet 2. <q>na</q>--vivardhanam 3. <q>ra</q>--vai yasmāt 4. <q>ra</q>--tasya 5. <q>ja</q>-- gātraṃ, <q>ra</q>--kaṇṭhyaṃ
6. <q>bha</q>--dvividhaṃ svarasaṃyutam

<lg><l>gāndharvaṃ trividhaṃ vidyātsvaratālapadātmakam ।</l>

iti yāvat । brahmagīte lokapravāhasiddhaṃ pragītagātṛgeyameva prasūtiheturiti ślokārthasya tātparyamityanye ।
ṭīkākṛttu gānaṃ pradhānaṃ tadupakārakau vīṇāvaṃśāviti । guṇapradhānatānirṇayo'sya tātparyaṃ vyākhyānādrathantaraṃ
gāyatrīmatra gāyantītyetatsamarthane tu yo mahān saṃrambhaḥ ṭīkākāreṇa kṛtaḥ sa prakṛtopayovaikalyādanekārthatvena
gāyate upacārāśrayeṇa susamarthatvātsikatācarvaṇaprāyaḥ । na rathantaramiti yadi yadā nirūpāṇi tadā
svarasaṃniveśena..... nayatītyayamarthaḥ । atha gītireva tadā sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvaḥ svarāniti svādhārabhūtapadavyavacchedakaṃ
vacanam "sve pratiṣṭhaṃ gagana" mitivat । mandasya nalatve'pi tatpramitaṃ svaravācakatvaṃ tadgītyādhāre niṣṭhatvaṃ ceti
tatrāpyadoṣaḥ । na cānena prakṛtaṃ kiṃciduktamityalam ।। 9--10 ।।</p>
<p>nanu yaduktaṃ gāndharvaṃ kathaṃ tasya gānādāvupayoga ityāha eteṣāṃ ceti । co'pyarthe । tatheti pūrvārabdhātsambadhyate ।
tena hi gāndharvaprakāreṇaiṣāṃ bhāvādīnāṃ svarasamutthitaṃ svaraviṣayameva vidhiṃ vakṣye na tvanyam ।। 10 ।।</p>
<p>nanu ko'nyo'stītyāśaṅkyāha <q>gāndharvaṃ trividhaṃ vidyā</q>diti । tribhyaḥ svarādibhyo vidhā vidhānaṃ
yasya । āśritavācī vidhāśabda iti <q>cirantanāḥ</q> na tvatravidhāśabdaḥ prakārārthaḥ । evaṃ hi sati
pṛthakpṛthaggāndharvavyavahāro bhavet । na caivaṃ, tathā ca <q>viśākhilācāryaḥ</q> "svarapadatālasamavāye tu gāndharvam"
iti । ātmagrahaṇenaiṣāṃ miśrībhāvaḥ । padaṃ syātkāraṇamavadhānaṃ sūcayati । etadeva yuktaṃ, nahi svaratālapadatulyatayā,
idaṃ bhāganiviṣṭamavadhānaṃ bhāti, yena samūhamadhye gaṇyeta । iti kartavyopayogi hi tattatra miśrībhāvaḥ pradhānaguṇabhāve
naiva bhavati । tatra pūrvanipātādeva prādhānyaṃ sūcayati । tena svarāḥ pradhānaṃ, tālo nāmātmā tatsāmyenopakārakaḥ
"tala pratiṣṭhākaraṇe" iti tāla evaitadāha । tato'pi dūraṃ padaṃ padaśabdenaiva tasyādhāratālābhaḥ । taduktaṃ <q>dattilā</q>cāryeṇa--
"padasthaḥ svarasaṃghātastālena sumitaḥ" (I.3) iti tena padatālā yādṛśā gāndharveṇa tādṛśā gāne svarata eva
tu bhūyasā tatopayogīti tātparyam । avadhānaṃ yogarūpaṃ taccātra nopayogi । parivartakeṣvavanaddhe--pūrvaraṅge tatra hi
devatāparitoṣādeva siddhiḥ । tadetaduktaṃ--</p>

svarā ityuktāḥ । varṇasāmyādapi niruktimāhuḥ । svayaṃ sveṣveva jātirāgabhāṣābhedeṣu rājanta iti svarāḥ । atha

snigdhatvaraktatvalakṣaṇo dharmaḥ tasyāśrayabhūtāyāḥ śruteruparañjākaḥ sa eva svara iti kecit । ṣaḍjaśrutirevetyapare,
samūha ityeke । vayaṃ tu śrutisthānābhighātaprabhavaśabdaprabhāvito'nuraṇanātmā snigdhamadhuraḥ śabda eva svara iti
vakṣyāmaḥ । atra <q>nāradādyā</q> nāmanirvacanamakārṣuḥ--
<lg><l>"nāsāṃ kaṇṭhamurastālu jihvāṃ dantāṃśca saṃśritaḥ ।</l>
<l>ṣaḍbhyastajjāyate yasmāttasmāt ṣaḍja" ityādi (1--57)</l></lg>
tadanupayogānmuninā na svīkṛtam । vīṇāyāṃ ca tathā bhāvābhāve'pi ṣaḍjādidarśanāt । yattu kecitpratisamādadhate--
vīṇāyāḥ pratibimbatvāttatra samānendriyagrāhyo yaḥ śārīrasvarasamūhastameva pratibimbamarpayitumarhatīti,
tadatyantamasāmpratam । vīṇā hi dehasya pratibimbamiti keyaṃ bhāṣā, na hi
darpaṇasaṃkrāntapratibimbaśarīrapraticchandakasadṛśī vīṇā vīṇetyupālambhaḥ । na ca mukuravaddehasya pratibimbanasthānaṃ, na
hi svarasya vīṇāyāṃ svareṇaikendriyagrāhyatvāyogāt । nabhasīva ca tatra pratiśrutyātmanaḥ śabdapratibimbasyāsaṃkramaṇāt ।
na ca vīṇāsvare śārīrasvaraṃ pratibimbamarpayatīti dṛṣṭam, dvayoḥ svarayoranupalambhāt । śārīrasvarābhāve'pi
vaiṇasvarapravṛtteḥ śārīrasvaraḥ vaiṇasvarapratibimbamityasadeva pṛthakprayatnaniṣpādyam । evaṃ hi niyamitapīḍitaṃ
ñyaṅgulisamabhighātotthitaśabdānantarasaṃbhavādraṇanātmā svaraḥ । tatra na ca tatra nāsādikaraṇaṣaṭkamastītyukte
pratibimbatvottarīkaraṇamasadeva, kevalamauttarādharyaviparyāsāt । svagataśarīrasvarānusāreṇa ca sāraṇopayogina
utkarṣāpakarṣaṇasaṃbhavāt pratibimbatvamuktam । sapta iti vacasā kākalyantarasvarau na pṛthaksvarāviti darśayati ।
sapta svarā iti ca saṃbhavavaśāditi ca vakṣyāmaḥ । anye tu 'tatsaviturvareṇyaṃ' iti saptavarṇā 'ni ga ri dha ma pa sa'
svarairbrahmaṇā pūrvamudīritā iti sāptasvarye'bhiprāyamācakṣate । nirṇeṣyāmaścaitat ।</p>
<p>atra kecit codyaṃ prati samādadhyuḥ--śrutikramābhivyaṅgayāḥ svarā iti śrutaya evādau vācyā
iti codyam, tatrotaraṃ--bhavedevaṃ, yadi dhvaninādasaṃjñitāḥ śrutaya eva niyata--
śrutyantaratvena gṛhyamāṇā svarā (iti) । na hyevaṃ, śrutayo hyuccanīcatayā api svarāśrayā eva pratīyante । yathā

bhaṭṭamātṛguptaḥ--</p>

<p>śrutereva ca svaratve caturthasvararūpopalakṣito yaḥ ṣaḍjagrāme pañcamaḥ sa madhyamagrāme yadi tṛtīyaḥ śrutirūpastadā
sa pañcamasvara iti kathaṃ, na hi tṛtīyaṃ caturthamekameva grāmadvayasya, dhaivatasyāyameva nyāyaḥ kākalyantarayośca
niṣādagāndhāratā katham ।</p>
<p>puṣpasādhāraṇe kāle kokilo vakti pañcamam । (<q>nāradīyaśikṣā</q> 1-5-4) iti etacca kathaṃ bhavet ।
(nāsākaṇṭhā)dau niyatā śrutirūpā abhāvāt । bhāve hi sarve svarā syuḥ । śrutikramāpekṣiṇi ca svarāṇāmātmalābhe-
'nyonyāśrayaṃ kasyācidavadhibhūtasya prāgasiddheḥ tasmāt grāmavibhāgārthameva śrutikīrtanaṃ tadgatasaṃvādyādi vi(vecanaṃ)
kathaṃ tadgateṣu rāgeṣu naiva svarāṇāṃ niyatordhvādikamanayā śarīrasāmyaṃ bhavatīti darśayitumiti śrutayaḥ
svarebhyo'nantaramuktāḥ । etadāśrayeṇaiva <q>viśākhilācāryo</q> grāmānantaraṃ śrutīruddiśāti sma । tā hi paraṃ yo...ata
evaṃ <q>sāmavede</q> grāmavibhāgābhāvāttadupayoginyāṃ <q>nāradīyaśi</q>kṣāyāṃ tadabhidhānamauttarādharyamātrameva tūktam (--) yaḥ
sāmagānāṃ (nāra 1-5-1) ityādinā । dīptāyatādyaśca pañcaśrutayaḥ pṛthaksvarādīnāṃ prayuktiviśeṣasādhyā
uktāḥ । <q>anye</q> tvāhuḥ--śrutereva svaratvābhāvāt śrutikramābhivyaḍgyāḥ svabhāvena pūrvaṃ uddeśyā bhaveyuriti । atrocyate-
yadi śrutiśabdena samīraṇasaṃyogī sthānaviśeṣo vivakṣito, "vyastāni tāni ṣaṭṣaṣṭiṃ vidyāt" iti nītyā
tatsarvameta .....nameva । kaścit sthānaṃ svaraṃ manyate । na cāsya rūkṣatā vā snigdhatā vā dharmaḥ samīraṇaḥ tadabhighātayoreṣa
eva nyāyaḥ । atha śrutibhiriti na sthānaviśeṣasamīraṇasaṃyogī prabhavo vivakṣitaḥ, tadgataśca raktatākhyo dharmaḥsvara
iti । tadā tatrāpi pañcamadhaivatānupapattiriti samānat । na hi turyasthānasaṃyogodbhūtasya dhvaneryo dharmaḥ sa
tṛtīyasthānasaṃyogodbhūtasya dharmivadeva, taddharmāṇāṃ naiyatyāt । nahyanyadharmo'nyasya dharmaḥ । etena kākalpantarau
vyākhyātau । kokilo vakti pañcamamityādi cātra sutarāmupapannam ।</p>
<p>nanu tathābhūtasthānābhāve tatsthānaprabhavasya śabdasya yo dharmaḥ sa bhāvitumarhati dharmiṇo'sadbhāvo hi tatra
kāraṇābhāvāt । tucchaṃ caitat ujjotā abhighātajācchabdādanantaraṃ yo'nuraṇanalakṣaṇo'nyaḥ śabda upajāyate sa

tadevāyamasau samudāyāpekṣaḥ svarāṃśo nāma prayogātsamudāyāpekṣādapara eva । tataśca ya evānuraṇanātmā

<p>nanu kāraṇabhedājjātena śabdena kathaṃ tajjātīyo'nuraṇanaśabdaḥ kriyate । maivaṃ, kāraṇe niyamādarśanādvā,

ca vīṇāsvaro'yaṃ mallakasvaro'yamiti, ṣaḍjatvena tvabhedaḥ । ata evaiṣāṃ gātṝṇāmabhighātṛśabdo nānuraṇanaṃ janayati ।
tena śabdaṃ samamapi kurvāṇā aparipūrṇā ityucyante । ghātaśabdasyānuraṇanaśabdena tīvratvābhyadhike'tiraktatā,
sāmye sāmyaṃ vaiparītye vaiparītyam । yasya ca ṣāṣṭisthānasamīraṇābhighātaprabhavā api śabdā anusvārasvarūpaṃ
svarātmakaṃ śabdaṃ janayedevaṃ paripūrṇotkṛṣṭaśārīrakamūrttatāratamye tu nikṛṣṭatā । anena ca kāraṇā
bhedoddhoṣeṇetaretarāśrayamapi prayuktam ।</p>

''utkarṣāpakarṣaṇasthānabhedena śrotragocarābhilakṣaṇīyo viśeṣa upajāyate । tāvatī śrutirekā paramāṇvanusthāne

svaragato'pi tadvibhāgalābhārthaṃ madhye varjanīyasthānabhāgo'nyatra svara iti dviśrutikasya sampattiḥ । sthānadvayena
vyavadhau triśrutikasya, trayeṇa catuḥśrutikasya, tataḥ paraṃ caturādivyavadhāne'tiprayatnavaśāddvaisvaryamiti
pañcaśrutikāderasaṃbhavaḥ । tata eva śrutidvayotkarṣo dviśrutikayoreva ganyoruktaḥ । ekaśrutyutkarṣastu noktaḥ,
sthānasāṃkaryeṇa svarasāṃkaryaprasaṅgāditi hyuktam । catuḥśrutitriḥśrutirdviḥśrutiriti krameṇānarthaśrutireva । tato'pi
catuḥśrutistriḥśrutiriti ṣaḍjapradhānatvāt ṣaḍjagrāmaḥ sarigamapadhani, mapadhanyādimadhyamagrāmaḥ । cataḥśrutistriḥ-
śrutirdviḥśrutiriti । tathā hi-ekasminnevorasi ūrdhvādharatayā saptasvarāḥ tathā hi catuḥśrutikātpūrṇāṃdādyāt,
tadrutarūpādekaikaṃ niskāsaṃ prakrameṇa punaśca prakṛtibhūtapūrvarūpasparśaiścatvāraḥ sarigamāḥ । tathaiva sthāne ūrdhvasparśe
padhanisāḥ, kevalaṃ ṣaḍjena dvitīyaṃ sthānaṃ spṛśyata eva । mandrasparśavataḥ sthānaṃ svarāṇām । evaṃ kaṇṭhasthāne
śirasi ca । teṣu sarvathā tādrūpyasaṃkramaṇāttvaṃśādivyapadeśa eva, tatsthānagatānāṃ tu sādṛśyaparata evaṃ saṃvādatvaṃ
vakṣyate । tena paramārthataḥ tatra eva svarāḥ -sarigāḥ, padhanayaḥ । madhyamastu dhruvakasthānīyo madhyamatvādeva । catuḥ-
śrutirudāttaḥ uccatvāt, dviḥśrutiranudāttaḥ nīcaistvāt । triśrutiḥsvaritaḥ madhyavartitayā samāhāratvāt । tathā hi
-svarita eva kampitatvaṃ vyavahāranti śrotriyāḥ । ihāpyalaṅkāreṣu triśruteḥ kampanaṃ vakṣyate । tasyordhvādhaḥ svarasya
sparśane'pi svaratākṣamatvāccatuḥśruterhi nordhvamasti, dviḥśruternādharamiti kaṃ pathaṃ kampaḥ ।। 21 ।।</p>
<p>atha sārvaprayogasādhāraṇaṃ svarāṇāṃ yojanāṃ jñātuṃ cāturvidhyaṃ darśayitumupakramate <q>caturvidhatvameteṣā</q>mityādi ।
evakāreṇa vā nyāyatoditasya sthitiprayoga ityāha । caśabdena saṃvādinastatspṛṣṭe saṃbhavamāha । evaśabdena saṃvādino
hi niyataḥsaṃbhavaḥ । <q>atha</q>śabdenānantaryadyotakena saṃvādino vādinaścānupalapanam । <q>vivādī ceti</q> cakāreṇa vivādinaṃ
pratyavajñā, <q>anuvādyapī</q>tyapiśabdenānuvādinaḥ saṃvādidharmopajīvanam । ata evāsya sarvapaścādupādānam । tathā
hi-anuvādivādisaṃvādyanupalapanaṃ sahate, na ca bhūyastaro'sya prayoga iti ।। 22 ।।</p>

syādetat । grahanyāsāpanyāsāstāvadvādinaiva prāyeṇa gṛhītāḥ । tadgṛhā<q>danyāssanyāpasāpanyāsāḥ</q> iti hi śuddhāsu
vakṣyāmaḥ । ṣāḍavauḍuvitālpatvāni vivā (dyanuvādibhinnā) ni, bahutvaṃ saṃvādinā, tāramandrasya nyāsāpekṣa iti
। idaṃ cāsat । śuddhāsu jātiṣu bhavedevaṃ, anyatra tadabhāvātkathamanena saṃgrahaḥ । anuvādī sarvatrāvadhirityavaśyaṃ
vaktavyaḥ । tarhi grahaḥ sutarāṃ vācyaḥ, tena vinā hi na ko'pi (rāgavyāpā)raḥ pravartate । ucyate --uttame
tatsādhāraṇayojanopayogīdamucyate । etāvataiva ca jātivarge bhāṣādyunmīlanaṃ bhavati grahāpanyāsādi
vaiciñyamantareṇāpi । tathā hi --kutracitsvare bhūyastūccāryamāṇe saṃvādini ca tadanuvartini ca tadanucayanā (vadana
?) śālini cānuvādini ca kiṃcitprayogabhāji vivādini kṛtasvarūpamāsīdeti rāgasyābhivyaktiḥ । yathā
"sādhapā pasapā saniripā sanisāsa māsāsaṃ pāpāsā dhāninirīninīsāri" ityatra ṣaḍjavādinī (gāndhāra)
niṣādayoḥ saṃvādini, madhyāmādāvanuvādini, abhivyakto mālavakaiśikaḥ । etadeva hi (prayoga) sarvasvam,
grahādiyojanaṃ tu vaiśiṣṭayāvahaṃ, gāndharve tu viśiṣṭādṛṣṭasiddhaye । etacca vakṣyāmaḥ ।</p>
<p>tatra vādinaṃ lakṣayati <q>yo yadāṃśastadā vādīti । yade</q>ti yatra prayogātmani kāle vadate sa eva
sphuṭatvena bhāsamānaḥ śabdā....vādinaṃ bāhulyenoccāraṇamasyāstīti ca vadati ca tāramandrādivyavasthādīniti
ca lakṣaṇaṃ tvatraiva sūcitam । <q>anye</q> tvaṃśa iti paryāyamāhuḥ । apare tatsiddhaye "yo yadāṃśaṃ spṛśatī" ti paṭhanti ।

<p>atha madhyamagrāmamāha <q>madhyamagrāme tviti</q> । catuśśrutau pañcame ṣaḍjasyaiva dvāvamātyakalpau madhyapañcamau
saṃvādinau bhavata iti। madhyamasyāpi saṃvādino'pi saṃvidiva vyapadeśahetutā । pañcame tu śrutinyūne madhyamasyāpyekaḥ

svaradvayameva pañcamasya catuśśrutikatvaviramātkākalyantarayoścatuśśrutikatvaṃ vikāro na svabhāvaḥ । tulyaṃ
cānāśitvamiti dvāveva grāmau । tatra madhyamā tṛtīyasyāmapi śrutau tathāvidhānuraṇanavyañjanātmakanādaniṣpattiḥ
yathāvidha paḍjagrāme caturthyāṃ mābhūt । kevalasaṃsthānanīcatvānnīcā । tallakṣyate । tata eva śrutyapamāna evāsau
pañcamo bhavati । śruterhi kampo bhavatītyuktam । tathā cāhuḥ--
<lg><l>vedaśrutiḥ pakvakapitthakalpaḥ kṛśapravātonmukhatāṃ prapannaḥ ।</l>
<l>yatiśrutiḥ kampa ivaiṣa bhāti yadvā śrutiḥ svādbhutarāgāniṣṭhaḥ ।। 2 ।।</l></lg>
tata evālpapaniṣādagāndhāra.....ti.....kākalyantarayoḥ prayogaḥ ।। triśruteśca kampitakuharitarecitayogaḥ । nigayośca
vivāditvaṃ raktyantarānuvṛtteḥ । evaṃ <q>śrutyapakṛṣṭaḥ pañcama</q> iti madhyamagrāmasya lakṣaṇam । sa ca pañcamaḥ pradhānaḥ na tu
madhyamagrāme kadācidapi lopyata ityarthaḥ । anye tu grāmayo rdhai vatapañcamāvalopyāviti ।
etadāśrayatvānmadhyamagaterityatrāha ।</p>
<p>atha keyaṃ śrutirnāmetyāśaṅkyāha--<q>evaṃ śrutyutkarṣāpakarṣācceti</q> । mārdavaṃ tantryāḥ śithilīkaraṇaṃ
viparītatvamāyatatvaṃ kriyata ityāha । śruteḥ śabdasya śrotragrāhyasya utkarṣastīvratā apakarṣo mandatā,
taddhetutvānmārdavāyate tu dve api tathokte । evaṃ tīvramandatvahetubhyāṃ mārdavāyatatvābhyāṃ yadantaraṃ yo viśeṣāvabodhaḥ
pramāṇaṃ niścāyakaṃ yasyāḥ sā śrutiḥ । prāktanasya dhvanervailakṣaṇyaṃ yāvatā hīnenādhikena yā tīvramandātmanā rūpeṇa
lakṣyate sā śrutirita yāvat । yadyapi paramāṇuto'pyutkarṣāpakarṣo vā bhaved dhvanerviśeṣastathāpi nāsau gṛhītuṃ
pāryate ।
ata eva yatrotkarṣāpakarṣo na kaucid dhvanīnāṃ grāhyete tatraikā śrutiriti, yadāha <q>paramācāryaḥ</q>

"ekaśrutidūrātsambuddhau" iti ।</p>
<p>nanvalābūvīṇādau tathābhūtānāṃ śrutīnāṃ viśeṣaleśānāmanaiyatyaṃ dṛśyate । tataḥ kiṃ niyataśrutivibhāga
uktaḥ । na tu vīṇāyāmasau niścīyate (iti) । tanna, tannāpyasau niyata eva, anaiyatyagrahaṇaṃ tu mithyā । yattu
daṇḍavibhāgasya dūrādūratvavibhāgaviplava iti ceyaṃ naiyatyālakṣyate, tatrāpi
vāmano'nantapuruṣavibhāgaviśeṣopalakṣaṇīyā śruti.....naivāstu ko virodhaḥ ata eva lakṣaṇīyasyaiva viśeṣasya
śrutirūpatāmiti grahaṇaṃ viśeṣaṇamupāttamutkarṣaśabdena, prakaraṇāccāpakarṣasyāpi labhyata iti । vīṇādvaye sthite
ekasyāṃ vīṇāyāṃ tantryāmutkṛṣṭāyāṃ svarasyotkarṣa (rṣo) parasyāḥ sthitavīṇātantrīsvarasyāpakarṣo lakṣyate । tasmiṃśca
lakṣyamāṇe'pakarṣe dvitīyavīṇāsvarasyo'tkarṣo lakṣaṇīyo bhavati । āyatatvādutkarṣāpakarṣau lakṣyau bhavataḥ । evaṃ
mārdavādapi vīṇādvayāyattamevedamutkarṣāpakarṣetvaṃ darśayituṃ yathāsaṅkakhyaṃ śaṅkāṃ nirākartuṃ mārdavāyatatvādvetyuktam ।
anyathotkarṣāyatatvamārdavābhyāmiti brūyāt । <q>pramāṇeti</q> vadanna na kālakalā śrutirnāpi nādāṃśo na cāyurna sthānaṃ
ca karaṇamiti darśayati । tena vakṣyamāṇoccanīcavibhāgo dhvanirekā śrutiriti tātparyam । evamekasyāḥ śruteḥ
svarūpamabhidhāya śrutisaṃkhyāsvarūpaṃ yathālakṣaṇīyaṃ yathā bhavati tathā darśayitumupakramate <q>nidarśanaṃ</q> <q>tvāsā</q>miti ।
āsāmiti bahvīnāṃ, <q>nidarśanamiti</q> niścitatayā dṛśyante yenopāyena tannidarśanam । yathā hi --prathamadarśanena
raktayorjātyājātyayoreva cotkarṣāpakarṣavatorviśeṣo gṛhīta eva । kiṃ tu
parasparaviśeṣādidṛkṣāvadhānaprayatnabalāttadvilokya dvitīyasya vilokanaṃ punaḥ prathamasya
punadvitīyasyetyanenānusandhānabalena niścitastadviśeṣapratyayo jāyate yo'sāvabhyadhika iti bhaṇyate । prakṛte'pi
tantrīdvaye utkarṣāpakarṣavati (kasmiṃś) cidākṛteḥ yaḥ śabdaḥ pratīyate, tasya parasparavivekā--
yāvadhārayiṣṇordolāgamanavadyatpunaḥ punarākarṣaṇaṃ tatkṛto'nusandhānabalena........paramaḥ pratyayaḥ sphuṭaṃ tadgataviśeṣagrāhī
jāyeta । tannidarśanamityuktam । tatra prathamā (sāraṇā) sādhukāraṃ dhruvakavīṇāṃ sādhayati, dvitīyā śruteriyattāṃ,
tṛtīyā śruticatuṣkaṃ bodhayati, caturthī śrutiṣaṭkaṃ pañcamī dvādaśakamiti sāraṇāpañcakamiti tātparyam । granthastu
vyākhyāyate । <q>pramāṇaṃ</q> ānāhapariṇāhau, tantrīṇāṃ tulyātvaṃ saṅkhyayā sthaulyādinā ceti kecit ।
ataścaturdaṇḍaśabdaḥ punaruktaḥ । tasmādayaṃ vigrahaḥ । tulyapramāṇatantryupapādanadaṇḍamūrcchanā yayorvīṇayoriti । mūrcchanāyāṃ
ca pramāṇasaṅkhyaiva mantavyā daṇḍatantryādisāmyaṃ svarasvarūpaṃ va bhinatti kenāpyaṃśena tena tathā kartavyam, yena
dvaye'pi ekaviṃśadbhāsete ।
svarāṇāṃ kasyacidapi vailakṣaṇyaṃ yasya pratibhāsanāttatraikā dhruvakasthānīyā acalasāraṇā vīṇāyāmaparasyāṃ

<!-- COMMENTARY page 023 !-->
pañcamatantrī śrutimātraṃ śithilīkāryā । tadā madhyamagrāmo jāyate । anantaraṃ madhyamādīnāṃ sarvasvarāṇāṃ śrutimekāṃ
pātayet, yena ṣaḍjagrāma eva bhavati । evaṃ dhruvakavīṇāyāṃ calavīṇāyāṃ vā svareṣu bhaṇyamāneṣu śrutiradhikā nyūnā
ca pratyakṣeṇānusandhānabalāllakṣaṇīyā bhavati । tadāha <q>pañcamaśrutirapakṛṣṭā bhavati</q> sarvasvarebhya iti śeṣaḥ । sā ca
pratyakṣagamyā guṇavatīti bhāvaḥ । yadyapi paramāṇumātreṃ'pi sthānāntare yogiprāya (samādhi)samadhigamyadhvanivailakṣaṇyaṃ
bhavati, tathāpi yadbailakṣaṇyaṃ śrutiśabdavācyamiti darśayan śrutisaṅkhyāparijñānārthaṃ śruticatuṣṭayopalabdhaṃ darśayati ।
punarapi ca <q>tadvadevāpakarṣediti</q> calavīṇāyāṃ pañcamopakramaṃ sarvasva(rāṇā) mekāṃ śrutiṃ pātayet yeṣu calavīṇāgatau

śrutibhyāṃ sarve svarā adhikāḥ । evaṃ dhaivatavailakṣyeṇa gāndhāraniṣādayoranyavīṇāgatadhaivatarṣabhasāmyaṃ jāyate । tadeva

śruteśca svarūpaṃ jñātam । gāndhāraniṣādagaṃ pratyekaṃ yacchutidvayaṃ tacca dhaivatarṣabhamiśrībhāvābhijñānena sphuṭamevopalabdhamiti
tacchutayaḥ pratyakṣībhūtā bhavanti । punarapi calavīṇāyāṃ śrutiryadāpakṛṣyate sarvasvarebhyastadā ca vīṇāgatau dhaivatarṣabhau
dhruvavīṇāgatābhyāṃ pañcamaṣaḍjābhyāṃ yathākramaṃ sāmyaṃ gacchataḥ । yato dhruvavīṇāyāṃ svarāstisraḥ śrutibhiradhikāḥ ।
evaṃ svaradvaye pratyekaṃ śrutitrayaṃ sphuṭīkṛtamiti ṣaṭ śrutaya upalabdhāḥ । trayo dhruvavīṇāyāṃ sarvasvarebhyaḥ śrutimavakarṣaṇena

vīṇāyāḥ sarve svarāścatasṛbhiḥ śrutibhiradhikāḥ । evaṃ svaratraye pratyekaṃ catasraḥ śrutayaḥ sphuṭīkṛtā iti dvādaśa
śrutaya upalabdhā bhavanti । tena catasraḥ ṣaṭ dvādaśeti dvāviṃśateḥ upalabhyo jātaḥ । ṛṣabha (dhaivatā) bhyāṃ ca ganī
dviśrutyadhikāviti śrutidvayapātane'vaśyaṃ tayosta (tra) praveśaḥ । ridhau ca sapābhyāṃ dviśrutyadhikau, dhamapāśca nigamebhyaḥ
catuśrutyadhikā iti tāvatīkānāṃ śrutīnāṃ.....paravartini svare praveśayet । sa tu dviśrutyadhikatvādityādayastrayo
hetavaḥ praveśanīyasvaraviśeṣādapi vyākhyāta eva । tadāha <q>evametena śrutinidarśaneti</q> । ta.........syādityeva
dviśrutiḥ । evaṃ śruteḥsvarūpamupalabdham । atra <q>dve dvayoriti</q> tāḥ śrutiṣu tripu । evaṃ dhruvavīṇāśruteriyattātra (sphuṭīkṛtā)
bhavati । dviśrutimistriśruticatuśrutisvarasvarūpaṃ ca śruteriyattā (nirdhāraṇā)	sphuṭīkaraṇārthaṃ
prastārādeva dṛśyate । tatra daṇḍaprastāreṇa keciddarśayanti dvāviṃśatā rekhāṇām । anye tu maṇḍalaprastāramāhuḥ ।

<p>nanvevaṃ sapta mūrcchanāḥ, satyam, pañcamasya śrutyapakarṣe saptādyāḥ, tadāha <q>dvaigrāmikya</q> iti । pañcame cāpakṛṣṭe

siddhiḥ । tatra ṣaḍjagrāme mūrchanā yāvatithī jātā tāvatithyaiva madhyamagrāmamūrcchanā yathā saṃpadyate tathā darśayati tat

sarvaṃ saṃpannam । sa hi tadā catuśśrutiko madhyamagrāmiko dhaivato bhavati । pamadhanisa svarāṇi ? samagasvarāḥ
sampadyante । madhyamo dviśśrutiko jātaścenniṣādo'sau pañcama eva ṛṣabhastriśrutikatvāt । gāndhāre saṃpannaḥ sa
ṛṣabhaḥ । sasvarā? mapasanisarisarūpatvaṃ yāti ? । atra hetumāha <q>tulyaśrutyantara</q>tvāditi । <q>saṃjñānyatva</q>mityanena

bhavati । tadvadgāndhāro'ntarasvarasaṃjño bhavati ।</p>
<p>jātisādhāraṇamekāṃśānāmaviśeṣājjātīnāṃ samavāyātpratyaṃśaṃ
lakṣaṇasaṃjñānamiti। svarasādhāraṇa dvividhaṃ dvaigrāmikaṃ kasmāt sādhāraṇo'tra svaraviśeṣa
iti kṛtvā ṣaḍjatvāsādhāraṇamucyate । evaṃ madhyame'pi । asya tu
prayogasaukṣmyātkaiśikamiti dvitīyaṃ nāma niṣpadyate । 2kalatvācca kākalīsaṃjño bhavati,
vikṛtatvāccānaṃśaḥ āptopadeśācca saptabhyo nānyo niṣādavāneva । yathā hi ṣaṇṇāṃ
rasānāmanyatamaḥ kṣārasaṃjñitastathā niṣādaḥ kākalīsaṃjño gāndhāraścāntarasvarasaṃjño bhavati।
bhavataścātra--
<lg><l>antarasvarasaṃyogo nityamārohisaṃśrayaḥ ।</l>
<l>kāryo hyalpo viśeṣeṇa nāvarohī kadācana ।। 35 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>kriyamāṇo'varohī syādalpo vā yadi vā bahuḥ ।</l>
<l>jāti़raṃga śrutiṃ caiva nihanyādantarasvaraḥ3 ।। 36 ।। iti ।।</l></lg>
<!-- COMMENTARY page 032 !-->
ātape sveda iti śiśirasya svarūpātpracyavanam । etadevāha <q>na ca nāgata</q> iti । anāgamanamātravyāvṛttirna tu
pūrṇatetyarthaḥ । niśśeṣa ityanena naṣṭaḥ na vā saṃpūrṇa ityarthayoḥ sa madhyavartīkālaḥ sādhāraṇaḥ, tadvaddvayoḥ svarayoḥ
madhyavartī sasvarasādhāraṇaḥ।। 34 ।।</p>
<p>etameva vibhāgaṃ darśayati ḍu iti । tena tānaśrutisādhāraṇaṃ yadeke prāhustanna soḍhaṃ bhavati । niṣādasya
ṣaḍjagrāme ṣāḍavauḍuvitatvena lopaḥ, gāndhārasya tvauḍuvitvena, viparyayau madhyamagrāme tadviśeṣānāśrayaṇe
lopyatvamātrāt। yadi tānasādhāraṇaṃ tanna, kiñcidetenoktaṃ syāt । śrutisādhāraṇaṃ na
kiñcinniṣādagāndhāravyatirekeṇa hi nānyaparo lopadaśāyāḥ śrutyutkarṣaṃ bhajate ।</p>
<p>prathamaṃ vyācaṣṭe <q>tatra sādhāraṇa</q>miti । etau krameṇa lakṣayati <q>śrutyutkṛṣṭo niṣāda</q> iti । tatra saṃjñāvagrahaṇe
bhedamāha vyavahārārthamime bhinne saṃjñe paramārthatastu dvayorapi tīvrataratvātkākalītvam । yadvakṣyati "<q>kalatvācca
kākalī saṃjñā</q>" (<q>jña</q>) iti । dvayorapi cāntarasvaratvam, yaduktaṃ--"<q>sādhāraṇaṃ nāmāntarasvaratā</q>" iti ।

1. viśruti. 2. N: <q>u</q>-- nayante tvantarasvarāḥ 3. <q>na</q>-- jātimidānīṃ.

<p>1asvarajātayaḥ śuddhā vikṛtāśca । tatra śuddhāḥ ṣāḍjī, ārṣabhī, dhaivatī,
niṣādinī ca ṣaḍjagrāme । gāndhārī madhyamā pañcamītī madhyamagrāme । etāścānyūnasvarāḥ1
svasvarāṃśagrahanyāsāpanyāsāśca ।</p>
<p>vikṛtā lakṣyante tebhyo'nyatamena dvābhyāṃ bahubhirvā lakṣaṇairvikriyāmupagatā
nyāsavarjaṃ vikṛtasaṃjñā bhavanti। nyāsavidhāvapyāsāṃ2 mandro niyamaḥ vikṛtāsvaniyamaḥ।
tatraikādaśasaṃsargajā vikṛtā aparaspara3 saṃsargādekādaśa nirvartayanti । yathā--</p>
<lg><l>śuddhā vikṛtāścaiva hi samavāyājjātayastu jāyante ।</l>
<l>punarevāśuddhakṛtā bhavantyathaikādaśānyāstu ।। 46 ।।</l></lg>

<p>athāsāṃ jātīnāṃ vibhāgamāha <q>svarajātaya</q> iti svaranāmnya ityarthaḥ। tāsāṃ grāmavibhāgamāha <q>tatra śuddhāḥ
ṣaḍje</q>tyādi। śuddhānāṃ lakṣaṇamāha <q>tā</q> iti । <q>anyūnasvarāḥ</q> pūrṇasvarāḥ yo (?) nāmakārī svarāṃśādirūpo (?)
yāsām । cakāraḥ samuccaye । vikṛtānāṃ naitallakṣaṇamityāha <q>vikṛtā lakṣyante ebhya</q> iti । pūrṇagrahopanyāsebhyaḥ ।
tadāha <q>nyāsavarja</q>miti । <q>vikṛtasaṃjñā</q> iti vikāre samyagjñānaṃ viśeṣato yāsāṃ, tena ṣāḍavavikṛtā, grahavikṛtā,
aṃśavikṛtā, grahāṃśopanyāsavikṛtā iti vibhāgaḥ ।</p>
<p>nanvevaṃ (grahāpa) nyāsabhāge śuddhetaravibhāgaḥ kathamityāha <q>nyāsavidhāvapīti</q> । tāsāṃ jātīnāṃ madhye'

<p><q>aṃśavikalpanamiti</q> । aṃśasvarā vikalpyante yena । asyāṃ jātāvayam । aṃśāḥ ṣā(ṣa)ḍavarohitā
iti mīlanagranthena vicāryate । taṃ vakṣyāmaḥ । <q>aṅgavikalpanamiti</q> pāṭhe aṅgasya ṣāḍavauḍavikarūpasya vikalpanaṃ
kathanam । asminnaṃśe tannāstīti । <q>saptama iti</q> । niṣāde gāndhāre cāṃśe tadvati ( ? ) ṣaṭ svarā neṣyanta ityarthaḥ।
atra hetuḥ saṃvādino lopābhāvānniṣādena na syāt ṣāḍavaḥ । sa ca gāndhārasya saṃvādī । gāndhāryādīnāṃ tisṛṇāmṛṣabheṇa
ṣāḍavatvamuktam । sa ca madhyamagrāme pañcamasya saṃvāditī । tatrāṃśe ṣāḍavābhāve dhaivateṃ'śeṃ ṣaḍjodīcyavāyāṃ na
ṣāḍavaḥ । ṛṣabheṇa hi tat । sa ca dhaivatasya saṃvādī ṣaḍjagrāme । ekīkṛtyopasaṃharati <q>saptaitā iti ।</q> ni ga pa pa pa
ga dha ityeteṃ'śāḥ । aṣāḍavāḥ krameṇa ṣaḍjamadhyamādiṣu ṣaḍjodīcyavādyeṣu । athauḍuvitaśūnyānaṃśānāha ।
<q>gāndhārīraktagāndhāryorityādi । saptama iti</q> । niṣādaḥ ṣaḍjamadhyamāyā yau dvāvaṃśau gāndhāraniṣādau tāvannauḍuvikau ।
upasaṃharati <q>evaṃ tu dvādaśaiveti</q> । gāndhārīraktagāndhāryoraṣṭau ṣaḍjamadhyamāyāṃ dvau pañcamyāṃ kaiśikyāṃ dvāviti ।
atra kvacidaṃśasaṃvādyalopo yuktirlabhyate । tadālābhe tu tathānirūpaṇameva hetuḥ ।। 57--63 ।।</p>

<p>iyatī asaṃkhyā bhavatīti ṣaṣṭistāvadaṃśāḥ, tatra catasṛṇāṃ jātīnāṃ nityapūrṇānāṃ navāṃśāḥ aṣāḍavā
iti catuḥpañcāśat । tebhyo'pi sapta ṣāḍavā... sata iti saptacatvāriṃśat ṣāḍavāḥ catasraḥ pūrṇā eveti
caturdaśānāmanyānāṃ madhye catasro <q>nauḍuvikā</q> iti tāsāṃ sambandhino dvādaśāṃśā vakṣyante, śiṣṭānāṃ catvāriṃśat,
tato'pi dvādaśa auḍuvikatā (ma) pavādayanta iti triṃśadauḍuvitāḥ । evaṃ catvāriṃśacchataṃ vikṛtānāṃ saṃsargajānāṃ
ca dvaigrāmikānāṃ ca jātīnāṃ svaranāmadheyānāṃ saptāṃśakaḥ (ṣāḍa) vā iti sarvatassaptacatvāriṃśacchatamaṃśakānāmiti
grāmadvayamucyate । loke tu yau ṣaḍjagrāme madhyamagrāma iti gītayastena tena grāmau ma nāmadheyasādṛśyamātraṃ tu tat
<q>"jātibhiḥ śrutibhiścaiva svarā grāmatvamāgatāḥ"</q> iti hyucyate । grāmo nāma viśiṣṭaśrutikasvarasamūho mūrcchanātmā
pūrṇāpūrvasvabhāvasvaragatagrahāṃśādiviśeṣamūharūpajātisamūhaśca ।</p>
<p>athocyate । tattadgrāmocitaśrutikasvaraparivārādidarśanamāttanmukhyātmakatvalaukikayorgrāmarāgayoriti
tadbhavet । yadi ṣaḍjamadhyamapradhānatā krameṇa lakṣyate śrutiviśeṣasya ca nauḍuvitatvamityalamavāntareṇa । <q>turhetau</q> ।
yato dvādaśa svarā varjyā ata eva svarā āśrīyamāṇāḥ prādhānyenāṃśakāyā yadā āśugāndhāryādiṣu bhavanti
tadā nityameva nauḍuvitā jātaya iti saṃbandhaḥ ।</p>
<p>idānīṃ vaicitryārthaṃ prayogakaraṇaniyamamāha <q>sarvasvarāṇāmiti । jātiṣviti</q> samudāyāpekṣayā
<q>sarvasvarāṇāmiti</q> ca । tathā hi kasyāṃcijjātau kasyāṃcijjācau kasyacinnāśa uktaḥ । yadyapi ca dhaivatapañcamau ṣaṅjamadhyamagrāmayoḥ
krameṇālopyau tathāpyanyagrāme lopitvamastyeva tayoriti madhyamavyatiriktāḥ sarve svarā nāśinaḥ madhyamasya tu na
kvacidvināśaḥ । anye tu dhaivatapañcamayorgrāmavibhāgena yadanāśitvaṃ <q>viśākhilācāryādibhi</q>ruktaṃ nāmumanyante munermadhyama
evāvināśī mata ityāhuḥ ।</p>
<p><q>śrīmadutpaladevāstvāhuḥ</q> । jātilakṣaṇe vakṣyamāṇe madhyamasya lopo na kvacidvakṣyate । tanmadhyamasya
nāśo na kartavya iti kiṃ pratiṣedhena । prāpterabhāvāt । sarvasvarāṇāṃ nāśa ityanenāpi na kiṃcitkṛtam । niyamasvaralopasya

<lg><l>1aatha grahāḥ ।</l>

tatrāṃśo nāma--

bhāvanna vinā kaḥ sanniveśa iti grahāpanyāsānyāsāḥ । guṇapradhānabhāvena raktirnopapadyate iti pradhānabhūtoṃ'śaśca
tadamātyakalpaśca । tatsaṃvādī paryāyāṃśo niyati.....bahutvamupayogi । tadīyaṃ taccālpāpekṣamiti
vibhāvādilopyasvaragatamalpatvamāgacchati । mūrcchanānirdeśopadiṣṭamadhyamasaptakasvaramātre caikarase prayujyamāne
rakterabhāva iti tāramandropayoga ityaṣṭakaṃ tāvadavyabhicāri । lopabhāginyāṃ tu svaralopo'pi lakṣaṇaṃ bhavati
।। 66 ।।</p>
<p>evaṃ mātraistu daśakanirṇīteṣu grahasya bhāvā saṃkhyā । lakṣaṇamāha । <q>grahāstviti । sarvajātīnāṃ</q> saṃbandhino
grahāḥ । militvā aṃśavadbhavantīti triṣaṣṭirityarthaḥ । kaścāsau grahaḥ । āha tasyaiva nāmāntaram । kathamucyate
<q>yatpravṛttaṃ bhaved geyamiti</q> । gṛhyate jātiprayogo yata iti grahaḥ । tenāṃśasyaiva dharmāntarayogānnāmāntaram। tadāha
<q>grahavikalpita iti</q> । grahadharmeṇa etadvidhatayā kalpitena dvisvabhāvīkṛtaḥ । na tvata eva prādhānyād grahatvaṃ
lapsyate । tatsāmarthyasiddho grahaḥ । kiṃ svakaṇṭhenoktamityāśaṅkyaitadevāha <q>grahavikalpitaḥ</q> । aṃśo'pi hi
kadācid graho na bhavati । nandayantyāmiva pañcamaḥ । tasyā hi graho gāndhāraḥ । tadgrahasya pṛthagabhidhānaṃ kartavyameva।
na tu naikamudāharaṇamityatra nyāyaḥ । śakyaṃ na grāmarāgādāvaṃśavyatiriktasyāpi grahatvābhyanujñānaṃ bhūyastaralakṣya
ekaṃ pṛthaggrahalakṣaṇe prayojanam । tathā hi mālavakaiśikena yadrūpakaṃ gīyate na tatsarvaṃ niyamena ṣaḍgrahaḥ । evamanyadapi
vācyam ।। 67 ।।</p>
<p>aṃśamāha <q>yasminbhavati rāgaśceti</q> । yasmin vidyamāne rāgo raktirjāti svarūpaṃ ca bhavati śirasīva
puruṣasvarūpam । evaṃ yamāśritya sthitaḥ svaraḥ prakarṣeṇa vartate । <q>yasmāditi</q> lyablope pañcamī । etaduktaṃ bhavati ।
yasya saṃvādī vānuvādī vā prādhānyaṃ prati vādyate mandrīva grāmaviṣaye । tata eva vināpyaṃśatvamaṃśaḥ saṃvādyanuvādinoreva।
nanu jātirvivāditaḥ । tadarthameva tārāvadhimavekṣya ca vakṣyamāṇapañcamādityādinā tāramandrasthitiḥ । yaśca

<lg><l>[ anekasvarasaṃyoge yo'tyarthamupalabhyate</l>
<l>anyaśca balino yasya saṃvādī cānuvādyapi ]</l></lg>
<lg><l>1grahāpanyāsavinyāsasaṃnyāsanyāsagocaraḥ ।</l>

pañcasvaraparā tāragatiryathā--
<lg><l>aṃśāttāragatiṃ vidyādā caturthasvarādiha ।</l>
<l>ā pañcamātpañcamādvā nātaḥ paramiheṣyate ।। 70 ।।</l></lg>
<!-- COMMENTARY page 045 !-->
samasta ( pa )dye svarasvarāpekṣayā bāhulyena bhāti । yaśca svayameva svasaṃvādyanuvādirūpaṃ vā grahādipañcakarūpaṃ vā
karoti na tu kadācidvivādinam । grahādayo gocaro niyantavyo viṣayo yasya sa tathā ।। yaścānyā (na) pi svarān
svaparāṅmukhavacchādanenānurañjayannivartate। soṃ'śaḥ pradhānabhāgavatvā<q>ddaśalakṣaṇa iti</q> sarva ete dharmā mīlitāḥ
santo aṃśatve prayojakāḥ । ata evādilakṣaṇamaṃśalakṣaṇātpṛthagevoktam ।। 68--69 ।।</p>
<p>atha tāramāha । <q>pañcasvarāparā tāragatiriti</q> । nanu yadyaṃśasvarādārohakrameṇa tāvadārohaṇīyaṃ
yāvattattatpañcamasaṃkhyasya svaro na tu tatparamiti niyamaḥ । (etanna) tadā mahān lakṣyavirodhaḥ । ṣaḍjyāṃ hi
ṣaḍjāṃśe pañcamasvarāttamevārohaṇīyaṃ syāt । dṛśyate ca lakṣye ṣaḍjyāṃ.....nna dhādhā-- nisanidhapānidhapā iti।
ārṣabhyāṃ ca dhaivatāntaḥ syāt । dṛśyate ca niṣādāntaṃ na dharinimagama iti । niṣādavatyāṃ ca pañcamāntamārohaṇa
dṛśyate pāpārigā iti। evamanyatrāpi vicāryam । tasmānnāyaṃ vyākhyāprakāraḥ । kiṃ tarhi । śrūyatām । iha madhyamasaptakena
tāvanmūrcchanādaṃśaḥ kārya ityukterevalabdham । tatsaptarakaniviṣṭāḥ svarāḥ sarva eva prayojyā iti ।
saptakāntaragatasvaraprayogeṣu kiyad dṛṣṭādṛṣṭābhyudayadāpi bhavatīti tāramandratāmanādṛtya śirasyaurasyasvaraniṣṭhaiva
sā iha nirūpyate ।</p>
<p>nanu madhyamasaptake sthite sati tatpṛṣṭhe tārasaptakaniviṣṭāḥ kiṃ sarve svarāḥ prayojyāḥ । sarvatra teneti
nirūpyate । tatra yadā ṣaḍajoṃ'śo bhavati tadā tārasaptaka (kaṃ) <q>rimaga</q> (<q>pa</q>) ityetatparyantaṃ grāhyaṃ yadi śaktirasti ।
na tu tataḥ paraṃ śaktiyoge'pi । ūnagrahaṇe tu na doṣa iti paraśabdena darśitaḥ । ṛṣabheṃ'śe punardhaivatāntāḥ svarāstārasaptarṣabhaṃ
grāhyā bhavanti । gāndhāre tvaṃśe niṣādāntāḥ sapta । madhyamapañcamadhaivataniṣādeṣu niṣādāntā eva te grāhyā iti
pañcasvaṃśeṣu samasta ekastārasaptakaḥ saṃgṛhīto bhavati । madhyamaḥ punaryadi śaktiḥ catussvaraparanārohaṇam ।

<lg><l>* (lopyasvaro'pi gaṇyaḥ syādbudhaistāravidhau punaḥ)</l>

nandayantyāṃ tu parāvadhika eva tāraniṣṭho bhaviṣyati <q>"tāragatyā tu ṣaḍjo'pi kadācinnātivartate"</q>
etacca tatraiva vyākhyāyate। tena <q>ā catussvarāditi</q> । yadanyairnandayantīviṣayaṃ vyākhyātaṃ na tathā । atraivārthe
kārikā <q>aṃśāttāragatiṃ vidyāditi। iheti</q>। madhyamasaptake mūrcchanākāriṇī sthite sati aṃśasvaramavalambya
tāragatiṃ tārasaptakagatasvaraparyantaṃ vā ārohaḥ sarvatra sa kartavyo na tataḥ para ityanenocyate । <q>taiḥ ihe</q>tyaṃśagrahaṇaṃ
<q>netā ca tāramandraṇāmiti</q> pūrvoktamaṃśalakṣaṇaṃ (ca) na paryālocitaṃ (na) śiṣyasya [ṛṣabhagāndhārayoḥ]
dhaivataniṣādāvaprayojyau tayo raktyabhāve svaratānupapatteḥ śaktyabhāvaṃ tvaprayoktari ityasadetat।</p>
<p>yattvanyairvyākhyātam। aṃśasvareṇa saha tāvattārasaptagatāḥ pañca catvāro vā svarāḥ kāryāḥ । yathā ṣaḍjeṃ'śe
sarigamapa ṛṣabhe rigamapadha gāndhāre gamapadhani madhyame evaṃ pañcamadhaivataniṣādeṣu । eta eveti tallakṣyeṇa (sthāpyate)
tathā hi । niṣādavatyāṃ niṣādeṃ ('śe) tāraṣaḍjo dṛśyata evāṃśena sādhanena iti । alaṃ bahunā uktaiva ca vyākhyā
lakṣaṇasaṃgrāhiṇītyādaraṇīyam ।</p>
<p><q>nātaḥ paramiti</q> । tāragate ūnatve kāmacāramāha । <q>iheti</q> । jātiṣu grāmarāgādau nāyaṃ niyama iti
vibhāvaḥ। <q>budhairiti</q> । lopyamiti svaraṃ ye buddhyante tairapūrṇatve'pi lopyasvaravidho gaṇanīya ityāha । tathā ca
<q>viśākhilācāryaḥ। nāśisvarastāravidhau saṃkhyāyate iti</q> । tārayati plāvayati vegena vācamiti tāraḥ ।। 70 ।।</p>

atha nyāsa ekaviṃśatisaṃkhyaḥ । aṅgasamāptau nyāsaḥ । tadvadapanyāso hyaṅgamadhye

nyāso'ṅgasamāptau sa caikaviṃśatisaṃkhyastathā । (16 akṣarāṇi

<!-- COMMENTARY page 047 !-->
nyāsasvarāt yaḥ parastāt parā.....tyarthaḥ । paragrahaṇaṃ tataḥ ūnasya hyanujñā vā kāmacāramāha । nanvevaṃ ṣāḍjyāṃ
dhaivatasya mandrasya kathaṃ prayogaḥ kathaṃ na yāvatā ṣaḍjāntaṃ tatra mandrasaptakena pūrṇena vitasya kāmacārāttu dhaivatānto
mandraprayogaḥ । yo hi tadgrahanyāsarūpaṣaḍjenāsau mandrasaptakāt api tu madhyagatā madhyagatādeva sā...mandro niyamāt
ityatra hi tāranivṛttiparaṃ vacanaṃ na hi ṣāḍjyāṃ yatra ṣaḍjaḥ sthānatraye śrūyate iti । tatraiva kārikāṃ paṭhanti ।
<q>mandrastvaṃśātparo nāstīti</q> । tathā hi niṣādavatyāṃ niṣāda eva mandro nāsau dṛśyate aṃśagrahasvarasya madhyagatatvanyāse
tu sati dvau mandrau nyāsa eva tatpare vā । atraivodāharaṇaṃ tadvyavasthitaviṣayā lakṣyeti niyamamāha gāndhāralakṣaṇe
nyāsaparatvādeva mandratvaṃ siddham । tatkiṃ punarvacanena । asti ca yadvakṣyate । <q>laṅghanaṃ hyṛṣabhasyāpi tacca mandragataṃ
smṛtam</q> । iti । tad jñāpayati vyavasthitaviṣayo'yaṃ vikalpa iti । nanu vacanameva munirjñāpakatvenopanyasyatīti
kimetadagāndharvacanamevedaṃ pūrvaṃ siddhamityadoṣaḥ । turavadhāreṇa avasthitāvevetyarthaḥ ।। 71 ।।</p>
<p>atha nyāsasaṃkhyayā lakṣaṇena cāha । <q>nyāsa ekaviṃśatisaṃkhya iti</q> । ṣaḍjamadhyamāyāṃ dve kaiśikyāstrayaḥ
śiṣṭānāṃ ṣoḍaśeti । asyāṃ jātiśarīrasamāptau kartavyatāyāṃ vā svaraḥ sanyāsaḥ ( ni ) tarhi asyate prayoge
yeneti ( nyāsaḥ ) ।</p>
<p>apanyāsamāha । <q>tadvaditi</q> samāptau tarhi nyāsāt ko'sya viśeṣaḥ । āha । <q>aṅgamadhya iti</q> । avāntara--
samāptavityarthaḥ । tathā ca <q>dattilācāryaḥ । vidārī madhyagastathā iti</q> । tatra ṣaḍjagrāme ṣaḍjamadhyamāyāḥ
saptāpanyāsāḥ । ṣaḍjodīcyavāyāṃ dvau pañcānāṃ pratyekaṃ traya iti caturviṃśatiḥ । śeṣāstu madhyamagrāme ।
etadevāpanyāsasvarūpaṃ vitānavṛttenānuṣṭubbhedenāha । yathā--</p>
<lg><l>nyāso'ṅgasamāptau sa caikaviṃśatisaṃkhyastathā ।</l>
<l>ṣaṭpañcāśatsaṃkhyopanyāso'ṅgamadhye bhavet ।। iti ।। 72 ।।</l></lg>
<p>athānuddiṣṭamapyaṃśalakṣaṇāpekṣitaṃ prasaṅgāllakṣayati <q>saṃnsāsavinyāsāvapyaṃśamadhya eveti</q>। vidārīmadhya
ityarthaḥ । athāniyatayoḥ kā saṃkhyetyāha । <q>anitayatvācca bahutvamiti</q> । nyāsāpanyāsāṃśavattayoḥ

<p>evamasaṃnyāsyaiva prakrāntarūpaṃ saṃnyāsavinyāsadvayaṃ lakṣayitvā aṃśakaprastāve prakṛtamalpatvaṃ vibhāgadvāreṇa

ṛṣabhasya laṅghanīyatvaṃ yuktaṃ na cāsya saṃvādino lopo yuktaḥ । na caivamityaṣāḍavā saṃvādyauḍuvitasyāpatteḥ (laṅghanā)
nabhyāsayorviṣayaṃ vibhajati । <q>tatra ṣāḍavauḍuvitava kārāṇāmiti</q> । lopyasvarapūrṇāvasthā yā yadā prayujyate tadā

dvividamalpatvaṃ, tatra alpatvaṃ caiva hrasvatvaṃ tathā pūrvaviniścayāt । jātisvaraistu nityaṃ syājjātyalpatvaṃ dvividhaitat ।।

1a.N: karmākhyā 1. <q>na</q>. niṣādaḥ pañcamastathā ।। andhyrāścāṃśā grahā jātyāścatvāraḥ parikīrtitāḥ ।। 2. <q>na</q>. niṣādarṣabha।
3.<q>ja</q>. ṣaḍjāyāḥ ṣaḍjagāndhārau madhyamaḥ pañcamastathā ।। dhaivataścāpi vijñeyā grahāścāṃśāśca kīrtitāḥ । (<q>pa</q>. vijñeyā ityatra
vidvadbhiḥ ) 4. <q>na</q>. varjitarṣabhayogāstu kaiśikyaṃśāḥ ṣaḍeva tu । svarāḥ sarve ca vijñeyāḥ ṣaḍjamadhyāṃśajā grahāḥ
4a. N: kaiśikyārṣabhahīnā ca. 5. <q>ja</q>. sarva । 6. <q>bha</q>. evaṃ । 7. <q>na</q>. grahā aṃśāśca jātiṣu । 8. <q>na</q>. sapta vā caiva
vijñeyā । N: lakṣaṇāntaravijñeyā <q>śa</q>. lakṣaṇaṃ sa tu vijñeyo vardhamānasvaro budhaiḥ

। tena lālitā atra svarabhāge jātyaṃśakāstā(na)pahāsya āsāritāṃśaṃ nigadā(da) stuti sa(sā)midhyasu(dhenīṣu)

<p>atha niṣādavatī । <q>niṣādinyāmiti</q> । nigarṣabhā aṃśā apanyāsāśca । ninyā(rnyā)saḥ । ṣāḍavādi
dhaivatīva । pañcamenaiva lope ṣāḍavam । sapalope'nyat । sapau ca laṅghanīyāvavarohiṇāvanaṃśāvavalambila (babahulā)
viti । aṃśā daśakāḥ śuddhāstrayastrayo vikṛtāḥ pūrṇāḥ ṣāḍavā auḍuvaśca ।। 102--103 ।।</p>
<p>atha <q>ṣaḍjakaiśikyā iti</q> । sagapa(pā) aṃśāḥ । apanyāsāstu sapani(nayaḥ)। nyāso ga(gaḥ)। nityapūrṇā
ceyam । madhyamarṣabhayordaurbalyamaṃśatvātsiddhaṃ punarādhikyārthaṃ jñāpayati । nidhayoratra kiñcidādhikyamiti । asyāḥ
śuddhatvaṃ nāstīti traya evāṃśakāḥ pūrṇāḥ ।। 104--105 ।।</p>
<p>atha <q>ṣaḍjodīcyavā</q> । <q>ṣaḍjaścetyādi</q> । samanidhā aṃśāḥ । dhasa(sā) a(va)panyāsā(sau)।
ma(mo)nyāsaḥ । aṃśānāmanyonyasaṅgatiḥ । rilope ṣāḍavaḥ (m)। ṛpalopa auḍavam । ṛṣabhaḥ saṃvādī dhaivatasya
ṣaḍjagrāme na lupyamāne yataḥ । sarigā balinaḥ ।
<!-- APPARATUS page 056 !-->
1a. (N). sagāndhārarṣabhaḥ smṛtaḥ 1 <q>na</q>. gāndhāraścarṣabhastathā ।। eta eva hyupanyāsāḥ ṣaḍjamadhyamapañcamāḥ ।। niṣādaśca bhavennyāso
hīnasvaryaṃ ca neṣyate । daurbalyaṃ cātra kartavyaṃ dhaivatarṣabhayostathā ।।
1b. V.102 (G.O.S.): V. 77(N). But (N) reads vs. 71--76, not read in (G.O.S.). They read as:
pañcāṃśā tu bhavetṣāḍjī niṣādarṣabhavarjitā । apanyāso bhavedatra gāndhāraḥ pañcamastathā ।। 71 ।।
nyāsaścātra bhavet lopyaḥ saptama eva ca । gāndhārasya ca bāhulyaṃ tvatra kāryaṃ prayokttṛbhiḥ ।। 72 ।।
ārṣabhābhyāṃ bhavatyaṃśo dhaivatārṣabhasaptamāḥ । eta eva hyapanyāsā nyāsaścāpyṛṣabhaḥ smṛtaḥ ।। 73 ।।
dhaivatyāṃ dhaivatatraṣabhā vaṃśo nyāsaścadhaivataḥ । apanyāsā bhavantyatra dhaivatārṣabhamadhyamāḥ ।। 74 ।।
ṣaḍjapañcamahīnāṃ ca rañcasvaryaṃ pravakṣyate । pañcameva vinā caiva ṣāḍavaṃ parikīrtitam ।। 75 ।।
aṃśāśca ṣaḍjakaiśikyāḥ..................। niṣādo ṛṣabhaścaiva balī gāndhāra eva ca ।। 76 ।।
2. <q>na</q>. eta eva hyapanyāsāḥ saniṣādāḥ prakīrtitāḥ ।। gāndhāro'tra bhavennyāso durbalau dhaivatarṣabhau ।। hīnasvarasyābhāvāttu
sampūrṇā ceyamiṣyate ।। 3. <q>na</q>. bhavanti ṣaḍjodīcyavyā nyāso madhyama iṣyate ।। apanyāsāviha syātāṃ dhaivatarṣabha eva ca ।।
parasparāṃśānugamo gāndhāro'numato bhavet ।। pañcamarṣabhahīnaṃ tu pañcasvaryaṃ vidhīyate ।। ṛṣabhaḥ ṣāḍave hīno laṅghanaṃ ca tayorbhavet ।।

<!-- COMMENTARY page 057 !-->
anya(ṣaḍja)syāṃśatvāt siddhaṃ balitvaṃ punarādhikyārthamuktam । ṛṣabhasyātyalpatvaṃ prāptaṃ pratiṣeddhuṃ gāndhārasya
mandrasthāne bāhulyam । asyā ekādaśāṃśakāḥ । pūrṇāścatvāraḥ । ṣāḍavāstrayaḥ । dhaivatāṃśe tadapyapavādāt ।
auḍuvitāścatvāraḥ । śuddhastu nāsti । tatra kaiśike pūrvaṃ nirvacanamuktam । tadyogājjātiḥ kaiśikī । udīcyavanyā
(vāyāṃ) tvāhuḥ । udīcyāḥ prayoktāro bāhulyena santyasyāmityudīcyā । vānti gacchantīti । udīcye'pi ca

mālavī kāmbhojītyādi ।। 106--109 ।।</p>

<p>apanyāsaḥ a(so maḥ) । pa aṃ(poṃ')śaḥ sopyapanyāsaḥ paścāduktaḥ । ṣaḍjena ṣāḍavam।
lopyatvāllaṅghyatvaṃ siddham । punarvacanādalpataratvamapīti mantavyam । <q>nāndhrīsañcaraṇami</q>ti । gāndhāryārṣabhībhyāmāndhrī
pañcamyārṣabhīgāndhārībhirnandayantīti saṃsargajaprakaraṇe nirūpaṇaṃ <q>jātivayasyakāraṇatulyatvādāndhrīvat saṃgatiḥ
prāpte</q>ti vacanena nipīḍyate । etaccāraktātulyajātikāraṇikānāṃ jātīnāṃ saṅgatiratulyaiva kartavyeti sūcayati ।
<q>ṛṣabhasya laṅghanaṃ mandragata</q>syeti dharmisvarūpaṃ dharma upacarita i(mi)ti । mandragataṃ laṅghanamityuktam । <q>tāragatyā
ṣaḍjo nātivartate</q> nātiśayyate ।.....gatyā ṣaḍjo nātivartate nātiśayyate । tata ūrdhvakaṃ na śirasyasaptakasvarāḥ
praṣṭavyā ityarthaḥ । <q>anye</q> tvācakṣate । ṣaḍjeva (ḍja eva) kadācinnātivartate nārohaṃ bhajate tāraṃ na kiñcit
praṣṭavyamityarthaḥ । <q>kadāciditi</q> । vaikalpiko'yaṃ tāra ityarthaḥ । asyāmekaḥ pūrṇāṃśa ekaḥ ṣāḍava iti dvau
।। 132--134 ।।</p>
<p>atha <q>kārmāravī</q> । <q>kārmāravyā iti</q> । ṛpadhani(nayoṃ) aṃśā('śā) apanyāsāśca । panyāsatā ।

<p><q>upādhyāyā</q>stvāhuḥ । evambhūtastāvadādhāradheyabhāvo lakṣye na lakṣyate । na ca tasya vaicitryakāritvaṃ

<p>nanu śāntarase na kenacidaṃśakena gānumuktam । vismaraṇaśīlo'si । smaryase(te) । uktaṃ hi । <q>na
śāntarasapradhānatā prayogasya bhavati । sato'pi hi rasāntaroparakta eva prayogayogyo nānyatheti</q> ।
evaṃ viniyogajātyaṃśakānabhidhāyādhunā vaktavyāntaraṃ vaktumupakramate ।
<q>ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi varṇālaṅkāralakṣaṇam । iti</q> ।</p>

<pb n="079"/>

<lg><l>1ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi 2varṇālaṅkāralakṣaṇam ।</l>
<l>3ārohī cāvarohī ca 4sthāyisañcāriṇau tathā ।</l>
<l>varṇāścatvāra evaite 5hyalaṅkārāstadāśrayāḥ ।। 14 ।।</l></lg>
<!-- COMMENTARY page 079 !-->
<p>nanu varṇāderjātiśarīrānupraveśājjātilakṣaṇa eva nirūpaṇaṃ yuktaṃ dṛśyate । labdhātmalābhasya hi viniyogo
yuktaḥ । daśalakṣaṇādapi vā pūrvaṃ viniyogo vaktavyaḥ । viniyuktasya lakṣaṇamityapi dṛśyate । pṛṣṭhe tu
tadabhidhānamayuktamiva । ucyate । jātirnāma svarasamūhamātram । padasambandhādhīnastu vastuvarṇavyavahāraḥ ।
tadāyattāścālaṅkārāḥ । na cārthaviśeṣābhidhāyinā padena sambandho viniyogamantareṇa bhavati ।</p>
<p>nanvevaṃ nyāsāpanyāsāvapi tatrāvācyau । tayorhi samastavidyāsamāptiḥ । asāvavāntaravidārī samāptiśca
sthānam । vidārī cāvāntarapadasamūhavicchedarūpā । yadyevamatsa(lpa)tvamidumucyate । grahāṃśādayo'pi padāpekṣā
eva । tarhi gīyamānapadābhāve kaścidapi svataḥ svaropayogo'sti gāne gāndharve vā । <q>samavāye gāndharvamiti
viśākhilācāryaḥ</q> । tasmāt padasambandhaḥ sarvatra prayojakaḥ । kiṃ tu varṇo nāma padasambandhamantareṇa lakṣayitumeva
na śakyate । tathāhi vakṣyate । <q>padaṃ lakṣaṇasaṃyuktamiti</q> (<q>bha. nā</q>. 29. 18)। grahādayaḥ svarārambhabāhulyatarā vā
hīnatvasamāptilakṣaṇāḥ । tathā ca padanirapekṣe'pyantarālāpādāvapi bhavatyeva taurvinā jātyaṃśakā rāgasvarūpameva
na kiñcidunmūlayanti । alaṅkārastu paramārthataḥ padagrāmyaivālaṅkāryatvādaṃśakayogāddhi gīyamāna eva sampadyate ।
arthayogādiva sārthakaṃ vṛttabandhayogādiva ca śravyaṃ prasannādiprabhṛtyalaṅkārasambandhātu tadeva gṛhyatamamityalaṅkṛtaṃ
sampadyate । upamānaprasādikāyogādivālaṅkārāṇāṃ ca ( jīvabhāvaḥ prasannādibhāve) nāśrayo varṇa iti
padādhīnasvabhāvattvādeṣāṃ viniyogānantarameva yuktamabhidhānam ।</p>
<p><q>ṭīkākārāstvāhuḥ</q> । āśrayasvarasvarūpeṇa jātīnāṃ gāna upayogo na tu raktisampādakatvena । tattu
grāmarāgāṇāmeva । te'<q>pyanyaire</q>voktā iti na mayocyata(nta) iti । maṇḍapo dīpayogī vāstu..........vadityatrārthe
jñāpakamidam । vākyānāṃ paścādabhidhānam । etacca pūrvameva vicāritamityāstām । etacca (vaṃ ca) kriyāvistāravācī
varṇaśabdaḥ । tathābhinayakriyā ekasvaramātrāvasthānena vā ārohaṇena vā avarohaṇena vā vyāmiśratayā vā sampadyata
iti catvāra eva varṇāḥ । (tadadhikā) na bhavanti । tadāha । <q>ārohī</q> cetyādi <q>alaṅkārā</q>--
<!-- APPARATUS page 079 !-->
1.N: <q>ra</q>. artha varṇāḥ 2. <q>bha</q>. varṇānāmapi 3. <q>ma</q>. atha varṇāḥ । ārohī........ 4. N: <q>ja</q>. sthāyī sañcāryathāpi
ca । <q>bha</q>. sthāyisañcāriṇaḥ 5. <q>ḍa</q>. alaṅkārāḥ ।

<!-- COMMENTARY page 080 !-->

svaraviśeṣān <q>sragdharāyāṃ</q> gāyāmītyabhisandhāya gāyan prayoktā'laṅkārān prayuṅkte tāvat । svarālaṅkāreṣu yat

<p>nanu vā (cā)rthasyaiva hi tatra prādhānyam । varṇe vā(cā)laṅkārabalena prakalpyamānārthapratītivighaṭite-
'pyatīteṣvakṣareṣvanusandhānamasambhāvi । yataḥ śrotṝṇāṃ varṇe <q>prakarṣaṇāditi</q> ca dhruvatvaṃ varṇasyālaṅkāryatāmāha । na ca
varṇāravena (khyena) syādityucyate । tasya sakalapadaviśrāntasya gānakriyāsampatyai prastutarūpasyetthaṃ śobhāḥ
kṛtā bhavanti । yadyekaśa uktapūrvaṃ vaicitryamabhidhīyate yathā prastutasya vadanasya candropamānena । ata eva
<q>gītiralaṅkārahīnā</q> (<q>bha. nā</q>. 29-45) ityatra vyatirekadvāreṇa gīterevālaṅkāryatā lakṣyate । gīrvarṇa iti ca
paryāyau ।</p>
<p>atra codayanti । <q>catvāro</q>(<q>rastu</q>)<q>ga</q> (<q>gu</q>)<q>ṇāyugma</q>(<q>bha. nā</q>. 31. 106)ityādinā tālakalāviṣaye
padamātrāparimāṇaniyamasya lakṣyamāṇatvān <q>nimeṣāḥ pañca mātrā syāt</q> (<q>bha. nā</q>. 31.4) iti kalāparimāṇasya
kathamabhivarṇaprakarṣaṇaṃ śakyam ।</p>
<p><q>atrāhuḥ</q> । vardhamānāsāritaviṣayo'yaṃ padamātrāpariṇāmaniyamo na pragītikādau tanniyamābhāvāt ।
ata eva <q>saptarūpagatā</q> ityuktam । tatra yatheṣṭaṃ varṇaprakarṣaṇamiti lakṣye'pi ca jātigītādau yatheṣṭaṃ
prakarṣaṇamupalabdhameva ।</p>

<lg><l>laṅghayitvā parān mandrāt parāttāragatiṃ gataḥ ।</l></lg>
iti ।। 41 ।।</p>
<p>etadalaṅkāradvayenāndolanāt ta (sa) nnivṛttapravṛttasya lakṣaṇamūhituṃ śakyata ityāśayena tadullaṅghya <q>prasādaṃ</q>
lakṣayati । <q>prasannāntaḥ svaro prasādaḥ sa tviti</q> । ādau svarasya bhartsanarodhanadīpanavedana--
kampanavalanalayananayanasphuraṇadharmi maraṇādi yathāyogaṃ vidhāyānte dīptāyatādisvaraśrutiviśeṣa eva viśrānteḥ
prasādā<q>dapāṅgaṃ</q> lakṣayati ।
<lg><l>apāṅgikastu vijñeyaḥ svarāṇāmatha sañcarāt ।</l></lg>
iti । yathā'pāṅganirīkṣaṇamanyairna lakṣyate tadvad yadbhramaṇavaicitryeṇa duravadhārasvarūpaḥ so'<q>pāṅgikaḥ ।</q>
tathāvidhaprayoge'ntarbhāve yadā viśrāntivibhramabhayādantaravīkṣitaṃ laukika iti prasādāpāṅgābhyāṃ samaṃ janita
<!-- APPARATUS page 090 !-->
1. <q>ra</q>.-- kaṇṭhasthirastasmān mandratāraḥ । 2. <q>ra</q>. śīrṣe tārataraḥ smṛtaḥ 3. ḍa. <q>bha</q>. ja. caturthaḥ pañcamo'pi vā
4. ra. tathā <q>ḍa</q>. tu saḥ 5. <q>ḍa</q>. kramāt । 6. <q>bha</q>. jñeyo hyārohaṇād budhaiḥ

<pb n="091"/>

<lg><l>recitaḥ śirasi jñeyaḥ kampitaṃ tu (taśca) kalātrayam ।</l>
<l>kaṇṭhe nirūddhapavanaḥ kuharo nāma jāyate ।। 43 ।।</l></lg>
<!-- COMMENTARY page 091 !-->
iti pṛthag lakṣitaḥ ।। 42 ।।</p>
<p>evamuddiṣṭā lakṣitā alaṅkārā ūhasiddhaye । tatra dīptāyatādi mandratāradikaṃ vā
kampādisthānabhedanirodhanatodanādiḥ kāladīrghatvāduddiṣṭadharme alaṅkārāśritaṃ ttviyaditi tatra dīptādyuktamanyatu
pradarśayitumāha ।
<lg><l>recitaḥ śirasiḥ jñeyaḥ kampitaśca kalātrayam ।</l>
<l>kaṇṭhe niruddhapavanaḥ kuharo nāma jāyate ।</l></lg>
iti । tataścāti (ścatri) śrutereva <q>kampita</q>micchataḥ (ntaḥ) <q>kalātrayami</q>ti śrutitrayaṃ vyācakṣate । <q>anye</q> tu catuḥśrutereva
śrutitraye kampanaṃ kāryamityāhuḥ । <q>itare</q> tu sarvasvaraviṣayaṃ kampanamicchanti । kalātra na śrutiḥ । api tu
kālakalā । tatra tritvopādānaṃ paraprakarṣasūcanāya sāmarthyācca । urasi kampanāt kampito lakṣyata ityāha । (<q>kaṇṭhe
niruddhapavana</q> iti ।) ete ca śarīre prādhānyena lakṣyante । dhātuvādyaṃ tu vīṇāyāmityāśayena bhedenābhidhānam ।
vastutavastūbhayatrāpi sarvaṃ tasya yojanamiti lakṣaṇaṃ nipuṇamatīnāṃ mata itya.......mayaṃ <q>bharata</q>granthe tu sa<q>ñjāta</q> eveti
mantavyam । <q>ṭīkākṛdbhi</q>stu <q>sadāśivamatādi</q>granthāntarālikhitaṃ <q>trayastriṃśadime proktā alaṅkārā</q> ityādi tanna
likhitam । granthāntaraparivartane aniṣṭaprasaṅgāt । <q>śrīvāyu</q>proktādi tu
<q>svagurumatanāradamatā</q> (<q>nāradīyaśikṣā</q>)<q>rjunamatādiṣu śrīsaṃhitā</q>.......nyonyadarśanāt kiyallikhanīyam । na cāpi
kiñcit । tena (na) kiñcit prayojanam । <q>varṇebhyaḥ sarveṣu siddhiriti</q> hyuktaṃ prāk । ye tu lakṣye dṛśyante tallakṣma
paṭhamānam (paṭhyate) ।</p>
<lg><l>avarohārohakṛto veṇuḥ pañcakalaḥ kramāt ।</l></lg>
yathā--nidhadhani risasaripasaninisā ।
<lg><l>ekasvare'dhirohāt prastāro'nyathā prasādastu ।</l></lg>
yathā--sagārigāgamapamadhapanigamā --<q>prastāraḥ</q> ।
<p>sadhānidhāpasāpadhāmarigasā --<q>prasādaḥ</q> ।
<lg><l>samanantarasvarau dvau (vicara)tyudvāhitastathā dvikalaḥ ।</l>
<l>ārohatyekakalo'sau ।।</l></lg>

<pb n="092"/>

<lg><l>1evamete tvalaṅkārā vijñeyā varṇasaṃśrayāḥ ।</l>
<l>atha gītīḥ pravakṣyāmi chando'kṣarasamanvitāḥ ।। 44 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>śaśinā rahiteva niśā vijaleva nadī latā vipuṣpeva ।</l>
<l>avibhūṣiteva ca strī gītiralaṅkārahīnā syāt ।। 45 ।।</l></lg>
<!-- COMMENTARY page 092 !-->
<q>vidhūta</q>stu ekasmin laghuvarṇe svaracā (dva) yamilitā (te) laghuparimāṇaṃ prayujyate । tatra ca dvayoḥ svarayoḥ
śīghrakāloccāraṇena sakalaṃ padaṃ prayujyate । punastaduparitanāt svaradvaye । evamevānye । kālakalāvidhūtaḥ
svararūpavidhūnanāt ।
<lg><l>dīrghākṣaramārohe tadanantarasvaraṃ kalāntarayoḥ ।</l>
<l>kampau prasannarūpau (jñeyaḥ) punargātravarṇo'yam ।।</l></lg>
sasarisāsasasasaṃsāri--ityevaṃ dīrghamakṣaraṃ parvagataṃ prayuñjīta । iti <q>gātravarṇaḥ</q> ।। 43 ।।</p>
<p>evamalaṅkārā vyākhyātāḥ । atha tānupasaṃharan yatra teṣāmupayogastāṃ <q>gītiṃ</q> sūcayati । <q>evamete</q> iti ।
<q>atha gītīri</q>ti ca । <q>varṇasaṃśrayā</q> iti ca varṇānukrāntyā gītīnāmantareṇaite'laṅkārāḥ pratipada(daṃ) janmanāṃ (nā)
na vaktuṃ śakyā iti bhāvaḥ । gītiśabdena svarāṇāṃ padānāṃ ca yaḥ parasparamāśrayāśrayibhāvāḥ sā pṛthag gītiḥ । nanu
gītirvarṇarūpaiveti punaḥ kasmādabhidhānamityāśaṅkyāha । <q>chando'kṣarasamanvitā</q> iti । padāśrayā gītirvarṇa
ityuktam । padaṃ ca pravṛttaniruddhacchandomayaṃ gadyarūpaṃ cākṣarātmakam । tatra yathā samyag ga(gī) tayo bhavantīti
gītīnāṃ (lakṣaṇaṃ) tathā vakṣyāmīti yāvat ।। 44 ।।</p>
<p>atālaṅkārāṇāmupayogamāha ।
<lg><l>śaśinā rahiteva niśā vijaleva nadī latā vipuṣpeva ।</l>
<l>avibhūṣiteva ca strī gītiralaṅkārahīnā syāt ।।</l></lg>
iti । kaścidalaṅkāro varṇamujjvalayati kaścit sūtrayati kaścit sa(su) vikāsayati kaścid rañjayatīti
dṛṣṭāntacatuṣkeṇa sūcitā (tam) ।। 45 ।।</p>
<!-- APPARATUS page 092 !-->
1. trayastriṃśadime proktā alaṅkārā--<q>abhinavabhāratī</q> 29. 43 alaṅkārāstrayastriṃśadevamete mayoditāḥ ।। ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi
gītīnāmapi lakṣaṇam ।। (chowkhamba. ed. 29. 76 cf. bṛhaddeśī of mataṅga 170 ab for ab)

<pb n="093"/>

<lg><l>prathamā māgadhī jñeyā dvitīyā cārdhamāgadhī ।</l>
<l>sambhāvitā tṛtīyā tu caturthī pṛthulā smṛtā ।। 46 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>trinivṛtta (tti) pragītā yā gītiḥ sā māgadhī smṛtā ।</l>
<l>ardhataḥ sannivṛttā ca vijñeyā hyardhamāgadhī ।। 47 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>sambhāvitā ca vijñeyā gurvakṣarasamanvitā ।</l>
<l>pṛthulākhyā ca vijñeyā nityaṃ laghvakṣarānvitā ।। 48 ।।</l></lg>
<!-- COMMENTARY page 093 !-->
<p>gītīruddiśati <q>prathamā māgadhī</q>tyādinā । tatra yatikālavibhāgena varṇālaṅkāraniyamena layagānakriyāviśeṣo
gītiriti sāmānyalakṣaṇam ।। 46 ।।</p>
<p>tatrāsāṃ krameṇa viśeṣaṇalakṣaṇānyāha । <q>sanni</q> (<q>trini</q>)<q>vṛttipragītā yā gītiḥ sā māgadhīti । yā</q>
padānāṃ <q>nivṛtti</q>rāvṛttistayā <q>prakṛṣṭaṃ</q> vitataṃ gītaṃ gānakriyā yasyāṃ sā gītiḥ । viśeṣasāmānyabhāvena
patti(vṛtti)padārtho'sya ca vibhāgaḥ । etaduktam । devamiti padaṃ gītvā prathamakalāṃ nirvāhya vilambitena layena
yadā dvitīyāṃ kalāṃ madhyamalayena devamiti (tye)tena padena śarvamiti śabdasahitena gāyati tato'pi tṛtīyāṃ kalāṃ
drutalayena devaṃ śarvamiti padadvayena ca vande śarvamiti padāntarasahitena nirvāhayati tata eva deva ityayaṃ śabdaḥ
kalātrayavyāpanāt <q>trinivṛtti</q>nirvāha eva । evaṃ śarvamityādayo'pyuttarottarakalāvyāpinastadā <q>māgadhī</q>tī <q>gītiḥ</q> ।
magadheṣu tathā gānanirvāhopalambhāt । yadāha । <q>vidarbhādiṣu dṛṣṭatvāt samākhyā</q> iti । udāharaṇam । māsāsasasā
māsaṃ samaṃ sasama samasarirīti । <q>ardhata</q> iti । parasya sambandhyardhapadādyadāvartastadā'<q>rdhamāgadhīti</q> । na cātra
pādārdhapravṛttau nivartanaheturmantavyaḥ । yataḥ <q>sāmavede</q> gītapradhāne āvṛttiṣvardho nādriyate । evamādi tu <q>jātavedasami</q>ti ।
(<q>sāmavedasaṃhitā</q> 1.1.3.11) hi atra jāśabdaparyantamāvṛttiparyantaparamparayā gītvā <q>tavedasamiti</q> gīyate ।
tatra <q>jātavedasamiti</q> padasya ṣaḍjanādārdhabhaṅgo bhavatyapi । <q>anye</q> tu <q>trinivṛttipravṛtteti</q> māgadhyā lakṣaṇaṃ
paṭhanto'rdhamāgadhyāḥ sapadāvṛttiṃ vyācakṣāṇā ardhabhañjanamapi pariharanti ।। 47 ।।</p>
<p>evaṃ nivṛttikṛtau dvau gītibhedāvabhidhāya nivṛttihīnamapi gītidvayaṃ lakṣayitumāha ।
<lg><l>sambhāvitā ca vijñeyā gurvakṣarasamanvitā ।</l>
<l>pṛthulākhyā ca vijñeyā nityaṃ laghvakṣarānvitā ।।</l></lg>
iti ca । <q>nitya</q>śabda ābhīkṣṇyavācī । ubhayatrāpi sambandhanīyastena bāhulyato yatra gurūṇi ।

<pb n="094"/>

<lg><l>etāstu gītayo jñeyā dhruvāyogaṃ vinaiva hi ।</l>
<l>gāndharva eva yojyāstu nityaṃ gānaprayoktṛbhiḥ ।। 49 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>1gītayo gāditāḥ samyag dhātūṃścaiva nibodhata ।</l>
<l>vistāraḥ karaṇaśca 2syādāviddho vyañjanastathā ।</l>
<l>catvāro dhātavo jñeyā vāditrakaraṇāśrayāḥ ।। 50 ।।</l></lg>
<!-- COMMENTARY page 094 !-->
sambhāvitaṃ saṅkṣiptaṃ padānāṃ bhāvānāṃ yatreti । laghuprāyatve tu pṛthulā । bhūyastvāt padagrāmasya ।। 48 ।।
<lg><l>nanu kutra kā gītiḥ prayojyetyāśaṅkyāha ।</l>
<l>etāstu gītayo jñeyā dhruvāyogaṃ vinaiva hi ।।</l></lg>
iti । dhruvāśrayo yogastadvarja<q>metā gītayo gāndharva eva prayojyā</q> na tu gāna iti tātparyam । māgadhyardhamāgadhyau
sāmanāmadhruvāstu (su) prayojitau (te) । sambhāvitāpṛthule.....tenāpasāritvenaitaddhuvāsu hi karuṇaraudrādima--
(rasā) nusāreṇa gurulaghvakṣaraviniyogo gītiṣu yatheṣṭameveti viśeṣaḥ । ata eva <q>viniyogavarjami</q> (<q>bha. nā.</q>
29--49) tyuktam । hiryasmāt । gītaya eva gaditā na tvāsāṃ viṣayaviśeṣa uktaḥ ।। 49 ।।</p>
<p>asya gītyaṃśe bhedamāha । ya<q>danyairla</q>kṣaṇaṃ gītīnāmuktaṃ tan mahyaṃ na rucitamiti । tathā hi । ya<q>danyai</q>rlakṣitāḥ ।
<lg><l>dvigururdvinivṛttā ca citre gītistu māgadhī ।</l>
<l>laghuplutagatā caiva tadardhe cārdhamāgadhī । (bṛhaddeśī --mataṅga 177)</l></lg>
sambhāvitā (pṛthulā ca) yathākramaṃ catasṛbhirdvādaśabhiśca mātrābhiḥ prayogāditi । ardhamāgadhirdvi (dhī dvi)
kalacatuṣkalayogayostviti । etacca lakṣaṇa (viruddhaṃ na)sphuṭameva vyāpnuyāt । nānyathaitadanusāreṇānyatrāpi yojanā
tathāpi mārgopayuktaṃ bhavati tadgītivaiciñyamiti । yasmāttvāsāṃ mārgabhedābhidhānaṃ tasmādyuttkaṃ <q>samyagi</q>ti ।</p>
<p>evamalaḍkāraprasaḍgena <q>gītaya</q> uttkāḥ । alaṅkārānantaraṃ ca dāravyā kṛtā udiṣṭālaṅkārā sandhātavyā iti
dhātubhyaśca dāravyā vā lakṣyamāṇaśobhātiśaye anyo (nye) vaiciñyopajīvanena śārīryāmapyalaṅkārāḥ śakyayojanā
ityabhiprāyeṇāha । <q>dhātūṃścaiva</q> nibodhateti । cakāreṇālaṅkāratvamapyeteṣāṃ samuccinoti । <q>eva</q>kāreṇa catuṣpraharaṇaṃ
<!-- APPARATUS page 094 !-->
1. ra. ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi dhātuvādyasya lakṣaṇam 2. ḍa. eva āviddho

<pb n="095"/>

<lg><l>1saṅghātajo'tha (jaśca) samavāyajaśca vistārajo'nubandhakṛtaḥ2 ।</l>
<l>jñeyaścatuṣprakāro dhāturvistārasaṃjñaśca3 ।। 51 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>vidhayastu (śca) smṛtāstasya pūrvaṃ vistāra eva ca4 ।</l>
<l>saṅghātasamavāyau tu 5vijñeyau tau dvikatrikau ।। 52 ।।</l></lg>
<!-- COMMENTARY page 095 !-->
tripraharaṇamaṅgulīnāṃ vibhāgo dvai vṛttī samalekhā citralekhetyādikaṃ <q>viśākhilācārya</q>proktaṃ sarvathaiva
dhruvāgānajñānavaikalyopayogān <q>mayā</q> noktamiti sūcayati । dadhatyadṛṣṭaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ raktiṃ ca taranti dhārayanti ca
vīṇāvādyasvarūpamiti <q>dhātavaḥ</q> । prahāraviśeṣajanyāḥ svarāḥ । tatsamudāyo'pi janyaṃśakalpamāno dhātuḥ । tatro--
ddeśamāha । <q>vistāra</q> ityādi । vādyate'neneti <q>vāditra</q>maṅgulīkoṇādi । tasya yat <q>karaṇaṃ</q> prayatnam (tnaḥ)। ta<q>dāśrayāḥ</q>
prahāraviśeṣajanyā iti yāvat । aṃśena sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ dhātūnāmuktam ।। 50 ।।</p>
<p>tatra hi vistāradhātoścaturdaśavidhatvaṃ nirūpayiṣyate । bhedāntargatabhedacatuṣṭayaṃ tāvadavatārayan
sādharmyanibandhanamuddiśati । <q>saṅghātajā</q> (<q>ja</q>)<q>śceti</q> ।। 51 ।।</p>
<p>tatra vistārajo nāma bhedo ya uktastasya bhedāntarabhāvena mitavaktavyatayā prathamaṃ viśeṣalakṣaṇamāha ।
<lg><l>vidhayaśca smṛtāstasya pūrvaṃ vistāra eva ca ।</l></lg>
iti । cakāraḥ svavṛttitva<q>meva</q>kāro'nvarthatāṃ sūcayati ।</p>
<p>tadayamarthaḥ । <q>vistāro</q> nāma yo vistāra eva । vistīrṇatvamevāsya lakṣaṇamityarthaḥ । etaduktaṃ bhavati ।
aneko'pi svaraprakāraṇo yathā pṛthaganupalakṣyamāṇavibhāgo viśrāntasthānabhūtaparyantikasvarasvarūpaṃ
(pamekī) kurvannantarībhavañcitravacanāntareṇaiva vinirbhāsamānasūtatva (svaratva)vikīrṇastathāsau । anyatra sa evaṃ
vistāra uktaḥ । <q>tasya</q> ca ye <q>vidhayo</q> bhedāsteṣu pūrvamuktā alaṅkāranirūpaṇāvasare vicitraprakārāḥ sandarśitā iti
yāvat ।</p>
<p><q>anye</q> tu manyante pūrvamuktāḥ svarāsta eva । teṣāṃ <q>vidhayo</q> bhedāḥ svarāntaropayogādekavistāravācyā
iti । <q>dvikatrikāviti</q> ।। 52 ।।</p>
<!-- APPARATUS page 095 !-->
1. <q>ḍa</q>. saṅghātajaśca । bha. saṅghātaḥ samavāyo vistāraścānubandhasaṃjñātaḥ । 2. <q>ḍa</q>. --jaśca 3. <q>ḍa</q>. tu 4. <q>ḍa</q>. vistara eva tu
5. <q>ra</q>. jñeyau syātāṃ dvikatrikau

<lg><l>pūrvaścaturvidhastatra paścimo'ṣṭavidhaḥ smṛtaḥ ।</l>

<p>(saṅghātajastūttarabhedadvayena) caturdhā । anyastrikaḥ so'ṣṭadhā । tadā vā pūrvaṃ <q>caturvidha</q> iti dvikatrikau
dve tulye । kiṃ kṛto vottarabheda ityāha ।

<p><q>yugapatkṛta</q> iti । pratikṛtasamakālaḥ prayoga evānyatvena prakāraḥ <q>pratibhedaḥ</q> । sa ca gurulaghukṛto na tu
lekhyādisvaraprayogapratibhedanakṛta iti tena gānavaicitrī । yadā laghudvayaṃ prayuṅkte tadā sa guruḥ । yadā vaiṇiko
gurudvayaṃ tadā sa plutalaghurūpa ityādirūpe tu bhañjanamuktam । iyati viparyaya iti viśeṣaḥ । tadeva punarvaicitryaṃ
vaipañciko yadaikasyāmeva tantryāmaṃśasaṃvādinyāṃ sālpatādi karoti tadā (<q>pratiśuṣkā ।</q>) <q>pratiśuṣka</q>padasyaiṣā'vasthe--
<q>tyanye</q> ।। 115 ।।</p>
<p>yadā tu vaiṇiko kṣaṇe vidārīvaśācchedaṃ karoti tadā chidre vaipañciko yadā ta<q>drūpaśeṣam</q> । vibhaktitala (ya)
evamapi vaicitrikaprayoge hastacāturyādo (ryato)'tidruto vaipañcikaprayogaḥ sa <q>oghaḥ</q> । evaṃ vipañcīdhruvāsvapi
vaktavyam । niyamo'dṛṣṭasiddhaya eva । gāndharve vipañcayevoparañjikā dhruvāgāne tvaniyamaḥ ।। 116 ।।</p>
<p>vipañcīvādyasya prādhānyamāha । <q>kāryaṃ dhruvāvidhāne prāyeṇa hi koṇavādanamiti । kecidāhuḥ</q> ।
<!-- APPARATUS page 123 !-->
1. N: ṣaṣṭhī vai praṃtiśuṣkāni jñeyāṃ yasyāḥ karaṇajātāni 1a. <q>ma</q>. karaṇe 2. <q>ra</q>. tantryaikakṛtā caiva pratiśuṣkā nāma
3. <q>ca</q>. pratiśuklā । <q>ma</q>. pratiśulkā 4. <q>ca</q>. yogāt

<lg><l>2[taccaughatulyakaraṇaṃ vācyaṃ kāryaṃ vipañcyāstu ।]</l>

(<q>taccaughatulyaka</q>)<q>raṇami</q>ti । <q>vādyavṛttivibhāgārthami</q> (<q>bha.nā</q>. 5--19) tyādinā kathitasya prayojanasya
dvayorvīṇayoruttarādharasthityā sarvā eva vīṇā koṇavādyena vādayediti । tadidaṃ na vidmaḥ koṇavādye kā sthāna--
prāptiḥ । <q>koṇavādye(dyā)vipañcī syādi</q>ti ca vakṣyamāṇatvāt kathaṃ sarvāsāṃ koṇavādyateti । tasmādevametā iha
dhruvāvidhāne vādyoparañjanadhruvāgānamityucyate (nte) । tatrālpena bāhulyena vā koṇavādanaṃ kartavyam । <q>prāyo</q>grahaṇād
dvyaṅgulivādanamubhayavādanaṃ ca । vādye hi triprakārake savyāṅguṣṭhakanīyasyoḥ sthāne vādakaṃ bhavediti koṇo'tra
prahārama(ro')ṅgulyaguṣṭhapraharaṇatayā catuṣpraharaṇaṃ koṇāṅgulipraharaṇaṃ dhruvāsu vādyaṃ kuryāt । yadā tu karaṇaṃ tu līnaṃ
bhavati tatra līnānāmalaṅkārāṇāṃ koṇavādanena samyak sthānaprāptiḥ । mardanamodanadhāraṇakampanāvartanādi koṇasya
bhavatīti niyatiḥ । tathābhūta<q>sthānaprāptyarthaṃ</q> vīṇāvādyaṃ tadā yatrocitamekatantryādiprāntaṃ tatrāyameva <q>niyamaḥ</q>
koṇaikavādyaprayoga iti ।। 117 ।।</p>

tatraivordhvarūpatayā''dheyarūpatayā'vasthite svare satītyarthaḥ । etaduktaṃ bhavati । prathamamabhyāsakāle śūtkārapūraṇatayā
svarotpattikramo ya uktastatraiva sthite sati svarāntarasyātra balanam । <q>yathā</q> vacanādatra vipañcyāmiva śrutikramalābhaḥ
prasphuṭaḥ । <q>ṣaḍjaṃ vadanti(ti) mayūrā</q>(ra) (<q>nāradīyaśikṣā</q> 1.5.3) ityādivat svagamakamadhyamavacchārīravadeva
vā viśiṣṭadhvanisvabhāvatvāt । ata eva śārīravadvaṃśyānāmārohaṇamavarohaṇaṃ ceti <q>viśākhilācāryaḥ</q> ।</p>
<p>nanu yadyevaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ syādvaṃśasya pṛthagabhidhānaṃ śārīre('pyevameva syāttatra svaraiḥ) anyavidhiḥ (dheḥ)
svīkṛtatvādityāśaṅkyāprakaratve(ṅkya prakāratve) nāha । <q>tatroparī</q>ti । śārīraviṣayādapyasyoparibhāva
uttīrṇatvādanantarbhāva iti yāvat । yathā ca vādyarūpatayā'tra lālityaṃ nāma svābhāviko dharmo na sa tva (nu)ṣaktaḥ
śārīrake bhāvābhāvamārdavapāruṣyayogāt । tathā hi vadanti । vaṃśe gītamiti । tataḥ śārīrato'pyasyotkarṣo

vyāpārayogāt । śārīre tu gāyatyeveti vyavahāraḥ । āntarasyaivātra prayatnasya bhāvāt । vaṃśacchidrapūraṇaprayatno hi
bāhye'sambhavī । vīṇāyāṃ tu vādayatyeveti bāhyasyaiva tantrīhananakāriṇaḥ prayatnasya bhāvāt ।
ityubhayavilakṣaṇamubhayadharmānugataṃ ca vaṃśasya rūpamityavaśyaṃ vaktavyamiti tātparyam ।। 3 ।।</p>

sādhāraṇakleśābhāven nirvighnam । <q>varṇālaḍkāraḥ</q> sarva eva . . . . . śārīrāntargataiḥ saṃyuktam । ata eva sarvān
vādyāvidhīn tattvānugatān layayatiprabhṛtīnarhatīti <q>vidhivat</q> । evaṃ tāvadgītibhāgo'nena pūryata ityuktvā hṛdyatamaṃ
tvetadevetyāha ।
<lg><l>lalitaṃ madhuraṃ snigdhaṃ veṇorevāśritaṃ(vaṃ smṛtaṃ) vādyam ।</l></lg>
iti । <q>lalitami</q>ti । svabhāvato harṣoddīpanena rasacarvaṇopayogi । <q>madhurami</q>ti । gātraprayuktaṃ paruṣamapi svaraṃ
svāvasthāpanayā hṛdyatāmāpādayatīti । <q>veṇori</q>ti suṣiropalakṣaṇam ।। 11 ।।</p>
<p>adhyāyatrayārthamupasaṃharan bhāvinā saha saṅgatiṃ karoti । <q>evametat svarakṛ(ga)tami</q>ti ।

bhamātṛkāyāṃ vīṇādhyāya (29) bhāga ava vaṃśādhyāyaḥ (30) । tasyāṃ mātṛkāyāmayaṃ saptaviṃśatvena paṭhitaḥ । 7a. N:. iti

<lg><l>yasyāṃ kalākālalayā (ya)prabhāvāt</l>

<p>nanu svarakṛtaṃ rūpaṃ vīṇāṃśayorivāvanaddhe'pyupalabhyate taddha(dvad gha) ne'pi । nādātmanā svarasya śabdatvena
nityavyāpyatvāt । ataścaivaṃ tadā'vanaddhe mārjanānāṃ svaraviśeṣayojanātmanā vakṣyamāṇatvāt । satyam । anuhāreṇa
paraṃ svarāṇāmavabhāso'tra na sphuṭo nākṣarātmanā । tathātve hi rasabhāvādyabhivyaktirapi na bhavet । tena hyanuhāramātreṇa
kevalamatra svarātmakā(katā)'kṣaraṣoḍaśavat । akṣarāṇāṃ hi yadyapi sphuṭatvaṃ syāt <q>karana(ja)--
karatatakaratha(ṭa)gatakarikaraṭakataṭakaṭakābharaṇakelikāla</q> iti śrūyamāṇānāṃ ca yathā vādyapratipattirbhavati tathā
vādyamānādapi syāt । tasmādanuhāramā(syā) tmavṛttitvādanyatra svarāṇāṃ vaṃśanirūpaṇānantaramevopasaṃhāro yuktaḥ ।
tadupasaṃhārānantaraṃ coktam । <q>ghanātodyavikalpanaṃ vakṣyāmī</q>ti (<q>bha. nā.</q> a. 30--12) । tatra hanyata iti ghanaḥ
kaṭhinataikarūpaḥ । tata eva namanonama (nma)nan(na)mai(śai) thilyādiyogābhā(vā)dakṣaravaicitryaṃ svaravaicitryaṃ
cānurudhyamānamātreṇopayogī kāṃsyatālikādirucyate । <q>mūrto ghana</q> iti mūrtikāṭhinyamiti yuktam । tasya ghanasya
yadātodyaṃ todanaṃ hananaṃ tasya vidhivaccarataḥ śīghratvasamatvādirūpaṃ yadvikalpanaṃ vibhāgastatra
cañcatpuṭādigatadrutalaghugurupravibhāga eva nimitta iti sa eva <q>cātodyavikalpana</q>śabdenokto'<q>trādhyāye</q> vakṣyamāṇatayā
prakrāntaḥ । tasya saṅgatiṃ kartumāha ।

1a. N: triṃśo'dhyāyaḥ 1. N: <q>ḍa</q>. tālo ghana iti proktaḥ 2. <q>ḍa</q>. kāla । <q>ḍha</q>. mātrā 3. <q>ḍa</q>. layānvitaḥ 4. <q>ḍa</q>.

<lg><l>vādyaṃ tu yad ghanaṃ proktaṃ kalāpātalayānvitam ।</l>
<l>kālastasya pramāṇaṃ hi vijñeyaṃ tālayogataḥ ।।</l></lg>
iti । atra kriyā ca tālaḥ <q>kālo</q> vā । tāla ityākṣipya gāndharvanāṭyabhedena yo viṣayavibhāgaḥ kṛtaḥ sa tuccha
i<q>tyasmabhyaṃ</q> na rocate । idamatra । na <q>kālaḥ</q> kriyāvyatirekaḥ api tu sarveṣāṃ paricchedahetuḥ kāla ityucyate ।
paricchedaśca kriyaiva । kriyaiva kriyāntarasya kālābhyupagame'pi vā kālāvacchinnena kālaṃ dravyamiti । tadabhāvena
cāpi kriyāvicchittiḥ । tena ghaneneti kimatra nibandhe(ndhane)na । sarvathā'bhāve ha(gā)ne gāndharve vā kriyayā
vinā paricchedo na sambhavatyeva । etāvāṃstu viśeṣo'tra saṅgacchate yadgāndharve kutracit paricchedye paricchedavidheyasya
sāmye'pyākuñcanādyanyatamā kācideva kriyā kasmiṃścidevāṅgulyādipraveśe vartamānā paricchedahetutvenāśrīyate
tathaivādṛṣṭasiddhe gāne tatparicchedamātrasya sāmyādāyātaṃ taddvāreṇa sampādanasyoda (tta)ranidānasya sādhyatvād yā
kācit kriyā gānavādanasaṃvādinī paricchedaheturupādīyata iti । tata evāha । <q>talapratiṣṭhākaraṇa</q> iti ।
apratibhāparicchedādrāgālapanagatyādikriyāvacchedabhāvenārabhyo'pavarga ivābhineyo'nyonyaṃ ca viśīrṇaviśvarūpatayā
ekaparicchedātmakasāmyādāśā (kāṅkṣā) bhāve śāstrasya pratiṣṭhānaviśeṣeṇa yat pratiṣṭhānasampādanaṃ tatra hetuḥ
kriyākhaṇḍastāla iti tātparyam । tatra ca ghanātodyamati (ri)cyata iti । <q>yad ghanaṃ</q> nāma <q>vādya</q>mātodyaṃ

<q>prokta</q>muddiṣṭaṃ
tasya tālena bhāvinā śamyādisaśabdāvāpaniḥśabdakriyāviśeṣaṇayogena sati yastālaḥ paricchityātmakakālakhaṇḍe
kriyārūpo dravyātmā sa eva gītakriyāpramāṇaparicchedopāyaḥ । etaduktaṃ bhavati । kāṃsyanālikānuraṇakriyāyāḥ
prasiddhāyā āvāpaśamyādīnāṃ sāmye tadetadāvāpādiparicchinnaṃ gītaṃ geyamiti na tatrāvāpādayaḥ satparicche--
dakāḥ । kiṃ cāsya tālayogenetyāśaṅkyāha । kṛtābhiprāye saviśeṣamāha । <q>kalāpāteti । kalā</q>''todyā''tmanā
na viṣayatayā । <q>kālaḥ</q> paricchidyate āvāpādikriyayā sā <q>kalā</q> । pātyate śabdaśravaṇādiko (to)'paratra
cāḍḍitādiṣvāgamagocarīkriyate sa kālaviśeṣo yena śamyādipāte........। līṅ śleṣaṇe (<q>pā. dhā</q>. 1139)
ityasya laya iti rūpam । tena svaro varṇo'nyo vā yasyāpāditastatraiva yā līnatā viśrāntiḥ tatsampādane'pyante'pi
tadanu rasānurūpavaikṛtadhvanisambhavāsambhavakṛtaḥ sa <q>layaḥ</q> । yathāha । aśaktyā pādanyāsaṃ vidhāya madhye viśrāmyatīti
vilambitaṃ gacchatītyucyate । evaṃ ca kārya (śabda)muccārya tadanuraṇane tāvantameva kālaṃ viśramya yastu śabdamuccārayati
sa vilambitaṃ vaktītyucyate । yastu tadvarṇakālaṃ viśramya sa samalayena vaktīti । yastu
varṇamuccāryānuraṇe (ṇane)'viśramyaiva varṇāntaroccāraṇaṃ karoti sa drutalayeneti । ata eva drutāyāṃ vṛttau yatra na ca

<pb n="152"/>

<lg><l>yā (sā) laukikī kalā kāṣṭhā nimeṣaśca smṛtā 1 budhaiḥ ।</l>
<l>na sā tālakalā jñeyā hyanyaiṣāṃ2 tālagāḥ(gā) kalāḥ3(lā) ।। 2 ।।</l></lg>
<!-- COMMENTARY page 152 !-->
tālikāstatra madhyamāyāṃ dvādaśa vilambitāyāṃ ṣoḍaśeti pādāntādhikatvaṃ jānīyāditi । vṛttānāmaśeṣaṃ tu tattvavedī
<q>bhagavāne</q>vāha <q>bhāṣye</q> । drutamadhyavilambiteṣu tatra sarvatra tatparam । mārna(na)bhedeṣu <q>adhyāyānte</q> ca prakarṣātiśayena
vakṣyate । <q>sa tu madhyalayaṃ prāpya sannipātadvayam</q> । (<q>bha. nā</q>. a. 31. 367) iti । etadapi tatpārśve vakṣyāma
ityāstāṃ tāvat ।</p>
<p>tadevameteṣu <q>kalāpātalayeṣu anvita</q>manuyātītyupayogī । tato gānavādyasya tālena yoga ityāśayaḥ ।
teṣāṃ tathāpi pratiṣṭhārūpatvāttālavyapadeśaḥ । ata eva tālayogo'bhivyaṅgyaḥ । <q>tale bhavastāla</q> ityapi niruktamuktam ।
yena pradhānenaiva । etaduktaṃ bhavati । yathā pūrvaraṅgādāvadṛṣṭasiddhayai saṃyatagītakavardhamānādi prayujyate । yo gāyako
yatīnāmā (vā) pavikṣepaprayogaṃ karoti । nartakavādakādayastadavalokanaṃ vinā tatparimāṇasamaṃ ca layaṃ
kathañciccarati (nti) । prayogasya sāmyaṃ na syāt । saśabde'pi pāte karaśabdasya tathā sphuṭamākarṇanaṃ na bhavati
yathā ghanaśabdasya । ekalayavidhau niranupātayoge'pi dvikalacatuṣkalavidhau tu kalādyavahitapātayoge paricche--
dakārī । patadūrjata iti sarvaparicchedo ghanā....uktaṃ <q>prayogasāmyopayogīti</q> ca । anena ca gītakādinānā
(gāna)pravṛttādanya eva kālaparicchedakārī kāṃsyatālaghaṭa iti dharmi (dhvani)tam । dhruvāgāne tu dṛṣṭaphale gāyanasyeva
so'stu vyāpāraḥ । āvāpādīnāṃ tatrānupayogāt । gītakādau gānāt kāṃsyatālikā kvacidupayujyate ।
dakṣiṇapātādayaścoṭikā yā hastatalābhighātena vā sampannatvānnopayujyante । kaniṣṭhāṅguliniyamitaṃ gītena cāvāpādeḥ
samyak sampādanaṃ taddhastenāśakyameva । vādyanṛttagītādiprayogānubhāve'nugāmidṛṣṭaphalasiddhau gītake gāyakaiśca
yathā na pramāṇatayāvāpina eva(penaiva)prayogasiddhiḥ । tatra ghanāpekṣayāyutaiva । <q>viśākhilācāryādayo</q>'syānuvṛtti--
tālasāmyaṃ susampādamityāśayena kutrāpi pṛthageva tālakalānāṃ vicchede laye vā'vadhānavattāmātrakriyāyā
āvāpādikriyayā ca sampādanayā prāṇībhūtasya gātuḥ prasādaparīkṣaṇaprayojanaṃ kāṃsyatālaṃ manyante । ityalaṃ bahunā ।
ata eva tadviśeṣaṃ tadavadhānaikasāratvaṃ kriyāntarāvadhānavyagratvāt sūcayati । <q>hi</q> yasmādarthaḥ । yasmādevamupayogi
ghanātodyaṃ tasmāt tadvikalpanaṃ vakṣyāmīti yuktamuktam ।। 1 ।।</p>

<q>kāṣṭhā</q> parā saukṣmyasamā sā <q>kalā</q> । sā ca kiyatetyāha । <q>nimeṣa</q> iti । sa eva hi loke'tisūkṣmaḥ kālaḥ । <q>na</q> ca
