<p>śāstrīyā (a)syā na nimeṣā (a) tiprasiddhā nimeṣaṣaṭkāṣṭakadaśakaṃ kaleti vā syādityā--
śaṅkyāha । <q>nimeṣāḥ pañca</q> iti । gītakālasya paricchedakālāntaraṃ pramāṇaṃ <q>pañca nimeṣā</q> hnasvākṣarapañcakaṃ yāvat ।
kakhagaghaṅa iti vyañjanakāsya pṛthagavabhāsa iti pratipādanāt kalāviśeṣatvamevetyāśayena tadantarvartitvāt
punaḥ punaḥ (narla)kṣaṇamiti ।। 4 ।।</p>
<p><q>kalāpātalayānvita</q> i(mi)tyatra (<q>bha. nā</q>. a. 31.1) yo <q>layaśabdaḥ</q> sa vyākhyeya ityāśayena kalāyā
eva ca layaṃ vinā na svarūpalābho <q>laya eva hi tāla</q> (<q>bha. nā</q>. 31. 370) ityagre vakṣyāmītyabhiprāyeṇāha ।
tataḥ <q>kalākāle</q>ti । <q>tato</q> vistīrṇaḥ <q>kalānāṃ kālakṛto</q> vilambitādikābhedasampādakaḥ so'bhisaṃjñitaḥ ।
tato viśrāntyā saṃjñāsamajñānaṃ rūḍhigato'rtho layānāṃ madhyaviśrāntiḥ । tadavasthameva virāmamiti yāvat । atha
layānāṃ vibhāgamāha । <q>trayo layā</q> iti । na ca viśeṣalakṣaṇameṣāṃ vaktavyamityāha । <q>vijñeyā</q> iti । lokata eva ।
vibhāgaścānirvyākhyāta eva । agrato lakṣaṇaṃ tālasāmānyalakṣaṇaprasaṅge vitatya bhaviṣyati । iha tu
<q>kalāpātalayānvita</q> iti sūtrārthodbhedakamātrametadityapaunaruktyamātram ।। 5 ।।</p>

<p>layāntareṇa kalāpātaprayogārhāttatra viśeṣābhidhāne prāthamyāddra/?/talayaprasaṅgādidamāha । <q>yatastatra</q> (<q>yastatra
tu</q>) <q>layo madhyaḥ</q> । tatpramāṇakālamiteṣu layeṣu madhye sthāteti । loka evaṃ prasiddhirityarthaḥ । <q>tālayogata</q> (<q>bha.
nā. a.</q> 31.1.) ityatra yastāla uktaḥ sa ceha kalābhyo'nyastathā tadyoge sati kalādiṣu cānvitaṃ ghanamiti
kālaṃ <q>vadati</q> । athānyaḥ śabdastālaśabdenādhikaṃ kiñcidityuktamityāśaṅkyāha । <q>kalākālapramāṇena tāla</q>

<p>tamāha । <q>ñyaśraṃ sarvaguruṃ kṛtvā</q> । pakṣadvaye cācapuṭasyaikaṃ......gurubhūtaṃ kṛtvetyarthaḥ । yadyapyekakalocito
niṣkrāmastathāpyatra yathākṣare'pi taṃ kuryāditi tuśabdasyārthaḥ । <q>yojayedi</q>ti । <q>niṣkrāmaṃ</q> yadyapi na svamārgoktaṃ
tathāpi prakarṣākṣepa eva prathamamārge citra evokto yathā hi tathā nirvapayedityarthaḥ । prastāra <q>uddhaṭṭa</q>strigurubharādvāyamakṣaraughaḥ ।
ataśca gurutrayātmanā vādyopabheda iti ।। 22 ।।</p>
<p>uddhaṭṭasaṃjñasya vyudasya <q>yugmamojaśceti kalāḥ</q> pañceti cāsya ślokadvayasya <q>kecida</q>rthamāhuḥ ।

manojñaṃ <q>tadvidām</q> । tathāhi । pañcānāmiti saṃjñākaraṇe prayojanaṃ na kiñcit । āvartinyo hi saṃjñāḥ । na cānayā

cābhidhānaṃ na samarthitameva । uktaṃ ca <q>na hyeṣāmupayoga</q> iti । na kvacit prayojanamasya syāt । tasmādanayoḥ

na ca tālasāmānyalakṣaṇa(ṇaṃ) saṅgṛhītaṃ viśiṣṭopayogavastuprayogārhaṃ yathā vācakasāmānyalakṣaṇayoṭakto(yokto)pi

<p><q>na hyeṣāmupayoga</q> iti । nātraivopayoginaḥ । tallakṣaṇasyāmiśratvenaiva teṣāṃ kalpitā iti । na

viṣayādanyatrāpi cañcatpuṭādīnāmiva gītakeṣu sampiṣṭakaveṇyādīnāṃ dhruvāsu tava(tvāvā)payoḥ śamyālāghavena

prakṛtirūpatvāt pūrvabhāvītyuddhaṭṭamānatvāduddhaṭṭanaṃ vādyam ।</p>
<p>nanvevaṃ sambhāvyastryaśrabhedaḥ pūrvaṃ vācyaścaturaśrabhedastu gurucatuṣṭarūpaṃ(paḥ) paraṃ vācyami(i) ti । <q>atraike</q>
sru(bru)vate । iha pātavibhāgasyaitat prayojanam । yāvantaḥ pātāstāvantya eva kalā vādyākṣarāṇi parimāṇena
bhavantīti । tena yāvantyeva vādyākṣarāṇi cañcatpuṭagatāni cācapuṭe tāvantyeva । ato yāvantyeva gurūṇi tāvantyeva
laghūni pātāśceti ।</p>
<p>nanvevaṃ ca tryaśracaturaśravibhāgau gurulaghuplutavibhāgaśca vigalita ityucyate । layabhedakṛto hyasau । vilambite
pluto madhyame gururdrute laghuriti । cañcatpuṭe ca prādhānyamuktaṃ vakṣyate ca । tatra cetthaṃ satyapradhānatā nirvyūḍhā bhavati

sampratiṣṭhānatvāt prāthamyam । prādhānyācca dvirupādānamiti । prathamaṃ gurudvayaṃ plutasya ca cchandomadhyāprasiddhatvād
gurulāghavāmiśraṇe labhyatvā<q>llaghusvarūpami</q>ti । <q>pūrva</q>(<q>vaj</q>)<q>jñeyami</q>ti । gurudvayāntaraṃ tat । tato hi
drutalayavilambiplutā iti । te cañcatpuṭe । pāṭākṣarāṇi dhidhiṭadhisadhidhigudhiṅ । madhyalayena gurudvayaṃ karajadrutena
laghuḥ । rahadhiṅdhiṭa । laghuvilambitena plutaḥ । evaṃ cañcatpuṭe catuṣpāte tadanupapattiḥ । aṭṭabhedo'pi catuṣpāta eva

iti । eta<q>dapare</q>'lakṣa(kṣya)mityāhuḥ । darśanāntarasamunmiṣitena punarevamāhuḥ । laya eka eva cañcatpuṭasya vādyākṣarā
nnyūnādhikatayā gurulaghvādivibhāgaḥ ।</p>
<p>atra prādhānyamitthaṃ pradarśitaṃ bhavati । yadi sarvasambhavī prakārastatra sūtreṇa śāstreṇa dṛśyate । asambhavī
yadīyāneva prakāro gurulaghuplutā iti । druto nāma layapātaḥ । tasya yathākṣaramūlabhūtena mānamātreṇa pradarśanam ।
asya plutaḥ kathaṃ dharmastviti saṃsthita eva । nanu halmātrasya....(tvaṃ) na dvilaghuparimāṇatvād yathākṣare'pyasti
drutaḥ । maivam । halmātraṃ sannidhīyamānaṃ pūrvasyādho guruparimāṇaṃ darśayati ।</p>
<p>nanu svātmīyaṃ kālaṃ jñāne vāci vyajyata iti vyañjanamiti ukārākāra(rādaya) eva gurukāle
laghva(bhya)nte । ata eva bhagavat(vān) <q>bhāṣyakāra</q>statrabhagava<q>dbhartṛhari</q>prabhṛtayaḥ svarakālānatiriktāvabhāsatvaṃ
vyañjanakālasya tatra kathayantīti gurulaghuplutānāmaṃśabhavo <q>yathākṣara</q> iti śiṣṭaprākpakṣeṇa samānata....talābhagnā
laghu.....tāvanya(nto)kṣarabhedāḥ । <q>athe</q>tyānantarye । etaddhi yathākṣarārambhakamūlatayālambya taddviguṇakālatayā
layabhedādikālabhedaḥ । dve kalā(le) yatreti (<q>dvikalaḥ</q>) । tatraiva ca yathākṣaraprakāreṇa layabhedāccaturguṇabhūtena <q>catuṣkalo</q>
bhedaḥ । (na vā) dvyaṣṭaguṇādibhedatvenānavasthā kasmānna bhavatītyāśaṅkyāha । <q>trayo bhedā hi tālasya</q> । tālasya
(dviguṇād) <q>dviguṇā</q> iti ।</p>
<p>ayaṃ tāvad vākyārthaḥ । yatra yā(tā)vadanyaprakāro nāsti vilambaṃ śīghramiti hi tattadvyavahāro
loke । na ca madhyāpekṣaḥ । tatra śīghratādrutatvānugrāhakatenāpekṣyai(tāpekṣa <q>e</q>)<q>kakalaḥ</q> । madhyāpekṣo <q>dvikalaḥ</q> ।
vilambitāpekṣa<q>ścatuṣkalaḥ</q> । na cāsya layarūpasya mārgatrayātmakatvamenava । na hi laye tūttarottaradvaiguṇyam ।
tribhāgādhikatvamasya tatra darśitatvāt । mārgabhede tu dvaiguṇyameva kevalam । tatra tadbhava iti vīpsā । tadyathākṣarasyāpi
dvaiguṇyaṃ prasaktam । na ca triṣaṭprakārastu karmadhā(ra)yatvādadviguṇa iti paṭhitavyaḥ ।</p>

nāsya punarguṇyamānatvamastīti ।</p>

dhruvakādi । etasmin gurvakṣare sati gīyamānakriye kiyadviśramyatāmiti punarapi dhruvakasya mūlamātrapātra(ta)
ityāśaṅkyāha । <q>smṛta</q> iti । smaraṇaṃ <q>smṛtaṃ</q> tatrāstīti । etaduktaṃ bhavati । yathā (citrato) vārtāyāmataścaturguṇaṃ
dehītyukte sphuṭasmaraṇaṃ na bhavati । etadeva tvanyad dehīti sphuṭameva smaraṇaṃ bhavati । evaṃ niyataṃ choṭikāśabdaṃ
kṛtvaitāvadeva pātanaṃ hastasyeti sphuṭameva smaraṇaṃ bhavati । dhruvo mūlabhūta ityuccāraṇa eva triguṇam । etat saptaguṇam ।
etena pañcaguṇam । hastāṅgulyā kṛtvā nā(dā) dikaṃ kurvītetyudantamanusmaraṇaṃ bhavatīti dhruva eva mūlabhūtaḥ । tena
paramārthata eko gururdhruvo bhavati । ata evagurukāla nirantaracoṭikāpātaparamparātmā balīti kadāpi ca dhruvapāta
evocyate । akṣarānusāritvāccāta eva <q>yathākṣara</q> tvaṃ bhavati । eva(ṣa) eva ca gabhīrābhiprāyo <q>muninā gurvakṣara</q>

<p>evaṃ kalāpātasvarūpa iti nirṇīya yadarthametaduktaṃ tadyathākṣarādipūrvoddiṣṭaṃ lakṣayitumāha । <q>yathākṣarakṛtaiḥ</q>

iha tāvat paramārthatastrīṇyevāsāritāni bhavanti । tathāpyekakaladvikalacatuṣkalaprayogopapattirnāyātā । ata
evānyatālamadhye'nupraveśāntaṃ tat sambhavatītyeva tāvat tridhaivāsāritakriyā । tathā ca pūrvaraṅge bahirgītalakṣaṇe
svakaṇṭhena trayāṇāmeva nāmagrahaṇam । layāntaraṃ tu rāgaprayogavaicitryamātrasambhavam । tacca prayogavaiciñyaṃ
tātkālikaprayogāntarāpekṣayā samāśrayituṃ yuktam । anyathā dviguṇatvamakṣaralayādīnāmavaśyaṃ dhruvāpekṣayā citra
ityādinā laghvapekṣayā gurorityādinā ca nyāyena sarvamastīti sarva(rvaṃ)layāntaraṃ bhavet । tātkalikatvaprayogāntaraṃ
yadapekṣaṇīyaṃ tadvardhamānāntarbhāva eva bhavatīti tadapekṣayā yadi nāma tathāpyapratyayena vā manasaśca nānyonyavikriyamāṇena
vā vyavahārayogena bahirbhāve'pi layāntaravyavahāraḥ । arthatastu vardhamānamukhyastadvyavahāro yuktaḥ । ata eva
vardhamānamāsāritānāṃ kāraṇamiti pratīyate । tathāpi navakalāviśālācitragatārthakalā'ntyavarjaṃ dhruvakaprayogavaicitryaṃ
yadi nāntarbha(rabha)viṣyat tataḥ kaniṣṭhāsāritaṃ syāt । tadabhāve'ṣṭakalo dvitīyāprathamākaṇḍikāsāhityena ।
atrāpi trikhaṇḍatvameva gītatālayoḥ । dvādaśakalā ādyakhaṇḍe । dvitīye ṣaṭkalāḥ । tṛtīye catasraḥ kalāḥ ।
āsāṃ tālavidhimāha । <q>tālastrikalaśceti</q> (<q>bha. nā</q>. 29.91) । ādau tṛtīyasyāṃ kalāyāṃ tālam । ekasyāṃ
śamyām । dvitīyasyāṃ tālam । dvitīyasyāṃ śamyām । dvitīyasyāṃ tālam । <q>anye</q> tu <q>tālo'pi hyekakātmakaḥ
syāditi</q> paṭhanti । <q>te</q> śamyānantarameva tālamāhuḥ । tṛtīyasyāṃ tannipātam । <q>śeṣaṃ tu viprā</q> iti paripāṭyā
dvikalapādabhāgānusāreṇa yutā । <q>pitāputrakaśca ṣaṭpūrva</q> (<q>bha. nā</q>. 29.92) iti dvikala eva pañcapāṇiḥ ।
cañcatpuṭastathā dvikala eva । tena nīpratāpraśatādasatānipratisaprasatisa iti <q>kecidvyācakṣate</q> । atra kramādayaḥ
śabdāḥ mā(sā)raṇārthe vartayitavyāstāvantyaḥ yo(teṣvantimo)'sti tatra madhyaṃ ca vikalocitena pūryate । nanu
cācapuṭaca(śca)tuṣkalociteneti prāmāṇābhāvaḥ । <q>ṣaṭpitāputrako'tra dvika</q> (<q>bha. nā</q>. 29.92) iti prakaraṇaṃ

ityato'nantaraṃ <q>bhūya evamiti</q> bādhakatve <q>trikalaśca sannipāta</q> (<q>bha. nā</q>. 31. 166) ityato'nantaraṃ <q>pitāputrakaṃ
ca(kaśca)ṣaṭpūrva</q> (<q>bha. nā</q>. 29.92) iti ca na prayojanam । tathā cāsāriteṣu <q>cañcatpuṭaparivartaḥ śamyādī dve
(dvau) ca pañcapāṇiyutāviti</q> (<q>bha. nā</q>. 31. 95) vakṣyati । dvātriṃśati(t) kalāstadbhāratīye yada

<lg><l>āsāritānāṃ saṃyogo vardhamānakamucyate ।</l>
<l>utpattiṃ lakṣaṇaṃ cāsya gadato me nibodhata ।। 69 ।।</l></lg>
<!-- COMMENTARY page 190 !-->
<lg><l>ante ca sannipātaḥ syāt sarveṣāmapyayaṃ vidhiḥ ।</l></lg>
iti <q>keci</q>dardhaślokamapyatra sannipātasyautsargikamantyatvaṃ darśayituṃ paṭhanti ।। 67 ।।</p>
<p>nanu nṛttopayoge prādhānyād yaduddeśena lakṣaṇaṃ tad vardhamānasyaiva prathamalakṣaṇaṃ vācyam । athāsāritānāṃ
samūhātmakaṃ taditi । eṣāmādau vardhamānasya kathaṃ pṛthagupādānam । pūrvamakārite āsārite vardhamānahitaiva ca
citratetyāśaṅkyāha । <q>āsāritānāṃ saṃyogo vardhamānakamiti</q> । iha na pratyekamāsārite vardhamānarūpatā । na
samuditeṣu । tathāhi । trīṇyāsāritāni saptadaśa trayastriṃśat pañcaṣaṣṭiriti pañcadaśottaraṃ śatam । kalānāṃ vardhamānaṃ
tu daśaparivartakrameṇa caturviśatyuttaraṃ śatam । navāṣṭau tato navāṣṭau nava ṣoḍaśa dvātriṃśat ṣoḍaśāṣṭau naveti । yathā
(dā)parivartavihīnakaṇḍikāmātragaṇanaṃ tadā yadyapi pañcaṣaṣṭikalā tvādyeṣvā(ādyāsvā)sāritarūpatā sambhāvyate
tathāpi navāṣṭau ṣoḍaśa dvātriṃśadityevambhūtasya vicchedasyātrābhāvāt ta eva rūpatāyāḥ pātāḥ kevalajyeṣṭhā-
sārite । abhagnapadakalpyamānarūpaviśeṣe vaicitryāśrayabhāvanyāyena khaṇḍikāśrayatvād vardhamānāśrayatvaṃ syāt ।
nanvevamāsāritānāṃ kimādau lakṣaṇenetyāśaṅkyāha । samyag vicitreṇa prayoge<q>ṇāyogaḥ</q> parasparaṅgatiḥ । tatpramāṇaṃ
<q>vardhamānam</q> । tathāhi kaniṣṭhe gīyamāne kaṇḍikādvayaṃ saṃyuktaṃ bhāti । tasminneva kalā......nānyā khaṇḍikā ।
madhyame ca trayam । jyeṣṭhe catuṣṭayam । evaṃ parivartadaśakhaṇḍikāsammitiryā''sāriteṣu bhāti
<q>gaganatalabhrāmyadabhra</q>(<q>bhrāṃ</q>)<q>śakasaṃstyānasiṃhavyāghrādivaicitryanyāyena</q> tato'dbhutattvādāsāritānāmādau lakṣaṇaṃ
kṛtam । vardhamānasya ca pṛthageva vaktavyam । tatra nṛttāśrayatvenāsya <q>bhagavadupajñameva</q> pravṛttiriti pūrvamutpattirvācyeti
darśayati । utpattiṃ <q>lakṣaṇaṃ cāsye</q>ti । <q>tatrotpattistāva</q> (dā)dau navamiti tāṇḍava
(prayogo)......<q>'smābhistāṇḍavādhyāye</q> (<q>bha.nā</q>.a.4)darśita ityarthaḥ ।। 69 ।।</p>

<p>nanvevamāsāritānāṃ dvaividhyamādhārādheyabhāvena <q>vardhamānami</q>tyāśaṅkyāha । yasmin vardhamānarūpatve
yatpramāṇaprakṣepo'ntarbhāvaḥ kaṇḍikāṅgakalāśamyāvibhāgaśca tena yato vinirmitamidaṃ dvaividhyaṃ tato vardhamānasyaiva
catūrūpam । na hi vardhamānarūpatvānāsādane pañcaṣaṣṭikale jyeṣṭhe āsāritāntaramādhīyate । tasya

<lg><l>dvitīyāṃ kaṇḍikāṃ kṛtvā prathamā sakalā yadi ।</l>

<!-- COMMENTARY page 195 !-->
natvahi(tvādimā) bhirakalā hi kāryā । <q>prathamā</q>(<q>māṃ</q>)<q>kha</q>(<q>ka</q>)<q>ṇḍikānāṃ</q>(<q>kāṃ</q>)<q>kṛtve</q>ti buddhau
gṛhītvā''śrayatvenālambya । kasyetyāha । <q>bāle</q>ti । kaniṣṭhāsārite yastāla uktaścañcatpuṭa (:) pañcapāṇirvetyevaṃrūpāṃ
ce (cai)vaṃrūpaḥ । dhruvakāni mārgacatuṣkadaśāvā(bālā)dyānyavasthābhirvyava(pa)deśaḥ । tataśca bāle tāle dhruvakatālaḥ ।
evaṃ citramārgagā na ca kalā pratikaladrutamātreṇa dvābhyāṃ pātābhyāṃ yojyaṃ śabdakālatvaṃ yathā hi bāladaśāyāṃ
<q>kaniṣṭhakama</q>bhūt । tadvad vardhamānāntarbhāve । <q>evami</q>ti । imā dhruvakamārgāśrayalakṣaṇāvasthāṃ (sthā) prā (hnā)saṃ
kuryāt । tatrāntimāṃ kalāṃ citrameva <q>kecidāhuḥ । anye</q> mārgabhedamasahamānā na śamyā adhe(rdhe)sannipāto'rthā(rdhā)ntare
ca pātasyānuktatvādarthaḥ(rdhaḥ)syādityāha(huḥ)। evāta (ata eva)evamita(eva)mityācakṣate । ata eva tat
kaniṣṭhāsārita(te)yaccitramabhūt tadasyāṃ daśāyāmartha(rdha)bhūtābhiḥ kalābhirhīnaṃ na bhavati । vicitrasya dhruvakavaiguṇyāt
tathā vikalānāṃ madya(dhya)mādyabhāgatve śamyādirūpeṇa sthitamevaitat । pṛṣṭharūpaṃ mantrimatre (pamantimame)va kalānāmarthaṃ
(rdhaṃ) hīyate । tato'pyāha । <q>antimārtha</q> (<q>rdha</q>)<q>kalāhīna</q>(<q>m</q>) iti । ādimābhirartha(rdha)kalābhiḥ kalānāmartha
(rdha)hīnamityarthaḥ । evaṃ ca <q>bāla</q>śabda(:)kaniṣṭha eva vyākhyeyo na dhruvake । tena vyastasya druta eva labdhatvāt ।
evamekasyāmapi kaṇḍikāyāṃ yojanātmakayoga upapāditaḥ । tathā hi । citre tāvad hīyamāne ekasmin pāde padaṃ
tadevātra dhruvakāśrito(te)pātadvaye ityekayogāt kaniṣṭhaprasavo vyākhyātaḥ ।। 81 ।।</p>
<p>atiyogaḥ kīdṛk tataśca kasyotpattiṃ(ttiḥ)kathaṃ cetyāśaṅkyāha ।
<lg><l>dvitīyāṃ kha(ka)ṇḍikāṃ kṛtvā prathamā sakalā yadi ।</l>
<l>yojyate pūrvatālena tadā tat syāllayāntaram ।।</l></lg>
bāla iti vartate । bālaśca kaniṣṭha evetyuktam । vakṣyati ca <q>bālaṃ navakalaṃ e</q>(<q>ye</q>)<q>ṣām</q>(<q>bha. nā</q>. 31. 99)
ityatra । evaṃ kaniṣṭhasya yastāla uktaścacañcatpuṭapañcapāṇidvayātmā sa sannipātaḥ । tanmadhyāvada (dhyāda)ṣṭāsu
kalāsu sāmi cañcatpuṭaḥ ṣaṭpitāputra ityanto'kṣarapāto viddhi(dhiḥ)। tāvatā bālatālena prayojitā sthitā
yāmaṣṭakalāṃ kha(ka)ṇḍikāṃ prayujya pramāṇava(t)kalā abhagnābhireva navabhiḥ kalābhiryuktā yadi pūrveṇopakrāntā
samāptena tālenāvaśiṣṭenātra ṣaṭpitāputrakamuktaṃ sannipātaṃ cetyevaṃ rūpeṇopohyate । <q>tadeti</q> । tasyāmeva daśāyāṃ na
hi bahirbhāvayediti kaniṣṭhaṃ yadabhūt tallayakṛtādviśeṣā<q>llayāntara</q>vācyaṃ sambhāvyate । tadāha । <q>syā</q>diti ।। 82 ।।

<pb n="196"/>

<lg><l>vardhamānaṃ vinā citre na hi vṛttau layāntaram ।</l>
<l>bahirvā vardhamāne vā kaniṣṭhaṃ na hi dakṣiṇe ।। 83 ।।</l></lg>
<!-- COMMENTARY page 196 !-->
nanvakṣarapātavidhau tāvanna kaścidviśeṣa uktaḥ । kaṇḍikā'pi bhāvo'pi yaḥ pūrva(rvaṃ)dvitīyaprathameti
so'pyekāsāritaprayogatve hastābhāvatvāllalitakalpaṃ(lpa)tatkaniṣṭhatvabhedena neturvācya ityāśaṅkya tayorbhedaṃ
<lg><l>vardhamānaṃ vinā vici(ci)tre na hi vṛttau layāntaram ।</l>
<l>vahirvā vardhamāne vā kaniṣṭhaṃ na hi dakṣiṇe ।।</l></lg>
<q>ṭīkākṛt</q> tāvadāha । <q>layāntaramiti</q> । <q>kaniṣṭhame</q>vocyeta tadāśrayatvādupacāreṇa । tadayamarthaḥ । <q>vardhamānaṃ vinā</q>
tato <q>bahi</q>rbhāve <q>kaniṣṭhaṃ citra</q> eva bhavati । nanu kā (kadā)ci<q>dvṛttau vardhamāne</q> layāntaratvaṃ
dharmā(ntara)vati (rti)bahirbhāvena kadācana <q>layāntaramiti</q> tātparyam । <q>kaniṣṭhaṃ</q> tat svatantraṃ vā <q>vardhamāna</q>gataṃ vā na
jātu <q>dakṣiṇe</q> dhruvayati । kiṃ ne.....syā sa kaniṣṭhādapi jyeṣṭhasya vyaktiḥ syāt । cāturguṇyasahatvānna tveva । sā
hi madhyamāsāritāditi । <q>anye</q> tu śeṣavṛtti(ttī)ścānyathā vyācakṣate । <q>kaniṣṭhaṃ</q> svatantraṃ vā vardhamānasyāntaraṃ
ca । antaratvaṃ dakṣiṇenāpi vṛtteḥ । vardhamānaṃ tu vinā citram । citraṃ tu vardhamānāntargatadhruvakeṇaiva ca । svātantryeṇa
tu citramārgeṇa bhavanīyam । layāntaraṃ ca svatantravardhamānagataṃ vā citreṇa dakṣiṇe kintu vārtā eva vela (vṛtireva vā
laya)eva ca madhyamajyeṣṭhayormārgatrayavidheyatvamityuktaṃ bhavatīti । evaṃ ca mārgabhedādanayorbheda iti tātparyamiti ।</p>
<p>guravastu spaṣṭameva vyācakṣate । eko hiśabdaścārthe । aparaḥ śabdārthe । itthaṃ ca yojanā । <q>layāntaraṃ</q> nāma
tad <q>vardhamānaṃ vinā na citre</q> na <q>vṛttau na</q> ca <q>dakṣiṇe</q> bhavati । mārgatraye'pi svatantraṃ tatrāsti । vardhamānāntargataṃ hi
citre'pi hi bhavati yadā citrā''śritā navakalā viśāladhruvakeṇa kaniṣṭhaṃ vyanakti । vṛttāvapi yadvā
yadvā(dā)sadvṛttimārgāśritā citreṇa kaniṣṭhābhivyajya (ñja)kā । dakṣiṇe'pi bhavati yadā sā dakṣiṇamārgāśritā
vārtikeṇa kaniṣṭhaṃ vyanakti । na hi kaṇḍikānāṃ mārgabhedaniyamaḥ kaścit । tathā hi sāmānyenoktam । <q>vṛttidakṣiṇacitreṣu
viniyojitaṃ vardhamānami</q>ti (<q>bha. nā</q>. 31-75)। evaṃ vinā <q>citre vṛttau layāntaraṃ</q> nāpi <q>dakṣiṇe</q> । <q>kaniṣṭhaṃ
bahirvā</q> bhavati <q>vardhamāne vā</q> bhavatīti pāratantryaniyamādaniyatasya kaniṣṭhasya siddhau layāntarādbheda iti ।। 83 ।।</p>

<lg><l>dviguṇākṣarasaṃyogādanyamārganiyojanāt ।</l>

<lg><l>tṛtīyā sa(ca) dvitīyā ca prathamā caiva tatkalā1 ।</l>
<l>dvikalaṃ yogamāśritya madhyamāsāritaṃ tu tat ।। 85 ।।</l></lg>

<p>nanu bhavatvevaṃ tathāpi yadā vardhamānāntarbhāvadaśākṛtā(ta)pāratantryaṃ tadāto bheda ityāśaṅkyāha ।
<lg><l>dviguṇākṣarasaṃyogādanyamārganiyojanāt ।</l>
<l>nṛttakālaviśeṣācca bālādanyala(lla)yāntaram ।।</l></lg>
yāvantyakṣarāṇi padasambandhīni kaniṣṭhāsāritakalāyāṃ talo(to) dviguṇa(ṇāni)layāntaragatāyām । dhruvake
yadi kaniṣṭhalayāntaraścitre nṛtte ca viśeṣo'sti । yatrāntare gīyamāne na dvikalāya(yāḥ)kaniṣṭhāyā āvṛttirbhavatīti ।
yadā gītavaśādaṅgaṃ bhūyo nivṛ(va)tta(rta)te tatrādyamabhineyaṃ syāccheṣaṃ nṛtte tadyojayediti । yathākṣaravaiguṇyā(n)
mārgabhedācca ko'nyā(nyaḥ)kālaviśeṣaḥ । akṣaradvaiguṇyamapi layavaśāt । sa eva kālo na tu mārgabhede tasmāt
kālo'tra nartakīpraveśavādyagrahaṇādiravasaraḥ ।। 84 ।।</p>
<p>atha kathaṃ stri(tri)yogaḥ kiṃ ca tataṃ prayogata ityāśaṅkyāha ।
<lg><l>tṛtīyā ca dvitīyā ca prathamā caiva tatkṛtā(tkalā)।</l>
<l>dvikalaṃ yogamāśritya madya(dhya)māsāritaṃ tu tat ।।</l></lg>
<q>gurvakṣarāṇāṃ tristeṣāmi</q>(<q>viśleṣādi</q>)ti (<q>bha.nā</q>. 31-64)pūrva(rvaṃ)yo dvikalā(lo)yogā(ga)uktaḥ samāśritya
ṣoḍaśāṣṭau naveti yadi kākutāla<q>madya</q>(<q>dhya</q>)<q>māsāritaṃ</q> tena sanisāsanidāvani iti cañcatpuṭam । śanipratāśanitāmīti
pāṇigatā ṣantā ityevaṃ ṣoḍaśakalā(ya)tyādau kaṇḍikā । tataḥ ṣaṭkāla(kalā)diśayāṃ(yā) śatātram iti
prācyā vi(vī)ciṣu kā(ka)lāśca । catuṣkaṃ pañcapāṇyantaragataṃ ca kalācatuṣkaṃ śanivratā iti tato navakalāyāṃ
śanivratāni śaniśāni prācyavaśiṣṭaṃ kalāṣṭakamuktakaṃ ca sannipāta iti ।। 85 ।।</p>

<lg><l>caturthīmāditaḥ kṛtvā catasraḥ kaṇḍikā yadā 1 ।</l>

<p>atha caturyogatālaṃ cāha ।

<q>catasra</q> eva <q>kaṇḍikā</q>ścaturthadvātriṃśatkalākā(ka)ṇḍikāditvenāśritya ṣoḍaśa(śā)ṣṭādaśetyanayā''nupūrvyā
catuṣkalātālena
<lg><l>dvitīyamadya(dvirbhāvān)madya(madhya)masyaiva jyeṣṭhamityabhidhīyate ।</l></lg>
(<q>bha. nā</q>. 31-65)
ityatra nirūpitena prayujyate । tathā jyeṣṭhasya vyaktite (vyaktitve) na sa ānivi āvranivi sa āniva iti
cañcatpuṭaḥ । saāniḥ savi ātā śaāniviśa saānivi iti pañcapāṇaḥ(ṇiḥ)। ṣoḍaśeti dvātriṃśatkalā
turyāṃ (sturyāyāṃ)kaṇḍikāyāmādau prayujyamānā(naḥ)pātavidhistato'pi ṣoḍaśakalāyāṃ saātāvivaśa saāniva
iti prāpya pañcapāṇyavaśiṣṭaṃ kalāṣṭakaṃ śaānivivra ātāvityaparapañcapāṇigataṃ kalāṣaṭkaṃ prayojyam । tato
ṣaṭkalāṃ kaṇḍikāyāmāro(pya) prayujyamānāyāṃ tasa pañcapāṇiviśiṣṭamadhyā kalāṣṭāṃśa (śena)anvitā anivinito
navakalāyāṃ viśiṣṭaṃ kalāṣaṭkamukte(kta)ka'sannipātaśca śaātāvivraāvra aniviśa evaṃ mārgatālā(la)yogaḥ ।
<q>āsāritāna</q>(<q>ni</q>)<q>prasūyanta</q> (<q>bha. nā</q>. 31-80) iti yaduktaṃ tasya mārgasyaikakalāstā (tā) lasya ca
śamyāderyona(ga)jñātamaṅagayogaṃ ca viśiṣyate ।। 86 ।।</p>
<p>tatprayojanaṃ tatsvarūpaṃ ca darśayitumāha ।

vardhamānāntargatatayā nṛttāśrayatve etānyaṅgāni na tu svātantryeṇa prayogaḥ । tena tatropohanābhāva e<q>vānye</q> । tatrāpi
tañca śa......tyeva tadartha etadabhāvāya iti hi vate (ukte) <q>pṛthak pṛtha</q>giti sarvaṃ svaravācakīkṛtaṃ bhavati ।
aṅgacatuṣkābhipratyaṅganartakīpraveśa ityādikramo'vatiṣṭhate । <q>tāṇḍavādhyāye</q> (<q>bha. nā</q>. a. 4) ca svatantrāsāriteṣvapi

<lg><l>varṇatālalayagranthavā 1dyādinayavardhanāt ।</l>

<lg><l>yathā vṛkṣād(kṣo)bhaved bījaṃ (jād)bījādvṛkṣasya(vṛkṣādbījasya) sambhavaḥ ।</l>

<p>nanu yadi nāma caturāsāritairnirvahan na ṇīyatā (rnirvahaṇīyatā)vardhamānatā [sā kā] ryā kuta
ityāśaṅkyāha । <q>varṇatāleti</q> । sā tatra daśā yeyamāsāritānāṃ tadapekṣayā vardhamānībhāvadaśāyāṃ <q>varṇā</q>divṛddhiyogaḥ ।

।। 91 ।।</p>
<p>evamiyantyā(tā)yat phalaṃ sampannaṃ taddarśayati । <q>vardhamāsatta</q>(<q>na</q>)<q>śarīrasye</q>ti । vardhamāne kaṇḍikānāṃ
sarvāsāmeva caturasratālayogena kadācit prayoga iti vardhamānaśarīraṃ caturasramāsāritaśarīramapyeva । pañcapāṇi
hi(rhi) trivikārayā kṛtopavastu ṣoḍaśakalatvamasya rūpamityuktam । prāgāsāritasyetyekavacanabhūmau catuḥṣaṣṭiriti
na paramārthabheda iti darśayati । sa eva hi niṣkāmakalayā vikalībhavatītyuktameva । jyeṣṭhāsāritamadhye ca sarvametat
sthitamiti । ato'pyekavacanam । <q>evamāsāritasya</q> vardhamānasya dehasya yo'nyonya<q>kāryakāraṇabhāva</q>stena
vaicitryarūpakalpanā jāyate । tathā hi । vardhamānadaśāprabhāvādāsārita aṅgacatuḥṣaṣṭiriti na paramārthabheda iti
darśayati । sa eva hi niṣkrāmakalayā vardhamānadaśāyāḥ prabhāvādāsāritamaṅgaṃ catuṣkalā(la)yāṅkanayoganṛttaṃ
prayogivaicitryādāsāritaṃ bhavati । āsāritaprayogarahitasandhānabalācca parivartayordvandvāntatā jāyate । anyathā

<p>anyonyāśrayadoṣānubhayāsiddhirityāśrayadṛṣṭāntadvāreṇāpavādayati । <q>yathā vṛkṣo bhavedbījāditi</q> ।

viśālā sakalā yadi । yujyate pūrvatālena tadā syāttallayāntaram । sunandā ca tataḥ kāryāṃ saṅgatā punareva hi । viśālāṃ ca

vardhamānasya tālo'yaṃ kaṇḍikāyāḥ na pṛthak pṛthak ।। ityadhikaḥ ।

<p><q>evameta</q>diti । apaunaruktyamāha । <q>evami</q>ti pūrvoktena prakaraṇena <q>vardhamānasya lakṣaṇaṃ</q> vicchittyantareṇeti

sujñātaṃ bhavati । kintu tathā''sāritarūpeṇa sākaṃ vardhamānasya kāryakāraṇabhāvādhārādheyatābhijñāteyaṃ vardhamānasya
dhruvakamārgasyādhārāt । uktaṃ hi prāk ।

<lg><l>3ā (a) viśeṣanivṛttaṃ tu śīrṣakaṃ samprayojayet । 3a</l>

<q>prasvāra</q> iti । prācyagītānukarṣa iti yāvat । <q>asya viśeṣata</q> ityasādhāraṇenoktā(ktaḥ)।। 301 ।।</p>
<p>nanu ko'sau śarīratālo yaḥ pūrvavarṇākarṣaṇena prasvārarūpaḥ kriyata ityata āha । <q>dvikalenaiva pañcapāṇinā
kartavya</q> iti । śarīratāla iti viśeṣaḥ । prācyavarṇānukarṣāt prasvārakriyā kriyata ityāha । <q>kalādvādaśeti</q> ।
<q>asye</q>ti prasvārasya ।</p>
<p>etaduktaṃ bhavati । dvitīyapādasya ṣaṣṭhyāmalpāsu dvādaśakalāsu yā gītyā dvādaśakalā
dvikalapañcapāṇitālena gīyamānā upohanaṃ ca ṣaṭkena prāguktā । yataḥ pradhānabhūtāstāḥ śarīramityucyata(nta)iti
।। 302 ।।</p>
<p>tadāha । <q>rovindakaśarīrantu ṣaṭkalopohanamiti</q> । tasya śarīrasyādirupohanākhyastatra <q>vivadho vṛttaṃ
veti</q> prāktanaṃ smāritam ।। 303 ।।</p>
<p><q>ākāravṛttami</q>ti vyākhyātam । vṛttākhyaṃ varṇaṃ ā ityevaṃbhūtaiḥ stobhaistriścaturvā prayuktaiḥ kāryam ।
yadāha । <q>catuṣkaṃ trikameva ce</q> (<q>ve</q>)ti । nāto nyūnamiti yāvat । <q>asye</q>tyākāravṛttasya
madhyasthitasyāṅgacatuṣkṛta<q>syoparyadha</q>ścānyonyaviśiṣṭānyaṅgāni kuryāt । śarīre prasvāraḥ ṣoḍaśāṅgatā cetyavadhānaṃ
sampādyamityatrāvanyā(śyaṃ) vidheyam ।। 304 ।।</p>

iti । sa kadācid <q>dakṣiṇe</q> syāt । yacchedamardha(rtha)yogena dakṣiṇasyāpi vṛttarūpatvamuktam । tanmukhānāmnyaṅge

<p>atha citramārgasthitasyaikakalasya vikāramāha । <q>yo dakṣiṇa</q> iti । <q>dakṣiṇe yastālavidhi</q>ścatuṣkalavṛttau
ca dvikalastau <q>citre</q> ekakale krameṇa yugapadvā bhavataḥ । etaduktaṃ bhavati । ekakale yānyakṣarāṇi tānyeva
dviguṇatālayogena । tāvatye(ntye)va kalārūpe niṣkrāmapraveśane kadācid dvikalatayā kadācidāvāpādyadhyāvāpena
catuṣkalatayā geyānīti <q>vyasta</q>pakṣaḥ । kvacidbhāge dvikalatayā kvaciccatuṣka (la)tvaneti <q>samasta</q>pakṣaḥ । e(a)ta
eva citramārgeṇa ।। 319 ।।</p>
<p>vaicitryāt sāmastyasyāpavādamāha । <q>śākhānivṛttādi</q>ti । śākhānivṛttaṃ pratiśākhātantreṇa ca
nivṛttamukhapavartanaṃ tena pratiśākhāyāmupavartane ca <q>citramubhayamārga</q>yuktaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ । upasaṃharati । <q>iti
mārgatraye'pīti</q> । uktena vaicitryeṇa <q>saptā</q>pi vitastādimārgatrayabhāñjīti yāvat ।। 320 ।।</p>

<lg><l>lasanāllāsyamityuktaṃ strīpumbhāvasamāśrayam ।</l>

<p>tatra pūrvaṃ ya<q>ttāṇḍavādhyāye</q> (<q>bha.nā</q>.a.4) <q>daśarūpake</q> (<q>bha.nā</q>.a.18) iha ca tadekīkurvan

<p>nanu pṛthagarthatve'nyonyasambandhe vairasyaṃ syādityāśaṅkyāha । <q>tadaṅgaiḥ</q> pṛthagartha iti । vacanasya paścāt

<lg><l>santaupacchai vihuvi(pi)kaaivecca aḻajjiāe hui pañca ।</l>

iti । atra hi dūtyāḥ svaśabdena bhāvī bhāva uktaḥ । chekoktyā tu nāyikāntarodbhedena nāyakasya mūrkhatvaṃ svasakhyāḥ
anurāgitvaṃ saubhāgyaṃ surakṣitatvaṃ ceti । yadidaṃ <q>sollāsāmalā</q> ityatra sotprekṣayā'nyonyamaviyogaḥ

atra daśa lāsyāṅgāni <q>sandhyadhyāye</q> (a.19) vaicitryā(dyaṅgopajīvena) nāṭyasaṃskārāya nirūpitāni । idaṃ
teṣāṃ lakṣaṇam । kṣetramāruhyāsāritavardhamānagītikavargasyoddhatapūrvaraṅgopajīvikābhinayayogino yathālakṣaṇamadhyāye
yathāsukumārapūrvaraṅgopayogino lāsyāṅgavargasyeti । na hyatra gāndharvamātraṃ lakṣma । sāmakapālāderalakṣaṇāt । sāpi
dhruvopayogī(ginī)māgadhyādīnāṃ lakṣaṇābhāvāt । na ca svataṃtraṃ gāndharvamiva lakṣaṇārham । na tu vedatvāt tatra
<q>geyapā(pa)daṃ</q> lāsyam । pūrvaraṅga ityanudbhinnatatvaṃ vākyaṃ <q>ṭīkākṛtaḥ</q> ।</p>
<p>idaṃ tvatra tattva<q>mupādhyāyai</q>rnirūpyate । idaṃ dvividhaṃ hi nāṭyam । uddhataṃ sukumāraṃ ca । vīraśṛṅgārayoreva
nāyakagatayoraśeṣapuruṣārthasiddhiṣu vyāpārāt । tatra prathame samudyataḥ pūrvaraṅgo maheśacaritaprādhānyena । yathoktaṃ
<q>pañcame</q>(caturthe) । <q>māheśvarairaṅgahārairuddhatairi</q>ti (<q>bha.nā</q>.4.311) <q>maheśvarasya caritami</q>ti (<q>bha.nā</q>.4.319)
ca । śṛṅgārapradhāne tu nāṭye sukumāra eva pūrvaraṅgo yadi hi prāyeṇa <q>pañcame</q> lāsyaṃ sūcitam । taṃ vāgaṅganirūpaṇena
tatra hyuddhataḥ samavakāraḥ sūcitaḥ । pūrvaraṅgo <q>muninā</q> bhagavadagre prayuktaḥ । tasyaiva <q>parameśvareṇa</q> citratā kṛtā ।
tadabhiprāyeṇāha । <q>gītānāmi</q>(ti) śloke (<q>bha.nā</q>.5.13) । iha samuddhate gītakaṃ vardhamānaṃ tatra sukumāramiti
darśayitu<q>mihe</q>tyuktam । tena sādhāraṇyaṃ cārīmahācāryoḥ samuddhatāṅgānāṃ nirūpaṇenauddhatyaṃ ca vardhamānādiprayogeṇa
pūrvaraṅgasya <q>pañcame</q> nirūpitam । tadupayogī cāṅgasārthastatra tannirūpeṇa nirṇītaḥ । adhunā sukumāropayogi
darśayituṃ granthāntaramiti ।। 332 ।।</p>

<lg><l>sthāpite bhāṇḍavinyāse paṭe caivāpakarṣi(sāri)te ।</l>
<l>brahmaṇastriṣu pārśveṣu cāsane samprakalpite ।। 333 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>mārjiteṣu mṛdaṅgeṣu prayukte ca trisāmni tu ।</l>
<l>mārgāsāritakaṃ kuryāt tantrīveṇuvibhūṣitam ।। 334 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>bhāṇḍavādyena saṃyuktaṃ tataścāsāritaṃ budhaiḥ ।</l>
<l>parivartaistribhiryuktamataścopohanaṃ bhavet ।। 335 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>tryaśreṇa dvikalena syāt tataśca paridhāvana(naka)m ।</l>
<l>prayoktavyaṃ prayogajñaiḥ parivartanameva ca ।। 336 ।।</l></lg>
<!-- COMMENTARY page 273 !-->
<p>tatra geyapadaṃ tāvadityupakṣiptasya darśayati । <q>sthāpita</q> iti । <q>paṭe'pasārite</q> sati <q>bhāṇḍasya</q> tripuṣkarasya
<q>vinyāse</q> yathāsthānaṃ kṛte brahmasthānamavekṣya pūrvadiśi nartakīnāṃ pārśvadvaye ca vaiṇikānāṃ gāyantīnāṃ ca ।। 333 ।।</p>
<p><q>mṛdaṅgeṣu</q> dattamārgeṣu cakārādvīṇāyāmāsāritāyāmitīyatā pratyāhārādīnāṃ dṛṣṭārthānāmavaśyakartavya--
toktā । yat punareva tatparitoṣārthamadṛṣṭārtha ca bahirgītavidhānaṃ tat saṅkocayatīti <q>trisāmni prayukte</q> <q>tantrīveṇu</q>yutaṃ
<q>mārgāsāritakaṃ kuryādi</q>ti । ādyantaprayogena madhyaprayogapūraṇamāha । anena ca lāsyāt parameśvarārādhane'ntaraṅgaṃ
samastādṛṣṭasidhyai viṣka(ghna) praśāntyai ca paryāptamiti sūcayati ।। 334 ।।</p>
<p>tato madhyapātīya āsāritavidhiḥ । taṃ kartavyatvena darśayati । tasya kalāpātotpattimūlahetukatvāt
samutkṣiptasya prayoga ityāha । <q>bhāṇḍavādyena saṃyuktamāsāritami</q>ti । e(ka)kalaṃ vivakṣitam । tatra prāthamyāt
kaniṣṭhasyaiva prayogaḥ । <q>budhai</q>rityanena gītakavidhyākhyasyānyasya bahiryavanikāṅganyastha (sta)sya pāṇikāprayogaḥ ।
<q>lalitairdevīkṛte(tai)raṅgahārai</q>rityāha (bha.nā.4.312) । uktaṃ hi pūrvamaṃ । <q>gītakeṣu prayukteṣu devāstuṣyanti</q>
(bha.nā.a.5.47) । <q>vardhamāne prayukte tu rudrastuṣyatī</q>ti (<q>bha.nā.a</q>.5.48) kīrtanān । <q>devatānāṃ ca yo
jñeyo</q> (ca jñeyo) <q>gītavidhiḥ</q> (bha.nā.5.21) । iha coktam । <q>stutiprayuktā pāṇike</q>ti (<q>bha.nā</q>.31.325) ।
tadetadvākyārthasaṃmitena sthānyāderantarbhāvasambandhatvamiti ।। 325 ।।</p>
<p>evaṃ gītakavidhisthāne paṇikāṃ tadanantaraṃ geyapadaṃ saṃkṣepeṇotthāpanaparivartanayoḥ
sthānamityavasaramasyābhidhāya lakṣaṇamāha । <q>tryaśreṇa dvikaleneti</q> । cācapuṭena dvikalena <q>paridhānakaṃ</q> nāmāṅgam ।

<pb n="274"/>

<lg><l>parivartanake caiva puṃvākyaṃ prāk prayojayet ।</l>
<l>puruṣo'tra trivākyaḥ syāccaturvākyaṅganā smṛtā ।। 337 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>1kāryaṃ tathā'vasānaṃ ca pratyarthaṃ paridhānake ।</l>

<lg><l>sthitapāṭhyasya vakṣyāmi vidhānaṃ cāpyataḥ param ।</l>
<l>vṛttamekamatha dve vā yojayet pañcapāṇinā ।। 339 ।।</l></lg>
<!-- COMMENTARY page 274 !-->
parito dhīyate buddhau dhāryate pratiyogo'nenetyarthāpannatvaṃ darśitam । anena <q>kai</q>rapi paridhāna(ka)lakṣaṇaṃ kṛtam ।
<q>paridhānakaṃ</q> tryaśramapakṛṣṭamekāvaraṃ caturvastu vā dviguṇalayopavahanamiti yāvat । aparaistu aṣṭacatvāriṃśatkalaṃ
vastu dvādaśopohanaṃ madhyo laya iti । tenaivāvartamāne digvandanāya <q>parivartanaṃ</q> kāryam ।। 336 ।।</p>
<p>nanu kiṃ tatra kāvye gīyamāne nibadhyata ityāha । <q>puruṣo'tra</q> iti । strīpuṃsayo(so)stāvadatra saṃllāpo
nibadhyate । tatrādau <q>parivartane puṃvākyaṃ</q> tatpreraṇārūpaṃ tataḥ strīvākyaṃ tadanantaraṃ puṃvākye dve strīvākyāni trīṇi ।
tribhiḥ kaiśikyaṅgairnarmaspañjo(ndo) hyavasānātmaka iti maṅgalapradhāne'tra nibadhyate । nivṛttyāvṛttyupavartanā--
coyuktyā gītāvartanam । na tatra prasiddhamapīha parivartanamityuktam ।। 337 ।।</p>
<p>parivartanāṅga ityāsūcanāya <q>pratyarthami</q>ti । vastvante nirvahaṇamutthāpanīyavastuviṣayābhivandana--
viṣayavākyāntaravākyārthasiddhisamāptirūpaṃ <q>kāryaṃ</q> strīpuṃbhāvasamāśrayatvaṃ na tyajet । nirvahaṇamantāharaṇa--
<q>mityanye</q>। geyādipadānyatreti pāṭhyāśaṅkāṃ vyudasya nirvacanameva । prathamagrahaṇādaṅgābhidhānācca
sukumārapūrvaraṅgalāsyasyāṅgitvam । anyathā kiṃ tallāsyaṃ yasyedamaṅgaṃ syāt । kāvyarūpaṃ kiñciditi
cettāva(d)dṛṣṭārtham । tathātve prāthamyatālādibhedaṃ niyamasyānabhidheyatvāt । adṛṣṭārthatve tu pūrvaraṅgadvāraṃ kiñcit
tyajyate । ata eva vastupradhānatvaṃ <q>parameśvara</q>śṛṅgāravarṇanaṃ cātra pradhānam ।। 338 ।।</p>
<p><q>sthitapāṭhyasye</q>ti । <q>tataḥ</q> <q>parami</q>tyanena nāndīsthānikatvamasya । iha <q>vṛttamekaśa(kamatha)dve vā yojayedi</q>ti
paṭhediti yāvat । vṛttasya nāndīsthānakatvāt taddharmakavācyārtha mantavyam । <q>ekaṃ dve ve</q>ti dīrghālpāpekṣayā ।

<q>gāndhārījātimāśritami</q>ti bhaviṣyati । yadyapi ca pūrvaraṅge ṣāḍavena gānaṃ svaravākyakalāṃ tathāpi lāsyena
yathā(dā)bhavatyaparitoṣaṇaṃ tadā'nyadeva pradhānam । rāgaviniyogādi tu rañjanātātparyeṇa । tathā hi । svādakaḥ
svarucitena hṛdyena kusumadhūma(pa)vilepanenaivetyādinā bhagavantaṃ bhavānīpatimārādhayediti vidhau
kaṇṭakakusumakandurika(ndalita)pūtikena nakhādīnāṃ tu pa ra(ri) varjanaṃ hṛdyatayākṣepāt । evamiha
<q>lasanāllāsyami</q>tyevamākṣipto(ptaṃ)paraṃ ca kavargalāsyamevādṛṣṭaheturiti mantavyam । anenaivāśayena devagṛheṣu
prekṣaṇīyakayojanayā parameśvaratoṣaṇaṃ sarvatra prasiddhamiti । ayamevoddhatapūrvaraṅge vicitratayā mantavyaḥ । upasaṃharati ।
<q>aṅgapracchedakami</q>ti । asyānvarthatāṃ vyācaṣṭe । <q>yuktaṃ prakrīḍitādibhiri</q>ti । prakṛṣṭacchedo'ṅgavibhāgasyeti ।
bhāvajijñāsoḥ pṛṣṭhasthitasya madirādau nipatitapratibimbamavalokya nāyikāyāstanmadanavikāravarṇanamapyatra
kāvyārtham । tadeva pratibimbayogāt pracchedakam । pracchedo hi pratibimbamapyācita(caṣṭa)iti ।। 354 ।।</p>
<p>atha mahācārīsthānakaṃ <q>trimūḍhakamā</q>ha । <q>aniṣṭhure</q>ti । prayatodyuktakāntasya pauruṣapradhānaṃ guṇanikaraṃ
varṇayet । yatra kāvyārtha utsāho vā syā(da)thaveti raudrasthānikatvakṛtauddhatyāllabdham । tatra ca kāryaṃ puruṣānuprāsaprāyaṃ

<lg><l>tasmāt sarvaprayatnena kāryaṃ tālāvadhāraṇam ।</l>

<p>athāsya tāla(vidheḥ) bahumānāspadatva(tvaṃ)māśaṅkītyāśayenāha । <q>yastu tālaṃ na jānātī</q>ti ।। gāyannapi
<q>na gātā</q> । vadannapi (<q>na</q>)<q>vādakaḥ</q> । prayogo hi tālasūtrasyūto hi naṭapraveśayogyo bhavatītyuktamasakṛt । geyāditālavad

<p>cañcatpuṭādibhirviśeṣastasyetyāha । <q>aṅgabhūtā hi tālasya yatipāṇilayā</q> iti । <q>yatipāṇilaya</q>samūha

kālpanikī । tathātve'pi cānyonyāpekṣayā tatkalpane dvayorapyavakalpanaṃ syāditi madhyo'vadhibhūtaḥ । atra
tṛtīyoṃ'śaḥ prakīrtanīyaḥ । te caivaṃ na trayo layāściraṃ vilambitaṃ śīghraṃ drutaṃ madhyaṃ madhyamameveti ।। 369 ।।</p>
<p>layā(ya)eva tāla iti manasi kṛtvā tasyaiva prāg lakṣaṇamāha । <q>trayo layāstu vijñeyā</q> iti ।

iti । hnasvarūpā tasyā(sye)yamuccāraṇā <q>kalā</q> prākṛtavyapadeśyatayā prasiddhā । anyonyamadhyavartī <q>kālaḥ</q> ।
tatkālānantaraṃ ta<q>tkṛtaḥ</q> sampādito'ta eva vaikṛtasvabhāvo <q>layo nāma saṃjñito</q>'nvarthalabdhāt(bdhaḥ)।
śleṣaviśrāntyātmārthaḥ <q>sa layaḥ</q> । tasya ca sthūlasūkṣmakāryagamyaṃ svarūpamāha । <q>chandokṣara</q> iti । <q>yaditi</q> ।

yasmādviśrāntilakṣaṇā<q>cchanda</q>śrchandontareṇa samaṃ tulyakālaṃ prayuktamiti vyapadeśo jāyate te<q>nākṣara</q>gataḥ padagataḥ
sakalavādyagataśca <q>laya</q> ityuktaṃ bhavati । anena ca yatibhedasyāsyāvakāśo dattaḥ । na ca layamātrastālaḥ । sakalakriyāsu
tadbhāve'pi tālābhimāna(nā)bhāvāditi । tadviśeṣaṇabhūtāṃ yatiṃ nirūpayati । <q>srotogatā ca gopucchā samā
cātre</q>ti । tridhā yatiḥ । atra laye viśeṣaṇatayā yā yatiḥ sā tridhā ।। 370-371 ।।</p>
<p>nanu vibhāgo'yam । asyā lakṣaṇaṃ tu vācyamityāha ।
<lg><l>layapravṛttavarṇānāmakṣarāṇāmathāpi ca ।</l>
<l>niyamo yā(yo)yatiḥ sā tu gītavādyasamāśrayā ।।</l></lg>
iti । gīta<q>varṇānāṃ</q> sthāyyādīnāṃ vādye <q>cākṣarāṇāṃ</q> jhuṇṭukaṭakathādīnāṃ sambandhināṃ yā <q>layapravṛtti</q>rlayaviśeṣo
drutādistayopalakṣito <q>yo niyamaḥ sā yatiḥ</q> । krameṇa <q>gītā</q>śrayā <q>vādyā</q>śrayā ca । pūrvaṃ ya<q>dgeyādhikāra</q> evamuktaṃ
<q>śiraḥkarmādivartanācāryādīnāṃ layapravṛttyā niyamo nityavādyamātrāśca sā yati</q>riti tanmantavyam । etaduktaṃ
bhavati । layasya yaḥ kaścittālaniyamo'nuvartanaṃ tatra caritapradhvaṃsitvena sā......laghumapi gurumapi laghū.....tsa
vicitre niyamaḥ । tatra prathamabhāge vilambitasya yāvadante drutasya niyama iti srotovadgamanāttathā yatiruktā ।
etadviparyayād <q>gopucchā</q> tādrūpyādeva । yastu prathame tāvadyatinirvāhaparyantā sa eva layo niyamaḥ sā <q>samā</q> ।
tatrāsāṃ krameṇa drutavilambitamadhyāḥprādhānyāśayena viṣaya ucyate । paramārthatastriṣvapi tisra iti । evaṃ niyamaviśiṣṭo
layastāla iti tāvat । ata eva niyamāṃśasyaiva prādhānyālloke yatiriti tādrūpyavyavahāraḥ । evaṃ sākṣādyatra sāmyaṃ
vakti phalaṃ phalasāmyadvāreṇa dṛṣṭamapavargāntamapi tasya laukikasyaiva lakṣaṇaṃ yadyavacchinnalayaṃ tālamiti । yatra tu
sākṣādadṛṣṭamapi phalaṃ tatrānyadapi rūpaṃ vaktavyam । tatra ciraśīghratādau kriyā yadyapi yā kācidapyupāyastathā
niyamādṛṣṭa(phala)siddhaye viśiṣṭahastāṅgulakriyaivopayoginī । sā ca <q>pāṇi</q>śabdenoktā । tadāha <q>dattilaḥ । tatra
tālaṃ</q> (<q>ca</q>)<q>pāṇiṃ ca prāhurekami</q>ti (<q>dattilam</q> 153) । tadgatayā kriyayā kriyāntaramapi
vīṇāpuṣkaravādanāni (di)svīkriyate । tena viśiṣṭakriyāparicchedyo yadyavacchinno layastāla iti
gāndharvīyatālalakṣaṇādervīṇāvādyādeśca kriyāyāḥ pradeśāntare lakṣitādiha na <q>pāṇeḥ</q> sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ kṛtaṃ viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ

vyācikīrṣuryugalakamāha । <q>dhruvāsaṃjñāni yāni syuri</q>ti । pūrvaṃ <q>nāradādyāśca gandharvā gānayoga</q> iti (<q>bha. nā</q>. 1.51) ।
tadayaṃ sambandhaḥ । <q>nāradā</q>dyairyāni gītāṅgāni varṇāṅgāni saptarūpāṅgamātrā mukhapratimukhāni saptarūpapramāṇaṃ
tryaśracaturaśrādi yāścarca ṛggāthā(:)<q>pāṇikā</q> iha niyuktāni tadevaṃ <q>dhruveti saṃjñitam</q> । nānyat kiñciditi
napuṃsakena gītāṅgasaptarūpapramāṇānāṃ sambandhaḥ । <q>yā</q> itya(ne)na ṛggāthāpāṇikānām । iheti nāṭye । <q>anekaśa</q>
iti vyastasamastādiprakāravaicitryeṇa viśeṣoparañjanāya <q>niyuktāni । tad dhruveti saṃjñitam</q> । kathaṃ <q>sarvāṇi</q>
santi । <q>sarva</q>śabdaḥ prakṛtaḥ kārtsnyena yāvanti yatra rañjanātiśayānniyuktāni tāvanti tatra samuditānyekā
dhruvā ।</p>
<p>nanu kasmādetatsamudāyo dhruvā । āha <q>dhruvāsaṃjñānī</q>ti । strī(na)puṃsakaikaśeṣaḥ । tadayamarthaḥ ।

<p>atha vilambitābhedamāha । <q>vaihāyasāntāharaṇa</q> iti । <q>vaihāyasāntāharaṇe sthitāyāṃ</q> drutavilambitāyāṃ

<lg><l>madhyamānāṃ praveśe tu jñeyā drutavilambitā ।</l></lg>
(<q>bha.nā</q>.a.32.337)

1. sthitāyāṃ sthita eva ca । (V. 11 cd.N.)

<lg><l>saṃhāraścaturaśraśca narkuṭe khañjake (narkuṭe)tathā ।</l>
<l>sandhiḥ prasvārasaṃyuktā a(ktastva)ntarāyāṃ smṛtā(tas)tathā ।। 13 ।।1</l></lg>
<lg><l>yānyaṅgāni kalāścaiva gītakāntargatāni tu ।</l>
<l>tāni chandogatairvṛttairvibhāvyante dhruvāsvatha ।। 14 ।।2</l></lg>
<!-- COMMENTARY page 295 !-->
iti । eṣāṃ ca prādhānyāt pradhānānuyāyitvamiti bhāvika(ta)pradhānārthasyākṣepaḥ । <q>antāharaṇāt</q> saiva ca
drutavilambitā । prāsādikyā bhedatvamasti tasyāmi ।। 12 ।।</p>
<p>aṅgaviniyogamāha ।
<lg><l>saṃhāraścaturaśraśca khañjake narkuṭe tathā ।</l></lg>
iti । hāsyapradhānatvāt tasya mitaśarīratvādvākyārthasamāptiḥ । śṛṅgārānugamayogāccarthasya dvaidhīkaraṇaṃ
lalitabhāvatvāddhāsyaśṛṅgārayogya iti hi <q>vakṣyate</q> (<q>bha.nā</q>.a.32.340) । tadetat
<q>saṃhārācca(raśca)turaśrācca</q> (śraśca) । <q>tathe</q>ti yathāsaṃkhya u(mu)pāsanāya । uddhatānubandhayostu sāmānyaviniyoga
eva pūrvoktaḥ । evaṃ prāveśikyā atisāmānyato viśeṣaṃ ceti viniyoga uktaḥ ।
ākṣepikāprāsādikyāntarānaiṣkrāmikīnāṃ cātisāmānyato viśeṣataśceti dvidhā । antaradhruvāyāstu tṛtīyamapi
sāmānyaviniyogamāha । <q>sandhiḥ prasvārasaṃyuktastvantarāyāmi</q>ti । bhāvino'nusandhirvarṇānutkarṣaścāntaradhruvābhedeṣu
sarveṣu prādhānyena yojyaḥ । yatra paṭhitāṅgaviśiṣṭatānuviśeṣayojanaṃ rasabhāvaprakṛtiparamārthoddīpanamiti <q>ṭīkākārai</q>ruktaṃ
tadyuktimārgāgamātipātaṃ lakṣyate । viruddhaṃ ca tadupekṣyameva ।। 13 ।।</p>
<p>nanu <q>dhruvāyāstu(vāstu)pañca vijñeyā nānā saṃsthānasaṃśrayāḥ</q> । (<q>bha.nā</q>.32.9)ityatra chandovṛttarūpaṃ
saṃsthānaṃ yatsūcitaṃ tat kutrāṃśa upayujyata ityāśaṅkyāha ।
<lg><l>yānyaṅgāni kalāścaiva gītakāntargatāni tu ।</l>
<l>tāni chandogatai(rvṛttai)rvibhāvyante dhruvāsvatha ।।</l></lg>
iti । <q>aṅgāni</q> vivadhādīni <q>kalā</q> gurulaghuplutadrutādyā nī(nā)tivaicitryāt kṛtānītyanusāreṇa
vardhamānādi<q>gītakāntargatāni</q> <q>mukhaṃ ca (khaṃ) pratimukhaṃ</q> <q>ce</q>ti (<q>bha.nā</q>.32.4.)<q>ca</q>kārāllayayatyādayaḥ । <q>eva</q>kāro
bhinnakramaḥ । turviśeṣadyotakaḥ । tena kalādayo yāvacchandogītaireva vṛttairviracyante । nirādhārāṇāṃ padena vinā keṣāñcid
darśayitumaśakyatvāt । tadyathā । mukhapratimukhādyupajīvitasyārthasya kecittu śakyā atirasabhāva--
prakṛtyādinirūpakayogyā na bhavanti yathā vivadhādayaḥ ।</p>

<lg><l>tryaśraśca caturaśraśca tālaḥ kāryo dhruvātmakaḥ ।</l>
<l>ṣaṭkalo'ṣṭakalaścaiva yastu pūrvaṃ prakīrtitaḥ1 ।। 15 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>2pūrveṣāmeva gītānāṃ yānyaṅgāni smṛtānyatha ।</l>
<l>teṣāṃ3 vṛttavidhau kāryamekakaṃ(ko) vivadho'thavā ।। 16 ।।</l></lg>
<!-- COMMENTARY page 296 !-->
<p>nanvevaṃ padamātramastu kiṃ vṛtteneti tu śabdavṛttamapi sphuṭameva rasabhāvādivyañjakamityuktaṃ pūrvaṃ
<q>vācikābhinaye</q> (<q>bha.nā</q>. a.14.2) । <q>vṛtta</q>grahaṇaṃ cchandaso daṇḍakādigatagurulaghuniveśātmakavṛttāpā--
karaṇārtham । laghukasyākṣarasaṃkhyāmātrasyā............gāyatryādisadṛśasya vyākaraṇārtham । mātrāvṛtteṣvapi
cchandastadeva mātrāsaṃkhyā । tathāhi gāyatryādita evoddhṛtya cchando'pyabhipretya bhedasaṃkareṇa mātrāvṛttāni darśitāni ।
<q>dhruvādigaṇā</q>vi (dhruvāsvi)ti । ṣaṇmātrā yāvat ṣaḍviṃśatimaṇīnāmādau kalahalalitaṃ caturthāṅgam । antarāyāstu
haṃsāsyādayo daṇḍakakalpamātrāvṛttabhedāḥ ।। 14 ।।</p>
<p>nanvaṅgāni tu vividhānīti saṃjñātapūrvakāṇi । kalāḥ punarityabhipretya śamyādyāśaṅkāṃ parihartumāha ।
<q>tryaśraśce</q>ti । <q>tryaśracaturaśrau</q> yau <q>dhruvātmakau</q> ca mūlaprakṛtibhūtau ye(yau)ca <q>pūrvaṃ</q> tadvikalabhedau <q>ṣaṭkalāṣṭakalau</q>'pi
kāryau tālarūpau । cakārān miśrabhedau । <q>catuṣkalamiti caitanyapradamiti darśitam</q> । ativitatacatuṣkalaprakāro'pi
cakāreṇa dvitīyena saṅgṛhītaḥ ।। 15 ।।</p>
<p>evaṃ kalāsvarūpamabhidhāya gītāṅgeṣu vaktavyamāha । <q>pūrveṣāmeva gītānāmi</q>ti । <q>pūrveṣāṃ</q> sāmavedatulyānāṃ
madrakānāṃ <q>yānyaṅgāni teṣāṃ</q> madhyā<q>dekako vivadho vā</q> । <q>atha</q> śadbād vṛttaṃ kāryam । ekameva varṇāṅgaṃ dhruvāsu
niveśyam । na tu kāvyeṣviva । āvṛtyā viṃśatyaṅgaparatvāditi tāvadeko viśeṣaḥ । viśeṣāntaramapyāha ।
<q>vṛttavidhāvi</q>ti । gītakeṣu tālocitavarṇāṅgānusāreṇa mātrāniyamātmakaṃ vṛttam । yathoktam ।
<lg><l>akṣarairyā caturmātrā dvimātrā varṇatastu sā ।</l></lg>
(<q>bha.nā</q>.a.31.118)
iti । <q>catvārastu guṇā</q> (<q>bha.nā</q>.a.31.106) ityādi ca । iha tu viparyayaḥ । rasabhāvocitaṃ <q>vṛtta</q>meva
pradhānam । tathā tu guṇena śayyā bandhaḥ sthito varṇāṅgatāto niyo(jya)iti । <q>kecid vṛttividhau kāryami</q>ti

<lg><l>ekakaṃ tu vidāryekā te cobhe vivadhaḥ smṛtaḥ ।</l>
<l>ṣaṭparaṃ tryavaraṃ vā'pi vidāryā vṛttamiṣyate ।</l>
<l>padavarṇasamāptistu vidārītyabhisaṃjñitā ।। 17 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>eteṣāṃ cāpi vakṣyāmi vidhiṃ prakṛtisambhavam ।</l>
<l>1jyeṣṭhānāṃ vṛttasaṃyuktaṃ kuryādādau tathaiva ca ।</l>
<l>vivadhaṃ caiva madhyānāṃ nīcānāmekakaṃ tathā ।। 18 ।।</l></lg>
<!-- COMMENTARY page 297 !-->
<p><q>vidā(rī)</q><q>ti</q>yoga(:) kṛta <q>ekakā</q>dibhiriti sā vaktavyā । <q>nanvatikrānte'dhyāye</q> (<q>bha.nā</q>.a.
31)'ṅgalakṣaṇaevā(ṇā)vasara eva vidārīlakṣaṇaṃ kasmān noktam । ucyate । vede vicchedasambhavāt ।
vidārī niveśyamānā śobhātiśayaṃ puṣṇātītyāśayena <q>dhruvādhyāyena</q> (<q>bha.nā</q>.a.32) tallakṣaṇamāha ।
<q>padavarṇasamāptistu vidārī</q>ti । avāntaravākyasya samāptau sthāyyādivarṇasyāpyapanyāsena nyāsena vā
<q>samāptirvidārī</q> । vidāraṇa <q>vidārī</q> । vibhāṣākhyena bahunā vṛttyā <q>kṛdikārāntān ṅīṣi</q> (<q>aṣṭādhyāyī</q> 4.1.45)
ca rūpam । tadāha । <q>abhisaṃjñitā</q> anvartheti । tadyogācca gītakhaṇḍo <q>vidārī</q> ।। 17 ।।</p>
<p>evaṃ prasaṅgādvidārīṃ lakṣayitvā'ṅgānāṃ pravṛttibhāgena viniyogamāha । <q>eteṣāmi</q>ti । <q>vidhi</q>rvibhāgaḥ ।
<q>prakṛtiṣu</q> <q>sambhavo</q>'syeti । tatra <q>vṛttaṃ</q> bahuvaidārikam । jyeṣṭheṣu teṣāṃ hi prādhānyāt tadavāntarārthaviśrāntiḥ
sambhavati । yatra viśramo'laṅkārayogaḥ । vicitravyabhicārikatvāt sthāyitā(naḥ) । yathā ।......<q>ro anusarai
guru ai cchijja haṇṇeṇa kiṇīvaṇe viṇajjhi daitṭṭima</q> । [anusarati gurumapi śiṣyo daṇḍena kelivane vinakti
dṛṣṭim ।] (atra) vṛttaṃ ca niyamyate na tu jyeṣṭhāḥ । teṣu vivadhaikakayorapi sambhavāt । ekadvikhaṇḍādāviha tālasya
lakṣyate । adhamasya tvanyatra guṇībhāvād bahuceṣṭābhāva ityekaiva vidārī । yathā <q>vidūṣakasya</q> । yathā । <q>mahuara iha
siria</q> [madhukara iha śritvā] iti । madhyamasya tu madhyamādekako vivadhaḥ sambhavī । atra cobhayato'pi na
niyamaḥ । atra <q>ṭīkākāreṇā</q>kṣiptam । <q>vajraṃ ca śīrṣakaṃ ce</q>ti (<q>bha.nā.</q>a.32.10) viniyogaḥ prāguktaḥ । tatra
vajrādiṣu varṇāntarāṅgānāṃ <q>tālādhyāye</q> (<q>bha.nā</q>.a.31) bahunā bahuśākhiḥ(khī)pūrvāparavirodha iti ।
<!-- APPARATUS page 297 !-->
1. <q>ḍa</q>. uttamānāṃ bhavedvṛttaṃ madhyānāṃ vivadhaṃ smṛtam ।
nīcānāmekakaṃ kāryaṃ dhruvā pañcavidhā budhaiḥ ।।

<lg><l>tryaśraṃ vā caturaśraṃ vā yogaṃ1 jñātvā prayogajam2 ।</l>
<l>tena pramāṇayogena dhruvā kāryā'vasānikī3 ।। 19 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>4gāyatryāścā (tryāṃ cā) pi śakkaryāścā(ryāṃ cā)ntare vā vyavasthitā ।</l>
<l>tena 5pādapramāṇena dhruvā kāryā'vasānikī ।। 20 ।।</l></lg>
<!-- COMMENTARY page 298 !-->
<q>tadetadasmadāgamavyākhyāyāṃ</q> nirutthāna(rūpita) meva । anyadeva hi vajrādibhya upajīvyamiti darśitam । tenā'pi
na parihāramutprekṣamāṇena prajñātayeyameva dik sṛṣṭā । <q>sadāgamābhāvāttu</q> na spaṣṭīkartuṃ pāryate hi । tathāhi <q>teno</q>--
ktam । prakṛtivikārabhāvamātrametat । anyathā gītakāṅgamevedaṃ gīyata iti bhavet । layabhaṅgotthānabījagataṃ cedameveti
।। 18 ।।</p>
<p>atha rasaprasādanopayogakṛtāt pra(prā)dhānyādvā prāsādikīṃ dhruvāṃ vicārayati । <q>tryaṃśraṃ</q>(<q>tryaśraṃ</q>)<q>ve</q>ti ।
yujyate <q>yogo</q> vākyam । prayoga ukto vakṣyamāṇo viniyogastajjam । <q>tryaśraṃ caturaśraṃ vā</q> pāṭhyaṃ <q>jñātvā</q> tatpadapramāṇe
ca prāsādikī kartavyā । etaduktaṃ bhavati । iha <q>tryaśraṃ caturaśraṃ vā</q> bhāgena tāvacchandovṛttaviniyogo vakṣyate ।
tadanusāreṇaiva tatsadṛśavṛttau prāsādikyāṃ pāṭhyāntarabhāvinyāṃ kuryāt । ekaṃ hi dhruvāpāṭhyaṃ yogya(gyā)--
ṅgamaucityena । avasāyo'vasānaṃ niścaya rasaḥ । tatprayojanamityā<q>syā</q>(masye<q>tyā</q>)<q>vasāna</q>(<q>ni</q>)<q>kī</q> ।</p>
<p><q>apare</q> tu na vṛttamanena prāsādikyāmucyate tasya vakṣyamāṇatvāt । api tu padyocitastālarūpaśca
viniyokṣyamāṇatvāt । api tu yā tryaśrā caturaśrā । ucitavṛttāpāṭhyānāṃ tu caturaśratāla ityāhuḥ । idameva
yuktami<q>tyupādhyāyāḥ</q> । <q>anye</q> tu tryaśraṃ ceti prāveśikī kāryā । alpīyo'kṣare cchandasi na vibhāvānubhāvābhyāṃ
sphuṭanirūpaṇā ।। 19 ।।</p>
<p>athāsya śabdāṅgasyāha । <q>gāyatryāṃ cāti(pi)śakvaryāmi</q>ti । <q>antara</q>grahaṇāt tayorupalakṣaṇamātratvaṃ na
kāryayogāt । <q>maitracaitrayo</q>rdvijāṃstadbhojayeti । <q>tena</q> uṣṇiganuṣṭuptriṣṭubbṛhatīpaṅktitriṣṭubjagatyati--
jagatīśakvarīcchandaḥpramāṇena vānaikakena dvābhyāṃ tribhiścaturbhiradhikairvā prāsādikī kāryā । alpīyo'kṣape cchandasi
na vibhāvā......ni sphuṭarūpaṇā । ativitate ca pāṇikātvamapi tu yogya(ma)pi na cedubhayaṃ caitat
prasiddhiviruddhamityevamparametat । tāsu yat pramāṇaṃ tadupacārāt sāmānādhikaraṇyenoktaṃ <q>tene</q>ti ।। 20 ।।</p>
<!-- APPARATUS page 298 !-->
1. <q>ḍa</q>. ślokaṃ । 2. <q>ca</q>. prayojakam । 3. <q>ca</q>. syādāvasānikī । 4. <q>ca</q>. gāyatryāṃ cā'pi śakvaryām. 5. <q>ca</q>. tena
pramāṇayogena ।

<lg><l>1śakkaryāścāti(ryāṃ cābhi)kṛtyāśca (tyāṃ ca)ye'ntare cāvasānikī ।</l>
<l>teṣāṃ mātrārdhavihitā2 dhruvā pādamayā(yī) smṛtā ।। 21 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>3yaticchandovidhānena gurulaghvakṣarānvitaḥ ।</l>
<l>kāryo mātrāpramāṇena dhruvāpādo'vasānikaḥ ।। 22 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>madhyamottamayoḥ kāryā caturaśrāvasānikī ।</l>
<l>madhyādhamānāṃ kartavyā tryaśrā caivāvasānikī ।। 23 ।।</l></lg>
<!-- COMMENTARY page 299 !-->
<p>evaṃ varṇavṛttaiḥ prasādikyāṃ tālavyaktimabhidhāya mātrāvṛtrairapyāha । <q>śakvaryāṃcābhikṛtyāṃ ce</q>ti । caturdaśākṣarā
<q>śakvarī</q> । ekaviṃśatyakṣarā'<q>bhikṛtiḥ</q> । yadantarālaṃ yāni mātrāvṛttāni ta<q>tpāda</q>yogena prāsādikī kāryā ।
mātrābhūyastve'pi hyakṣarāṇi gurupraveśānna bhūyāṃsi bhavanti । <q>mātre</q>ti mātrāvṛttādi । tadayaṃ samanvayaḥ ।
<q>śakvaryabhikṛtyayorantare mātrā vihite</q>ti mātrāvṛttānyuktāni । teṣāṃ <q>ye pādā</q>sta<q>nmayī avasānikī dhruvā</q>
<q>smṛte</q>ti । <q>ye</q> ityuparitanaśabdopakramaḥ । <q>teṣāmi</q>tyupacāraviṣayo yathā <q>samabhāro yā ca ṛtakāmāya yo modo(daḥ)</q>
tasmādāgata(ma)vat ।</p>
<p><q>anye</q> tu ślokadvaye'pi <q>ca</q>kārādupalakṣaṇamapi saṃgṛhṇate । chandoviniyogamātramatra । na tu śravyato--
payogitā । gurulaghuyatiniyame nātra kiñcit kṛtyam ।। 21 ।।</p>
<p>gītavaśādeva yatyādyavacchedācchravyatvasiddhiriti <q>yo mayokta</q> (<q>bha.nā</q>.14.1) ityatra taṃ pratyāha ।
<q>yaticchandovidhānene</q>ti । <q>chando</q> vidhīyate yena prayojanena ta<q>cchandovidhānaṃ</q> śravyatvam । tena <q>dhruvāpādo yatyā</q>
virāmeṇocitena śuddhatayā copalakṣitaḥ kartavyo varṇyatve ca niyamo <q>gurulaghubhiranvitaḥ</q> kartavyo mātrāvṛttatve
yādṛśameva pramāṇamāgamoditaṃ rūpaṃ yathā vaitālikī yatirantarāṇāṃ vā samapādo.........dattena yuktaḥ kāryaḥ । evaṃ
<q>cāvasāniko</q> rasavṛttiniścayakṛdbhavati । yathā gītiyoge'pyavasāniko niścayayuktaḥ kāryo na vṛttaṃ
yatyādisamācchādakaṃ kāryam । api tu tadanuvarṇyaiva kāryamiti pūrvapakṣikasammataṃ hetudvayamapyahetukṛtam । <q>avasānika</q>
iti matvarthīyaḥ ṣac(yaṣṭhan) (<q>aṣṭādhyāyī</q>5.2.115) ।। 22 ।।</p>
<p>evaṃ pāṭhyayojanayā prāsādikyāstryaśrāditālavibhāgaṃ nirūpya prakṛtibhāgenāpyāha । <q>madhyamottamayoḥ</q>

<lg><l>dvau pādau sannipātaśca dhruvāṇāṃ parikīrtitāḥ ।</l>
<l>drutaṃ ca śīrṣakaṃ caiva hitvānyāni bhavanti vai ।। 238 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>akṣarapiṇḍastryaśre pañcādirnavaparaśca vijñeyaḥ ।</l>
<l>aṣṭādiścaturaśre trayodaśaparastu vijñeyaḥ ।। 239 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>sarvaguruścāṣṭādistrayodaśaparaśca sarvalaghuḥ ।।</l>
<l>eṣa trya(tva)kṣarapiṇḍo vijñeyo vai dhruvāvidhānajñaiḥ ।। 240 ।।</l></lg>
<!-- COMMENTARY page 344 !-->
<p>tatra pañcākṣarā supratiṣṭhā । tadavasānaṃ tryaśrabhedo darśitaḥ । tatra sarvagurau pādadvaye daśa guravo bhavanti । ta
eva mātrāvibhāgena pañcagaṇa iti pādadvaye tālasamāptiḥ । tadāha । <q>dvau pādau sannipātaśca dhruvāṇāmi</q>ti ।
atrāpavādamāha । <q>drutaṃ ca śīrṣakaṃ hitve</q>ti । tayostu gaṇavidhiranya eva vakṣyate । evametad gaṇyam । yānyanyāni
vṛttāni tānyanena krameṇa bhavanti । evaṃ varṇavṛtteṣu mātrāvibhāgena tālayojane digdarśanaṃ kṛtam । na tvidameva
tāvadeveti mantavyam । tenāṣṭākṣarāyāmanuṣṭubhi sarvaguruṇā pādadvaye gaṇāṣṭakam । bhavati tāvat tricaturaśratālaḥ ।
evaṃ gurulaghuvyatikīrṇeṣu vṛtteṣu gaṇavibhāgakalpanayā pāde vā dvaye vā tryaśracaturaśrayojanaṃ kalpyam । tadyathā ।
<q>vasantatilakaṃ</q> (<q>bha.nā</q>.15.87) mātrāvibhāge pañcagaṇamiti tryaśre ।। 238 ।।</p>
<p>evaṃ vibhāgena tālacchedaṃ varṇavibhāgenaivāha । <q>akṣarapiṇḍastryaśre pañcādirnavapara</q> iti । bṛhatyanta iti
yāvat । <q>aṣṭādiścaturaśre trayodaśapara</q> iti । anuṣṭubho jagatyantaḥ ।। 239 ।।</p>
<p>nanu yadā pañcākṣarāṇi tryaśre tālacchedastadā kīdṛg gurulaghuvibhāga ityāha । <q>sarvaguruścāṣṭādī</q>
(<q>dirī</q>)<q>tyāha</q> । pañcaśabdena pañcako'kṣarapiṇḍaḥ <q>sarvaguruḥ</q> । tena <q>devaṃ vande śarvaṃ tvāmi</q>ti trikale tālaḥ ।
anyakalā hi viśrāntyā guruṇaikenaiva । <q>para</q> iti । navakapiṇḍo yaḥ paraḥ sarvalaghuḥ । <q>jaya jaya śaśimakuṭā</q>(<q>ṭa</q>) ।
tṛtīyā kalā hrasvenaiva viśrāntyā । caturaśre tu <q>gaurīdehārdham</q> tāvat <q>vande</q> yāvat <q>jaya jaya bhuvananata śaśidhara</q> ।
etadantarālastvitthameva gurulaghuvibhāgenohyaḥ । yathā tryaśre ṣaḍakṣare dvau laghū catvāro guravaḥ ......<q>māṃ tvāmi</q>ti ।
etannigamayati । <q>eṣa tvakṣarapiṇḍa</q> iti । <q>drutaṃ śīrṣakaṃ ca hitve</q>ti tadviṣayaṃ rūpāntaraṃ sūcitam ।। 240 ।।</p>

<lg><l>gaṇamātrāṃśavikalpaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi drutāyāśca(stu) ।</l>

<lg><l>nānāvṛttasamutpannaṃ kuryādvai śīrṣakaṃ budhaḥ ।</l>

kāryāḥ ।। 241 ।।</p>
<p>atra <q>dvāviṃśatirmātrā</q> bhavanti pratigaṇaṃ catasra iti kalpanayā । gurulaghuniveśastu yādṛcchikasthānamātram ।
drutāyāmardhādhikyābhidhānena caturaśradrutāyāṃ sārdhā aṣṭau gaṇā iti darśitameva bhavati ।। 242 ।।</p>
<p>evaṃ drutānāṃ vidhimuktvā śīrṣakāṇāmāha । <q>nānāvṛttasamutpannaḥ</q>(<q>nnaṃ</q>) <q>kuryādvai śīrṣakami</q>ti । <q>śīrṣakaṃ</q>

vṛttaprakāreṇa yojyam । anyena cañcatpuṭasya kalāpāda(di)vaicitrye ye prabhedā bhavanti teṣu dig darśitā । tadāha ।
<q>gurvādiri</q>ta । prathamaprastārabhedaḥ । tathā <q>laghvādiḥ</q> । prastārāntaraprakāraḥ । <q>sarvalaghuri</q>ti । sarvāntyabhedena

<lg><l>caturmātrāśca vijñeyā yugmaujākṣarakaiḥ padaiḥ ।</l>
<l>śīrṣakasyaikaviṃśatyā ṣaḍviṃśatiparastathā ।। 245 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>akṣarāṇāṃ bhavet piṇḍaḥ pāde hyekatra niścayāt ।</l>
<l>yugmā ojā miśrā vādau kāryā gaṇāstu catvāraḥ ।</l>
<l>niyataṃ śīrṣavidhāne paścāllaghusaṃcayaḥ kāryaḥ ।। 246 ।।</l></lg>
<!-- COMMENTARY page 346 !-->
ityanenābhidhāya <q>nānāvṛttasamutpannaṃ śīrṣakaṃ kuryādi</q>ti yaduktaṃ tadgaṇavibhāgena sāmānyena nirṇetuṃ <q>caturmātro gaṇa</q>
iti gaṇasvarūpābhidhānapūrvakamāha । <q>ardhāṣṭamagaṇāḥ pādāḥ śīrṣakasye</q>ti । evaṃ ca gaṇānāmeva prādhānyaṃ na tu
varṇānāmiti darśayati ।। 244 ।।</p>
<p><q>yugmaujākṣarakaiḥ padairi</q>ti । yugmāni sāmānyojāni viṣamāṇi yeṣu santi taiḥ । matvarthīyaṣṭhañ । <q>pada</q>śabdena
pādaḥ । etaduktaṃ bhavati । akṣarāṇi samāni viṣamāṇi vā ekādaśaprabhṛtīni caturmātrā gaṇā yojayitavyā
ityavadhātavyamiti । atha śīrṣake varṇavṛttiviṣayaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇamāha । <q>śīrṣakasyaikaviṃśatyā ṣaḍviṃśatipara</q>
iti । <q>śīrṣakasyai</q>katra pāde akṣaraśrutirakartavyaḥ । eṣā yadi parasaṃkhyā kāryā āhareḥ । <q>ekaviṃśatye</q>ti lakṣaṇe
tṛtīyā ।। 245 ।।</p>
<p><q>niścayādi</q>ti । etāvāneva paravān niyama ityarthaḥ । tena sarvalaghutve ṣaḍgaṇā mātrā dvayādhikā ityuktaṃ
bhavati ।</p>
<p>athātraiva viśeṣamāha ।
<lg><l>yugmā ojā miśrā ādau(?vādau) kāryā gaṇāstu catvāraḥ ।</l>
<l>(niyataṃ śīrṣavidhāne) paścāllaghusaṃcayaḥ kāryāḥ ।।</l></lg>
iti । <q>akṣarapiṇḍa</q>viṣayametat । tenādau caturmātrāścatvāro <q>yugmā</q> gurudvayalaghucatuṣṭayarūpāḥ। <q>ojā</q> dvilaghusvarūpāḥ ।
<q>miśra</q>rūpā......laghava ityayamakṣarapiṇḍaḥ paripūrayitavya iti । vakṣyamāṇa<q>mattākrīḍā</q>di (<q>bha.nā</q>.32.268)
viṣayamidamiti <q>kecit</q> । yugmaujamiśratvaṃ tālakṛtam । tacca samudāyasya śīrṣake । tathottamaviṣaye tu yugmatvamanyaṃ
tvanyaviṣayamiti <q>kecit</q> । udāharaṇam । <q>bhagavan paramaśiva tvāṃ vande sapadi</q> । iti ।। 246 ।।

<lg><l>trīṇi gaṇā yasya mukhe trīṇyeva hi yasya cāvasānāni ।</l>

<lg><l>pūrvārdhe'tha(rve hyardhe)caturhnasvā miśrā gaṇāstu catvāraḥ ।</l>

<q>avasānā</q>pekṣayā napuṃsakatvam । ante nirvahantītyāśayena sāmānyopakramāt prathamaṃ tenaiva nirdeśaḥ । yatiśca prāpyāḥ ।
akṣarapiṇḍaviṣayamevodāharaṇam । <q>śiva tava puramiha nande sakalajanahṛdayakṛtami</q>ti । drute'pi yathā pādaḥ śīrṣakasya

<p>asyaiva pūrvavyāmiśraṇena bhedāntaramāha । <q>pūrve hyardhe</q> iti । <q>caturhnasvāśca</q>turmātrā<q>ścatvāraḥ pūrve'rdhe</q> । <q>miśrā</q>

kṛtalakṣaṇaṃ yojyam । <q>pāda</q> iti jātau । pādayoriti yāvat । ekavacanānurodhāt tripadīyaṃ vṛttajātiriti <q>kecit</q>
।। 248 ।।</p>
<p>athātra tālavidhivaicitryamāha ।</p>
<p><q>ekadvikalā</q>(<q>laṃ</q>) <q>trikalāścatuṣkalāḥ ṣaṭkalāstathā</q>(<q>to'</q>)<q>ṣṭakalāḥ</q> iti ।
<q>prāsādikī</q>tvenākṣepikītvenopalakṣite dhruvāvidhāne tricatuḥṣaḍaṣṭakalāḥ kriyante । <q>tataskāre</q>ṇa ekakaladvikalau
yau vidhī uktau tadanusāreṇaikakalā kāryā । ekakalānusāraśca yathākṣaravidhinā vicitrarūpa iti
plutagurulaghudrutātmetyuktaṃ bhavati । ekakalaprastārāt pañcadvikalo vidhiḥ । ata eva catuṣkalaḥ punarnoktaḥ ।

<!-- COMMENTARY page 348 !-->
prastāra ityuktaṃ bhavati । śīrṣakaprakaraṇe'pi prasaṅgādayugmatālo'pi (pratipāditaḥ) ।। 249 ।।</p>
<p>atha prāveśikīnaiṣkrāmikyorvaktavyaśeṣamāha । <q>tryaśre virāmastrikala</q> iti । samastavivakṣitatālānte
virāmaḥ kāryaḥ । na tu madhye (iti) tātparyam ।। 250 ।।</p>
<p>athānyāsu virāmaniyamamāha । <q>virāmo dvikala</q> iti । antaradhruvāyāḥ padasamāptau
kalādvayaparimāṇālaṃkāravaicitryeṇa vā tūṣṇīkatayā viśrāntiḥ kāryā । atyantamiti tato'dhiketyarthaḥ । tuścārthe ।
ākṣepikyā apyevameva । <q>dvivirāma</q> iti । dvikalo virāma iti madhyamapadalope <q>dvivirāma</q> iti । <q>sthitāyāḥ
prāsādikyāśca</q> pādadvaye samāpte tāvatī viśrāntiḥ । na tu tripādamiti yāvat ।। 251 ।।</p>
<p>atha vṛttavibhāgenāpi yathākṣarasthityā tālavaicitryamastīti darśayitumāha ।
<lg><l>kalākalārdhayogena gurulaghvakṣarānvitā(:) ।</l></lg>
iti । <q>kalā</q>sahitaṃ <q>kalārdhaṃ</q> plutaṃ <q>kalā</q> ca gururūpā <q>kalārdhaṃ</q> laghu kalārdhaṃ cetyekaśeṣaṃ(ṣo) yujyate । ādyāvasthāyāṃ
laghubhāvena niyoge drutakalā kalārdhādiyogaśceti samāhāraḥ । tadayamarthaḥ । plutagurulaghudrutopalakṣitatatsamūharūpā
vakṣyamāṇā ye <q>dhruvāṇāṃ trayaḥ saṃyogā</q>ste <q>vṛttā</q>śrayāḥ kāryāḥ । vṛttāśrayaṃ tvāha । <q>gurulaghvakṣarānvitā</q> iti ।
gurvakṣare laghvakṣare ca dvi(kala)tā lagnā । etaduktaṃ bhavati । yatra chando guru tatra tālaguru(tālo guruḥ) । evaṃ laghu
nivāryam । yatra ca laghuguru(rū) tatra tālaplutaṃ tathāpi ca tāladrutam । tadyathā । ṣaṭkalamityatra gurulaghugurūṇi
gurudrutagurūṇi plutaguruṇī guruplute iti caturdhā prastāraḥ sthāpanīyaḥ । evaṃ sarvadhruvā<q>sūhyam</q> । eṣa eva samavṛtte'pi

<l>jātiphullapāna (ṇa)mattao । papha(phu)llapupphapādavam ।</l></lg>
<q>anye</q> tu tvākṛte(tau) chandasyadhamaviṣayatvaṃ na yuktāmiti manvānāḥ <q>pramodaka</q>sthāne budbudagavarga paṭhitamapi <q>vaṃśapatrapatitaṃ</q>
paṭhantyubhayapaṭhitamityubhayaviṣayatā siddhyarthamiti ।। 291--298 ।।</p>
<p><q>ābhyo vinisṛtā</q> iti । arthasamaviṣamarūpatayeti bhāvaḥ ।। 299 ।।</p>
<p>atha sarvadhruvāsu gāyatrameva pradhānamiti darśayati । <q>catuḥṣaṣṭirdhruvāṇāṃ tvi</q>ti । ṣaḍakṣare gāyatre <q>catuḥṣaṣṭi</q>
bhedā<q>śchando'dhyāye</q>(<q>bha.nā</q>.a.14. 55) darśitāḥ । <q>samavṛttākṣarād</q> gāyatrādeva ca pādakrameṇa nīvṛdi bhuñji
dvibhāgena ca sarvacchandobhedasiddhiḥ । tathāhi । pādacatuṣṭayopari pūrite ṣaḍviṃśatyakṣarotkṛte<q>ścatuḥṣaṣṭimūlajātayaḥ</q> ।
te (tā) anantāḥ । ata eva <q>gāyatastrāya</q> (te) iti gāyatra<q>māhuḥ</q> ।। 300 ।।</p>

<lg><l>sāmānyaujāśca jāyanto dhruvā viṣamapādikāḥ ।</l>

<q>praveśāpekṣe</q> (<q>kṣepe</q>)<q>ti</q> । <q>rasādhyāye</q> (<q>bha.nā</q>.a.6.29.30) vyākhyātaḥ ślokaḥ ।। 308 ।।</p>
<p>eteṣu nāmānvarthaṃ yojayati । <q>nānārasārthayukte</q>ti । <q>nānā rasā</q> bhāvā <q>arthā</q>śca vibhāvādayaḥ teṣāṃ yuktaṃ

<p>praviṣṭasyāvaśyaṃ niṣkramaṇaṃ na tvevamākṣepādityāśayena naiṣkrāmikīmāha । <q>aṅkānta</q> iti । aṅkasya samāptau ।

<lg><l>yā ca rasāntaramupagatamākṣepavaśāt1 kṛtaṃ prasādayati ।</l>

<lg><l>viṣaṇṇe mūrcchite bhrānte vastrābharaṇasaṃyame ।</l>

<!-- COMMENTARY page 367 !-->
ityādinā (rāvaṇavākyena) । yathā (<q>drutā</q>)vākyākarṇanena vīrarasasyākṣepyasya tu rasasya māsṛṇye । <q>sthite</q>ti
vilambitā । yathā'<q>śvatthāmno yuddhavīre</q> kramollaṅghanena

ithi nepathyaśravaṇādi tasya karuṇarasasya ।। 311 ।।</p>
<p>atha <q>prāsādikīmāha</q> । <q>yā ca rasāntaramupagatami</q>ti । <q>upagata</q> mabhyupagataṃ prastutaṃ rasaviśeṣaṃ yadā
<q>prasādayati</q> nirmalīkaroti । katham । anuktasya vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicārivargasya <q>ākṣepavaśāt</q>
sthirīkaraṇasamarthatvāditi । kāvyagatenotkarṣeṇa <q>rāgaprasādasya</q> jātyaṃśakagītivarṇālaṅkārasya saubhāgyakṛtasya
sāmājikahṛdayaṃ tanmayībhāvāpattiyogyatāmātmano jananamiti gītiśobhayā vā prāsādayojanaḥ । <q>prāsādikīṃ
vidyāt</q> । viśeṣamasyā dyotayati । iyaṃ hi prāveśikyākṣepikyā anantaramavaśyaprayojyā bhavati ।। 312 ।।</p>
<p><q>athāntarā</q>gānamāha । <q>viṣaṇṇe mūrcchite bhrānta</q> iti । antare chidre gīyata <q>ityantarā dhruvā</q> । tadāha ।
<q>doṣapracchādana</q>(<q>nā</q>) iti । tān doṣānudāharati । <q>viṣaṇṇa</q> iti ।
anukarturyadanāśaṅkitadhanaviṣayādatyuddhataprayogaśramavaśādvā bhramādidoṣasambhāvanā । vastrābharaṇāva--kāśaditsayā
(yā)gīyate <q>sāntarā dhruvā</q> । tatra ca prāktanaṃ bhāvi vā rasasvarūpamanuvṛttamityavaśyaṃ drutamadhyavapilambitānyatamena
bhāvyaṃ(vyam) । śa (<q>sa</q>)<q>eva ca tāla</q>(<q>bha.nā</q>.31.5)ityuktatvāt tadādhārabhūtayā chandonibaddhayā bhāvyam ।
kevalaṃ chidrācchādanamātraprayojanāyāmasyāṃ na sārthakapadakambayojanamupagītiśuṣkākṣaraireveyaṃ lakṣye ca <q>latikādi</q>nāmnā
prasiddhā gīyata iti nāṭyadharmī(rma) prāyeyam । yadyapi prāveśikyāderapi nānukāryaviṣayasambhavastathāpi
kāvyavākyaikavākyatāyāṃ
<lg><l>taralayasi dṛśaṃ kimutsukām ।</l></lg>
ityādi kākatālīyaśrutiśakunanyāyena laukikasya sambhavaṃ nātyantaṃ nāṭyadharmabhāvaḥ । evaṃ nāma vyākhyātam

1. ya. rasāt

<pb n="368"/>

<lg><l>dhruvāṇāṃ caiva sarvāsāṃ rasabhāvasamanvitam ।</l>
<l>yathāsthānaṃ pravakṣyāmi yatra geyaṃ prayatnataḥ ।। 314 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>dvividhaṃ tu smṛtaṃ sthānaṃ parasaṃsthātmasaṃśrayam ।</l>
<l>yattvākṣepasamāyuktaṃ tacca me sannibodhata ।। 315 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>baddhe niruddhe patite vyādhite mūrcchite mṛte ।</l>
<l>avakṛṣṭā dhruvā kāryā bhāve ca karuṇāśraye ।। 316 ।।</l></lg>
<!-- COMMENTARY page 368 !-->
<p>atha <q>jātiḥ sthānaṃ prakāraśca pramāṇaṃ nāma</q> <q>ce</q>ti śloke (<q>bha.nā</q>. 32--305) yatpramāṇamuddiṣṭaṃ
tallakṣayannupakramate । <q>dhruvāṇāṃ caiva sarvāsāmi</q>ti । tatra <q>sthāna</q>sya sāmānyalakṣaṇamāha । <q>yatra geyaṃ prayatnata</q> iti ।
rasopayogī pātraviśeṣaḥ <q>sthānami</q>tyarthaḥ ।। 314 ।।</p>
<p>nanu praveśaniṣkramākṣepaprasādacchidrāṇyeva geyasthānāni । tāni ca nāmanirvacanena labdhāni । tat kimidānīṃ
sthānaṃ nāmnā viśiṣyata ityāśaṅkyā । <q>dvividhaṃ tu smṛtaṃ sthānami</q>ti । na praveśādisthānamatra lakṣyate kintu
pradhānabhūto yo <q>rasabhāvā</q>dirarthastadupayogī tāvadgānam । tatra kadācidyatraiva yo'rthastaduddeśenaiva gīyate । yathā
<q>rāmasya sītā</q>diprayuktavipralambhe tadāśrayameva kadācit pātrāntarāśrayaṇena । yathā tasyaiva vipralambhe <q>lakṣmaṇā</q>śraye
<q>ti(ni)tarāma(mā)huri</q>tyatra । tadāha । <q>parasaṃsthātmasaṃśrayami</q>ti । parasthagataṃ <q>lakṣmaṇa</q>sya । ātmāśrayaṃ <q>rāmasya</q> ।
tena <q>sthānami</q>ti sthānāśrayaṃ gānaṃ <q>dvividhami</q>tyarthaḥ । nanvaparasyāsau karuṇa eva bhavati । na hi <q>rāme</q> vipralabdhe
<q>lakṣmaṇasya</q> vipralambhaḥ । kevalaṃ tadduḥkhaduḥkhitasyāsya karuṇa ityāśaṅkyāha । <q>yatvākṣepasamāyuktami</q>ti । <q>yadi</q>ti
yasmāt । <q>ākṣepaḥ</q> tadrasopakṣepitvenopayogaḥ । tena <q>ā</q>samantāt <q>yuktaṃ</q> svaparasaṃsthaṃ <q>sami</q>ti samyak avaikalyapūrṇatā
tenāyuktyā''<q>tmasaṃśrayam</q> । etaduktaṃ bhavati । <q>lakṣmaṇa</q>sya karuṇe vinayocitaṃ(te) masṛṇamantharaṃ (re) gāna(ne)
prayukte'pi tu rāmavipralambha eva tatra prayodakībhavati । tathā ca <q>lakṣmaṇa</q>sya tadupasarpaṇaiva paraiva tatparā gānaṃ
prayojayati । parastho'pyasau prayojako bhavati । sa vāyaṃ prayogo vidhinopadeśadiśā na śakyaṃ(kyaḥ) pratipādayitumiti
darśayati । <q>tacca me sannibodhate</q>ti ।। 315 ।।</p>
<p>tatrākṣepikyāṃ tāvat sthānadvayocitaṃ layavibhāgena viśeṣaṃ yathāyogaṃ nirūpayitumāha । <q>baddha</q> ityādi ।
<q>baddho</q> nigaḍādinā <q>niruddho</q>'vaṣṭabdhaḥ । <q>patito</q> mahāpātakayogāt । <q>mṛta</q> iti mumūrṣā । <q>avakṛṣṭe</q>ti vilambitā ।
<q>karuṇāśraya</q> iti nirvedādau ।। 316 ।।</p>

<lg><l>autsukye hyavahitthe ca cintāyāṃ paridevite ।</l>
<l>śrame dīne1(dainye) viṣāde ca sthitā kāryā dhruvā budhaiḥ ।। 317 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>eteṣveva tu bhāveṣu karuṇāvediteṣu ca ।</l>
<l>dhruvā drutā ca kartavyā karuṇe bhāvasaṃśrayā ।। 318 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>yatra pratyakṣajaṃ duḥkhaṃ mṛtābhihatadarśanam ।</l>
<l>sthitā tatra hi kartavyā karuṇe tu rase budhaiḥ ।। 319 ।।</l></lg>

<l>viṣāde ca 3prasāde ca roṣe sattvasya darśane ।। 320 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>vīraraudrabhayādyeṣu pratyakṣāvediteṣu ca ।</l>
<l>dhruvā drutalayā kāryā hyāvege sambhrame tathā ।। 321 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>prasāde(da)yācane caiva tathā'nusmaraṇe punaḥ ।</l>

<p>atha yatra prāveśikīśūnyaṃ tadāha ।

iha <q>prāveśikī</q> nāma pravekṣyataḥ pātrasya svarūpaṃ sāmājikamanasi saṃkṣepeṇa samarpayituṃ gīyate । tatra gāyatā yadā
praviśati tadā prāveśikyāṃ gīyamānāyāṃ prakṛtagānaṃ rodanaṃ ca vyadīya(rya)ta । sambhrāntasya pareṇa tvarayā preṣitasya
tūtpātavismāyāvāvedayitumāyātasya tvarayaiva praveśa ucita iti ।</p>
<p><q>anye</q> tvāhuḥ । pūrvapraviṣṭasya ca pradhānapātrasya devīprāyasya <q>gāyato rudato</q> vā sambandhī parijano yadā

tannikaṭamupasarpato madhyamapātrasyāpi sa(a)dhruvaḥ praveśaḥ । pradhānapātrasyā'pi <q>sambhrame</q> satyadhruva eva । <q>śaṅkhacūḍasyeva
jīmūtavāhanabha</q>kṣaṇākula<q>garu</q>ḍanikaṭamupasarpataḥ (<q>nāgāndam</q> 5.17) । <q>preṣaṇa</q>grahaṇaṃ naiṣkrāmikīviṣayaṃ prasaṅgāttena
tvarayatā pratīhāryādeḥ preṣitasyādhruvaniṣkrāmaṇam ।</p>
<p>atra tu praviṣṭapātreṇa gāyatā rudatā vā saha yadā praviśato jhaṭiti nāsti sambandhastadā prakṛtāsu(sū)paramo

<p><q>prakārastu praveśajā</q> iti । strīṇāma(mi)ti vartata iti <q>kecit । yā drutā sā vilambitā yā'ntarā

<p><q>madhyamānāṃ nīcānāṃ ca sampraveśe drutavilambitā</q> । tasyāṃ ca <q>khañjanarkuṭe</q> kṛte <q>kārya</q> iti saṅgatiḥ ।

32. 374) dikpradarśanamiti । tadarthamāhaṃ । <q>yad dravyaṃ vasudhāsaṃsthamṛte daivatamānuṣāṃśca</q> (ṣān । tāṃśca)

daivatam । tadvarjyam ।</p>
<p>nanu kimato niyamād dṛṣṭaṃ bhavatītyāśaṅkya hetumāha । <q>tatsarvamupaneyaṃ</q> tviti । turhetau । yasmād

<p>nanu ye pūrvamādityāgnisomādaya upamānatvenoktāsteṣāṃ yadā prayogavaśādivṛttaucityāt sākṣādeva <q>praveśo</q>

suku(mā)rasatire(me)va hi prati prāya idaṃ prava(prā)vṛtat । na pūrvaraṅgo nāmānyaḥ kaścit । api tu gītakānyeveti

<q>vādyā</q>jjātāni kalpanayā tata ā(a)poddhāreṇa labdhasvarūpāṇi <q>ṣoḍaśā</q>kṣarāṇi <q>dṛṣṭānī</q>ti sambandhaḥ ।। 47 ।।</p>
<p>athaiṣāṃ varṇānāṃ caturdhā samūhībhāvaṃ rasaviśeṣa upayojayituṃ darśayituṃ prakramate । <q>caturmārgami</q>ti । <q>yaduktami</q>ti ।
uddeśasūtre mārga ākāṅkṣā tayā sambandhanaṃ samūhībhāvātmā lakṣyate । sa caturdhā । <q>eko dvika</q> ityāṅgikamukham ।
tacca prathamo (mamu)ktam । kaṭarathakaṭasthānaṃ mṛdaṅgapūrvikamaṅgam । iha yatra ghaṭakāraya(yu)ktairetadgataiḥ prahārairyukto
<q>dviko</q> mārgaḥ ।। 48 ।।</p>
<p>aḍḍitā dhruvā śṛṅgāraviṣayā <q>dhruvādhyāye</q> (<q>bha.nā</q> 32) darśitā । tatrocite kṛtvā'ṅgi (ṅkiḥ) kasya
yadvāmamukhaṃ yatra <q>ghahamāśca vāmaka</q>mityuktam । <q>yaccordhvakaṃ</q> kaṭasthānaṃ ta<q>tprahārayukta āliptamārgaḥ</q> । śokāturo hi
śarīraparikarmavirahān(hon)mukha <q>āliptaḥ</q> । taducitakaraṇocitaścāyamiti । <q>ūrdhvake</q> padasthāne'<q>ṅkika</q>sya
<q>dakṣiṇamukhe</q> karaṭaśatadvaye uktirasātiśayavegatāḍanahastābhyāṃ prahāraṃ prakṛṣṭahananaṃ yatra sa <q>vitastamārga</q>śca । asya
dakṣiṇo sa(vita)stasyeti nāśayati tasya bhāvocitastāṃ hiṃsratāṃ tadviṣaye dīnaraudrābhāvasya viniyogo yataḥ ।
vitastimātrākṣiptahastapraharaṇasūcanārthaṃ <q>vitastamārga ityanye</q> paṭhanti । <q>sarveṣu puṣkare</q>ṣu yaddhananaṃ bāhulyena
cāṅgi(ṅki)ka eva nordhvakasthāne sa <q>gomukhīnaḥ</q> । <q>gomukhama</q>ntarvaktraṃ na tūrdhvam । tatra bībhatsayoga ityakṣarasaṅgatirapi
<q>gomukhī</q>tyuktā ।। 49 ।।</p>

<pb n="425"/>

tatrāḍḍita(tā)prahārajātam । maṭakaṭathidhadhaṭadhedhodhahamaṃdhi dhaṃdhanadhidhi ityaḍḍitāmārgaḥ ।
dhaḍaḥ guṭuguṭamadhedodhiṃdhadudhidudheṃdhi (ityāliptamārgaḥ)। kiṃkākiṭumeṭakitāṃ kiṃkekitāṃda.....
tasitāṃ guṭugetyevaṃ jñeyo vitastyāstu । śuddhaṃ siddhaṃ maddhikuṭadhedhematthiddhidhakhukhuṇaṃdhedhoṭatthimaṭa
gomukhīmārgaḥ ।। 50 ।।
<lg><l>kuryādvitastimārge tharavivarjitān prahārāṃstu ।</l>
<l>uddhatamārgeṇa vinā śeṣāḥ kāryāstu gomukhyām ।। 51 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>dromāṃstu guṭuguṭudhedrathaṇaighaṭakedorāḍim ।</l>

<l>ṭhiṇikhiṭhiṇiho ḍaḍaḍadho gomukhyām ।। 52 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>ye tvāliptasamutthā(:) sarvamārgaistu te vidhātavyā (:) ।</l>

<p>tatra mārgacatuṣṭaye tānyakṣarāṇi darśayati । <q>tatrāḍḍitāprahārajātami</q>tyādinā <q>gomukhīmārga</q> ityantena ।। 50 ।।</p>
<p>athātraiva <q>mārgacatuṣṭayene</q>tyuktam । viśeṣamāha । <q>kuryādi</q>ti । āṅgikadakṣiṇamukhagato repho <q>vitastamārgaḥ</q> ।
prāptā ūrdhvakakaṭatāśca dakārastālabhedaṃ niṣidhyate । nakārākārasyāliṅgake'pyaprāptasya
hamayoścāṅgikala(sa)mamukhagatayoraprāptayorniṣedhaḥ । madhye'sya tadvargaprakṣepādyajñāya tadāharaṇam । avarjitān <q>prahārāṃ</q>-
stvaḍḍitamārgeṇopalakṣya(kṣi)te vitaste kuryāt । matvarthīyo'tra cayoge । te <q>śeṣā</q> iha varjitā varṇāste <q>gomukhyāṃ
kāryā</q> iti । prāptānāmapyeṣāṃ punarvidhānaṃ bhūyastvaṃ khyāpayati ।। 51 ।।</p>
<p>āliptamārge rephasya pūrvalakṣaṇāprāptirityanyānubandhatvena rephāveśenātra bhavatītyudāharaṇavyājenāha ।
<q>dromāmi</q>tyādinā । <q>gomukhī</q>mārge sarveṣāṃ ravādīnāmaviśeṣe prāpte ḍa(ṅa)kāro'nyena tulya ityudāharaṇachadmanā
darśayati <q>praṇava</q> ityādinā ।। 52 ।।</p>
<p>aḍḍitāvarjanamārgatrayamuktvā viśeṣāntaramapi parasparānugrahato bhavatīti darśayitumāha । <q>ye tvāliptasamutthā</q>
iti । āliptasamutthānamākarmabhyo yeṣāṃ te । āliptādayastraya iti yāvat । tena sarve trayo'pi mārgā ityarthaḥ ।
<q>vidhātavyāḥ</q> ।

<lg><l>eteṣāṃ caiva vakṣyāmi darśanāni yathākramam ।</l>

iti । ayamarthaḥ । ekaṃ mṛdaṅgaṃ yadā vādayituṃ prādhānyena svīkriyate tadā mṛdaṅgāntarād drutaṃ kuryāt । tadyathā ।
ūrdhvakāṅkakāliṅgakā dakṣiṇamukhādyato(mukti)riti । atha tatra <q>mokṣa</q>stadā(digrahā)diti <q>sandhāna</q>m । tatra
vyāmiśratvena varṇasya jananaṃ vicitrameva lipau darśayitumaśakyameva । evaṃ <q>grahamokṣasandhānānā</q>mekabhedā(stra)yo
dvibhedāḥ ṣaṭ tribhedāśca ṣaḍiti । yathā pañcadaśabhirbhedaiḥ punarmārgādyairvaicitryam । yathoktaṃ <q>nandimate</q> ।
<lg><l>ṣoḍaśasvapi varṇeṣu bhedāḥ pañcadaśoditāḥ ।</l>

।। 53 ।।</p>
<p>athāsya mārgacatuṣṭayasya lakṣyasamavāyitamudāharaṇabhedamāha । <q>darśanānī</q>ti । nirdiśyate lakṣaṇaṃ pūrvā.....taṃ

dattamiti yāvat । prāyaśo'trābhireva <q>granthakṛtā</q> lakṣaṇādyaṃ darśitamiti bhaṅo(ṅgo) yathā bhavati tathā pāṭhe

<lg><l>eteṣāṃ puṣkarāṇāṃ trividhaḥ pracāraḥ । samapracāro viṣamapracāraḥ samaviṣamapracāra iti ।। 59 ।।</l></lg>
tatra ।
<lg><l>vāmordhvakayorvāmaḥ savyo vai dakṣiṇordhvake cāpi kā(ke kā)ryaḥ ।</l>

<p>atha mārgaśeṣabhūtameva <q>tripracārami</q>ti vyācaṣṭe । <q>trividhaḥ pracārami</q> (<q>ra</q> i)ti । vāmasya hastasya vāmabhāge
dakṣiṇasya dakṣiṇe pracaraṇaṃ sa <q>samapracāraḥ</q> । vaiparītyena svastikavartanādinā <q>viṣamapracāraḥ</q> । miśratāyāṃ <q>samaviṣamaḥ</q> ।
tena ca varṇānāmeva tīvrādirūpajananaṃ na tathā vaicitryāntaramādhīyata iti mārgaśeṣatā ।। 59 ।।</p>
<p>tatra mārgabhedena yojanamāha । <q>vāmordhvakayori</q>ti । <q>ālipte</q> mārge vādyakriyāyāḥ kartavyatāyāṃ hastaprabhṛtiḥ ।
tasyāḥ kartavyatāyāmayaṃ vidhiḥ । vāmordhvakaprahāra iti । <q>ālipta</q> iti tāvaduktam । tatra
vāmordhvakayormadhyamādvāme'ṅkike vāmamukhe savyena gate sati ūrdhvakenāpi dakṣiṇa eva hastaḥ <q>kārya</q> ityekahastaḥ
<q>samapracāra ālipte</q> । <q>tura</q>pyarthe ।। 60 ।।</p>
<p>atha yathāgrahasandhānamokṣaracanaṃ tathā vidhimāha । <q>vāmordhvakasavyānāmi</q>ti ।
grahāveśādvāmordhvakasaṃyogamavalambya hastapracāre vyāpriyamāṇe haste hastaṃ pravṛtte sati trayāṇāmapi puṣkarāṇāṃ
praghātāya vāmo hasta iti dvitīya eva hastaḥ samapracāraḥ ।। 61 ।।</p>
<p>śeṣā grahādivihīnā ye mārgabhedakaraṇabhedā mārgeṣu kriyābhedāsteṣu karaṇāṃśasambandhi hananaṃ yathāruci
tena tatra hastadvayapracāro'pi । evaṃ sampracārastrividhaḥ । <q>aḍḍitagomukha</q>yostu <q>samaviṣamo hasta</q>pracāraḥ । teṣu tu
viṣama evetyarthād darśitaṃ bhavati । <q>karaṇeṣvi</q>ti bahutvaṃ vyāpārabhedāt ।। 62 ।।</p>

1. <q>ra</q>. N: atrotpādya sutāṃste tu । 2. N: <q>ra</q>. sutā mama 3. <q>ḍa</q>. tadā 4. N. viṃśo'yaṃ marttyaloke pravartitaḥ
(224 b N.) 5. N dhūrtilaiḥ (224 d N.) 6. N: yajñayājinām

<pb n="519"/>

<lg><l>dānadharmeṣu sarveṣu kīrtyate tu mahat phalam ।</l>
<l>prekṣaṇīyapradānaṃ hi sarvadāneṣu śasyate ।। 28 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>na tathā gandhamālyena devāstuṣyanti pūjitāḥ ।</l>
<l>yathā nāṭyaprayogasthairnityaṃ tuṣyanti maṅgalaiḥ ।। 29 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>gāndharvaṃ ceha nāṭyaṃ ca yaḥ samyak pari(myaganu) pālayet ।</l>
<l>sa īśvaragaṇeśānāṃ labhate sadgatiṃ parām ।। 30 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>evaṃ nāṭyaprayoge bahuvidhivihitaṃ karmaśāstraṃ praṇītaṃ</l>
<l>noktaṃ 1yaccātra lokādanukṛtikaraṇāt saṃvibhāvyaṃ tu tajjñaiḥ ।</l></lg>
<lg><l>kiṃ cānyat samprapūrṇā bhavatu vasumatī naṣṭadurbhikṣarogā</l>
<l>śāntirgobrāhmaṇānāṃ bhavatu narapatiḥ pātu pṛthvīṃ samagrām ।। 31 ।।*</l></lg>
<lg><l>[iti bhāratīye nāṭyaśāstre guhyatattvakathanādhyāyaḥ saptatriṃśaḥ ।।]2</l></lg>
<lg><l><q>nāṭyaśāstraṃ saṃpūrṇam</q> ।।</l></lg>
<!-- COMMENTARY page 519 !-->
<p><q>gāndharvamiti</q> । nṛtyaṃ <q>nāṭyaṃ yo'nupālayet</q> । upadeśavyākhyānavivaraṇādinā ca । <q>īśvaragaṇeśatāṃ</q>(<q>śānāṃ</q>)
<q>labhante</q>(<q>te</q>)<q>sadgatiṃ parāmiti</q> । śivasāyujyam ।। 30 ।।</p>
<p>anuyāyitākaraṇa<q>manukṛtiḥ</q> । <q>narapati</q>riti । puruṣottama īśvaraḥ sakalajagatpālayitā । iti śivam
।। 31 ।।</p>
<p>śrī<q>madhyadeśa</q>bhavavipravarā<q>rtigupta</q>-
vaṃśotthitaḥ śivapadārpitacittavṛttiḥ ।।
(saṃgīta)rāganayaśṛṅkhala(su)prasiddho
vaṃśodbhavasthitivaśātta<q>nṛsiṃhaguptaḥ</q> ।। 1 ।।</p>
<p>tasyātmajo'<q>bhinavagupta</q>padābhidhāno
<q>bhaṭṭendu</q>rātmapadapāṃsupavitramūrtiḥ ।।
sadvipratātavadanādadhigamya <q>nāṭya-
vedaṃ</q> vyadhatta vivṛttiṃ laghumarthapūrṇām ।। 2 ।।</p>
<!-- APPARATUS page 519 !-->
1. N: yatacca (V 232 (N)
* (N) reads one more verse(V. 233) : mahāpuṇyaṃ praśasta ca lokānāṃ nayanotsavaṃ ।
nāṭyaśāstraṃ samāpto'yaṃ bhavatāmāyuṣovaham ।।
2. (N) iti bhāratīye nāṭyaśāstre <q>tattvavidhāno</q> nāmādhyāyaḥ trayastriṃśat ।।

<pb n="520"/>

<!-- COMMENTARY page 520 !-->
<p>śivapuravijayahetuvijayādikarudrasahasrapūtayā
<q>pravarapurā</q>bhidhāna<q>kāśmīraka</q>dhānaśubhe <q>vitastayā</q> ।।
adhigatajanmavasatiramṛtakaraśekharabhaktisaktito
racayati <q>nāṭyavedavivṛtiṃ</q> laghu<q>mabhinavagupta bhāratīm</q> ।। 3 ।।</p>
<p>prabhuḥ śambhuryasya prathitaparamārthasthitisukhaḥ
parādhīnaśceto vyadhita sa tadārārja(dha)navidhau ।।
tataḥ śastasvātmāntarahṛdayaviśrāntikṛtinaḥ
kṛtiṃ tasyetthaṃ bhoḥ śṛṇuta bhagavantaḥ sahṛdayāḥ ।। 4 ।।</p>
<p>sajjanān kavirasau na yācate
hlādanāya śaśabhṛt kimarthitaḥ ।
nāpi nindati khalān muhurmuhu-
rdhikkṛto'pi na hi śītalo'nalaḥ ।। 5 ।।</p>
<p>nāṭyārthaprathanāt tasmāt tuṣṭa(ṣṭo)nāṭye pareṇa yat ।
kriyāt tenaiṣa janatāmānandollāsasundarām ।। 6 ।।</p>
<p>iti mahāmāheśvarā<q>bhinavaguptācārya</q>viracitāyāṃ <q>nāṭyavedavṛttā-
vabhinavabhāratyāṃ guhyatattvakathanaṃ saptatriṃśaḥ</q> ।।</p>
<p>।। samāptā ceyamabhinavaguptakṛtiḥ ।।</p>
